0a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ dum bu gsum pa/ bam po dang po'o// 
0a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gnad ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu masgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so
0a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu mi yang gzhan pa lags te/ tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o// bcom
0a5('bum): ldan 'das 'du shes kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du shes nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
0a6('bum): kyang 'du shes so// bcom ldan 'das 'dre bya kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gan na ma lags
0a7('bum): 'du byed nyid kyang ska ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yangagazhan ma lags
0a8('bum): ma yang gzhon ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das myig kyang gzhan
0b1('bum): rab 'byor dede ci'i phyir zhen 'ad ltar dang sto pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis steng ba'i phyir ro// phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis gleng pa'i phyir ro// phyi ma stong
0b2('bum): nyid phyin ljo pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir tshe/ dngos pa med pa ngango bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis spyong pa'i phyir ro// rab la nga
0b3('bum): chen nyid dbu'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'byung bar 'did nga zad do// rab 'byor dgang mtshan nyid byed pa'i chos na
0b4('bum): byung bar 'dod pa de yang dag par spong ba rnams dang 'phrub gyi da pa rnams dang / da de po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang bya
0b5('bum): ba kyi yan la kaM rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lamayang laka brgyad pa 'thung bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe rab 'byor nga dran pa nye bar gzhag
0b6('bum): pa rnam shing bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid tu gnas pa myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / 
0b7('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lakra brgyad pa'i ngo dro nyi na
0b8('bum): ri su mnas 'byung ba myed do// rnam pa thams cad pa nad pa nyid du rganas pa myed do// rab 'byor da de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ngang po te phyi rogan
1b1('bum): / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa / dum bu gsum pa'o// 
1b2('bum): bam po dang po'o// / bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang
1b3('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang gzu gas so// bcom
1b4('bum): ldan 'das/ tshor ba yang gzhan ma lagasasgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags// te/ tshor ba nyid kyang
1b5('bum): snum sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das 'du shes kyang gzhan sa
1b6('bum): lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te// 'du shes nyid kyang sgyu ma
2a1('bum): kya du shesaso// chom ldan nas kun kyang kunanas / sgyum yang gzhanas lags te/ 'a bye m+b+ham+b+ha/ rnam da / 
2a2('bum): na sag kyi smras/ sa myigs// d-i sanapa ming gnanam lams/ ma yang gzhanas lags / 
2a3('bum): na dzes su ya 'anas smras danam lagu ste/ sa/ sgyu ma nyid
2a4('bum): chom ldan padas sde ming gzha ma lags/ yang gzhan ma lags te/ lce nyid kyang sbrum dkyang lce'o// bcom ldan 'das sus kying gzhanas
2a5('bum): ma ldan gzugs kyi gnas lags/ sgyus 'bye nga lags te/ gas da kya sbyim/ snam nyi kyang gzug / 
2a6('bum): masani 'das sna ming gzhan ma yinas/ snyam meng gnanas lags te/ bla ni kyang sgra sa rgyam ni kyang sgra'o// bcom ldan 'das dri yang gzhanas lags/ sgra mi yang gzhan ma lags te/ 
2b1('bum): dri nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang dri'o// bcom ldan 'das ro yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lag te/ ro nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang ro'o// bcom ldan 'das reg kyang gzhan ma lags te/ 
2b2('bum): reg nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang reg go// bcom ldan 'das chos kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chos nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang chos so// bcom ldan 'das myig gi rnam
2b3('bum): par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i rna bar shes pa
2b4('bum): yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das A'i rnam par shes
2b5('bum): ba yang gzhan ma lags te/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sA 'i rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lce'i rnam par
2b6('bum): shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lus kyi rnam par shes pa
2b7('bum): yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// 
2b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// 
3a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ 
3a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan
3a3('bum): 'das snga'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'dus
3a4('bum): te reg pa yang sgyu ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te regs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lus kyi 'dus te
3a5('bum): reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags / lus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te/ 
3a6('bum): rig pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang smra sa/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'o// bcom ldan 'das myig gi 'dus te reg
3a7('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sgyu ma nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
3a8('bum): kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ 
3b1('bum): sgyu ma nyid rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba gzhan ma lags// sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen/ 
3b2('bum): kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu sa/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags// sgyu ma yang gzhan mo
3b3('bum): lags// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
3b4('bum): ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// 
3b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma rgya
3b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das sa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sa'i khams kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma sa'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das chu'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags
3b7('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang snum/ sgyum nyid kyang chu'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das me'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 
3b8('bum): me'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang me'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das rlung gi khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma
4a1('bum): nyid kyang rlung gi kham so// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang nam/ 
4a2('bum): mkha'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par
4a3('bum): shes pa'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa yang gzhan ma lags na/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'du
4a4('bum): byed kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma
4a5('bum): yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu masgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das mying dang gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ 
4a6('bum): sgyu ma nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ mying dang gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mying dang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das skye mched drug kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ skye nached
4a7('bum): drug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang skye mched drug go// bcom ldan 'das reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang reg pa'o// bcom ldan
4a8('bum): 'das tshor ba mang gzhin ma lags pa/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sred pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 
4b1('bum): sred pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sred pa'o// bcom ldan 'das len pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lag sa// len pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang len pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
4b2('bum): srid pa yang gzhon ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ srid pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang srid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das skye ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ skye ba nyid kyang/ 
4b3('bum): sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang skye ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rga shi yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags de/ rga shi nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rga shi'o// pa sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags
4b4('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sbyind pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan
4b5('bum): mi lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags ste/ tshul khris kyi pha ro// lang du phyinang pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshul khrimasakyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha ro/ 
4b6('bum): tu phyind pa yang gizhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang s+thA ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus
4b7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyi skyes/ sbru ma nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyidang pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
4b8('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yang ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bcom
5a1('bum): ge rab kye rol da byin da'i yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyum yang gnanam lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyum/ sgyum nyid kyang / shes rab kyi ba rol du phyinapa
5a2('bum): pu'o// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhon ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te nang stong pa nyid kyang snum/ sgyu ma nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid/ bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhon ma
5a3('bum): lag/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang sgyu me/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
5a4('bum): kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// 
5a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das chen po snod nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ rgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid// bcom ldan 'das/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lag/ 
5a6('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ don dam pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ bcom ldan 'das 'dis byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma legs te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang sgyu
5a7('bum): sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang sgyu sa/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus ma byas s+ho/ 
5a8('bum): byed de/ bcom ldan 'ad mtha' pas 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gdanam lags rgyas 'dugan sum seMs mtha phra 'das paspong ba 'od kyi rgyag rgyu byed kyi mtha' las 'das pa cing ba / 
5b1('bum): mthan pa rgyags sa myed na 'tsha kya ca ma lal/ rnam ma gas shA / thugs pa da byung ga rdzas/ dzug
5b2('bum): ldan 'das dngar ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyum yang gzhan ma lags te/ der babyed pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dor ba skyid pa stong pa nyid/ bcom ldan 'das 'ang bzhin
5b3('bum): pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags kyi/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sgyum/ rgyu ma nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rmong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
5b4('bum): lags/ sgyum yang gzhan rwa lpags te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid rgyu r+g+hos thams cad stong pa nyid / bcom ldan 'das rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa'i kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang
5b5('bum): gzhan ma lagras kyi/ rang kyi mtshan nyid stong po nyid kyang snumasgyum nyid kyang rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyi namyags pa nyid kyang gnanam legs
5b6('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lagos te/ myi ma dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
5b7('bum): kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gnan mya lags te/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang snum/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid// bcom ldan
5b8('bum): 'angs ngo ba nyid stong panyid kyang kunan mo lags sgyum yang gzhan ma lags te/ dngos po skyid pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang sbrum sgyu ma nyid stong pa nyid kyang stsam/ sgyum nyid byeng bya byed// 
6a1('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ngo bo nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang ngo bo nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags// 
6a2('bum): te/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan
6a3('bum): 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// bcas
6a4('bum): ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags de yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// bcom ldan
6a5('bum): 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ s+thA ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnamasasgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// bcom
6a6('bum): ldan 'das dbang po rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dbang po rnams kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ 
6a7('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ stobs rnams kyang sbru ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stobs rnams so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ 
6a8('bum): sbyim yang gzhanas pags// byang chu chams gnas kyang smras/ sgyu ma nyid kya phyi chu kyims gnas / sos ldan las phags pa'i ladu yan lag brgyang pa yang gnas
6b1('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa
6b2('bum): rnams kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das bsam
6b3('bum): gtan rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bsam gtan nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byasam gtan rnams so// bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams
6b4('bum): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma legs te/ tshad myed pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshad myed pa rnamaso// bcom ldan 'das gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
6b5('bum): rnams kyang gzhan ma legs sgyu ma yang gzhan ma la gsate/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rna mas kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms pa/ 
6b6('bum): 'jug pa rnams so// 6/ bcom ldan 'das mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams// kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma nyid kyang gzhan mo lags te/ mtha rad kyis gnas
6b7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
6b8('bum): myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par
6b9('bum): sa sa kya gnan tshu la gnan rnams pa nyid kyi gzhan ma lag sa
7a1('bum): tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 
7a2('bum): mngon par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzind rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ tinga'i dzim
7a3('bum): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ti nge 'dzind rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan
7a4('bum): sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// bcom ldan 'ad sa de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
7a5('bum): kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs / bcu'o// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag myi 'jig pa rnam sa kyang gzhan ma lagasate/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 
7a6('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang myi 'jigs pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
7a7('bum): lags te/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan
7a8('bum): ma lags te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
7b1('bum): lags te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags
7b2('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags de/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// bcom ldan 'das lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lag/ 
7b3('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras po// bcom ldan 'das phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang gzhan ma
7b4('bum): lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyir myi 'ong ba mi 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'a debras bu'o// bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa nyid kyang
7b5('bum): gzhan ma legs/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ dag bcom pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid// bcom ldan 'das rang byang chub kyang gzhan ma lags/ 
7b6('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang byang chub bo// bcom ldan 'das lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags
7b7('bum): te/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma gsed sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ 
7b8('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byor de rje
8a1('bum): snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba 'am 'gag pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dede ji snyam du sems/ 
8a2('bum): sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la
8a3('bum): skye ba myed cing 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed cing rnam par byang ba myed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slob par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba
8a4('bum): 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// bco ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga/ la 'di lta ste/ byang chub
8a5('bum): sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes pa dang / bda' dang gdags pa dang / tha snyan du tsam gis bya ba yin nam/ gsol dang / bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba/ 
8a6('bum): stsald pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes dang / brda 'a dang / gdags pa dang tha snyad gis/ nye bar len pa'i phung po skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar
8a7('bum): dmyigs par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ gang la 'du shes myed cing brda' myed pa dang / gdags pa myed
8a8('bum): po dang / tha snyad mye pa dang / mying myed pa dang / mying du gdags pa myed pa dang / lus myed pa dang / lus kyi las myed pa dang / ngag myed pa dang / ngag gi las myong pa dang / yid myed pa dang / yid kyi las myong
8b1('bum): pa dang / skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba/ 
8b2('bum): 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems
8b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyuraro/ 
8b4('bum): gsol de pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnal slab pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos na sgra
8b5('bum): ma'i skyes bus bslabs pa de ltar bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub la bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du na na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga po de nyid sgyu mo
8b6('bum): 'i skyes bur rig par bya ba sha stag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams
8b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar phung po lnga po rnams na/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin
8b8('bum): can te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ rmyi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab/ 
9a1('bum): kyi pha rolud tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'dra/ 
9a2('bum): de ni 'di ltar rmyi lam ni dngos po myed pa'i rang bzhin can te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin ni dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byorarang de ji snyam du sems
9a3('bum): sgyu ma'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar myi 'gyur ro// de ci
9a4('bum): 'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sgyu ma'i ni dang / sa po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
9a5('bum): bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems smra ba na lta bu'i phung po lnga po/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'bru
9a6('bum): bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar smra brnyan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te dngos po ma mchis pa'i rdzo
9a7('bum): bzhin doni dmyigs sum mchiso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsamang ba/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ myig sa dusu bu'i phung po lnga pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsdus
9a8('bum): shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di lta myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i srad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ster phyog yor rna rdzim
9b1('bum): phyo ma mchis pa'i rang ba zhid te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin ni dngas dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chu thA lta bu'i phung pos
9b2('bum): po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
9b3('bum): 'das de ni 'di ltar chu zla ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyig su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 
9b4('bum): smyig rgyu lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi na pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'a byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur/ 
9b5('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar smig rgyu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhini de ni dmyigs su ma mchi sa// bcom ldan 'das
9b6('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rabu 'byo de ji snyam du sems kau / sprub pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur rom/ sa
9b7('bum): pa/ bcom ldan 'das don myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i steng du ni na/ bcom ldan 'das drini 'di ltar smras pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin ni dmyigs su mnus
9b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bko' stsal dpa/ rab 'phyir nga de ni 'di ltar gzugs na rgya lam lta bu tshor ba ni skyilam la sa/ 'du shes ni skye lam lta bu 'du byed ni rmyi la ma lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rlom
10a1('bum): sa bya ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po snga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyig so// phyinang slong ba nyid kyi phyir/ 
10a2('bum): myi dmyigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi myig so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs su
10a3('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigasaso// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gi phyir myi
10a4('bum): dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyig so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa
10a5('bum): nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so/ dngos po myed par stong pa nyid kyi phyi myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyig so/ dngos pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigasaso/ 
10a6('bum): rab 'byor gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba ni sgyu m+b+ha lta bu/ 'du shes ni sgyu ma lta bu/ 'du byed ni sgyu ma lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni/ 
10a7('bum): phu po lnga'o// de dag ni snying pa na kyi phyir myi dmyigs mi phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mye dmyigs sa/ byi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyig so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so/ chen po
10a8('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'chi/ 
10b1('bum): song nyid kyi phyir b+hU dmyigs so/ rnyog pa da ba ma myed pa stong pa tu phyi myu dmyigs sa/ do ba med pa skyong pan du rgyu phyir myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir bya dmyigs so// chos
10b2('bum): tham sa cad spong ba kyi myi dmyigs so// rang gi surdzun ni slong ba ni ga phyir myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi
10b3('bum): so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de gzugs ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ tshor ba ni sgra rnyan lta bu/ 'du shes ni sgra
10b4('bum): brnyan lta bu/ 'du byed ni sma nAnA b+hu N+Di d+hU par shes pa ni sgra brnyan lbu bu ste/ rnam par shes pa na gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug dgro// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi
10b5('bum): dmyigs so/ phyi stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so/ phyi nang stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyig so/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gi phyir/ myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// 
10b6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong zi na da kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// sa
10b7('bum): su dang pa ma myed pa stong kyi cing gi byor myi dmyigs so// ror bskyed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rung bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong ba nyid gu phyir myi phyig/ 
10b8('bum): so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ga phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir
11a1('bum): ga da phyogs 'i/ rkyen gyi gang pa kyi ra / don das pa sod banyid kyi bya / dus byas ma
11a2('bum): myigs so// 'dus ma byos stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs/ mtha' la sa 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyig so// thog ma dang tham myed pa stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyig so// dor ba myed pa stong pa
11a3('bum): nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyig sa so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// myi dmyig
11a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyig so/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gi phyir mya dmyig so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor
11a5('bum): gzugs na chu zla lta bu/ tshor ba ni chu zla lta bu/ 'du shes ni nu zla lta bu/ 'du byed ni chu zla lta bu/ 'dra bdun chu zla rnam par shes pa ni chu zla lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// don pu
11a6('bum): po lnga'o// de dgi na nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid gi phyir myo dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// chen po sa
11b1('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa
11b2('bum): stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// chos thams
11b3('bum): cid stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid go phyir myi da myigs s+ho// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid
11b4('bum): stong po nyid kyi phyir myi myigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong / shing gi phyir mi dmyigs s+ho// rab 'byor du gzugs ni sgrog/ rgyu lta bu/ tshor ba ni smyig rgyu lta bu/ 'du shes ni smyig rgyul du/ 
11b5('bum): 'du byed na smig rgyu lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni smyig rgyu lta buste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de dag/ ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyig so
11b6('bum): bye stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyin stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyig so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid gi phyir
11b7('bum): dmyigs so/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs su/ 'dus ma byas stong pa da gi phyir myi dmyigs so// mtha' lus 'das pa stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong
11b8('bum): pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so/ dor bskyed pa stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang banin stong po nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan ning
12a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 
12a2('bum): ga/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor du gzugs ni sprul pa lta bu/ tshor ba ni sprul pa lta bu/ 'du shes ni sprul pa lta bu/ 'du byed ni sprul pa lta bu/ rnam par shes pa
12a3('bum): ni sprul pa lta bu ste/ rna bar shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so/ phyi nang stong pa nyid gi/ 
12a4('bum): phyir myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigaso// don dam pa stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi
12a5('bum): phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigaso mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// tho ga ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// dor ba
12a6('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs so// 
12a7('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigasaso/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigaso// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyig/ 
12a8('bum): so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar tu zhugs pra/ bstan pa 'di thos nas 'jigs shing sdang ba dang / skrag par myi/ 
12b1('bum): 'gyur lags drang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa yin la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thabs
12b2('bum): kyang myi mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gi lag du ma 'ongs na/ 'jigs shing sdang ba dang / skrag par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
12b3('bum): bstan pa 'di thos nas/ myi 'jigs myi sdang myi skrag pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub se/ 
12b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spro/ da pa'i tshe/ rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// 
12b5('bum): tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar gartogs te de myi dmyigs so// 'du she/ sa myi rtag ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// 'du bye de myi rtag ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rna bar shes
12b6('bum): pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorade 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor
12b7('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba
12b8('bum): rtogs te de myi dmyags so// tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// 'du shes sdug sngal zhes bya bar rtogs te de mya dmyigs so/ 'du byed sdug sngal zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi/ 
13a1('bum): dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa sdug sngal zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs
13a2('bum): mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs/ 
13a3('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// tshor ba bdag myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyig so// 'du shes bdag myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// 'du byed bdag myed ces bya bar
13a4('bum): rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga 'di ni byang chu dab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
13a5('bum): la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
13a6('bum): ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs zhi zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigaso/ 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// 'du byed zhi zhes/ 
13a7('bum): bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
13a8('bum): pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems// 
13b1('bum): kyis/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ tshor ba stong zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad
13b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du shes stong zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed stong zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi/ 
13b3('bum): dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che
13b4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas da'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' semos dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
13b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i sems kyis/ ga zugs mtshan ma myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 
13b6('bum): tshor ba mtshan ma myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du shes mtshan ma myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigaso/ rnam pa tha
13b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed mtshan ma myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa mtshan
13b8('bum): ma myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan
14a1('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs smon pa myed ces bya ba/ 
14a2('bum): rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ tshor ba smon pa myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigasaso// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
14a3('bum): sems kyis/ 'du shes smon pa myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed smon pa myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigasas
14a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa smon pa myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyi gas so// rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
14a5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkha sa pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ga
14a6('bum): 'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar gtogs te de myi dmyigs so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sas
14a7('bum): kyis/ tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar rtogs te de mi
14a8('bum): dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyig so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sos
14b1('bum): kyis/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
14b2('bum): thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis
14b3('bum): gzugs dben zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ tshor po dben zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigaso// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
14b4('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du shes dben zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigaso// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang du ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed dben zhes bya bar rtogs te/ 
14b5('bum): de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rna pArar+ya dben pa zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' se/ 
14b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
14b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs myi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba myi
14b8('bum): rtag pa'i rnam par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes rnam par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
15a1('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed myi rtag pa'i rnam par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa myi rtag pa'i rnam par byed de de myi dmyigaso// 
15a2('bum): rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
15a3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
15a4('bum): yid la bya bas/ tshor ba sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi de la bya bas/ 'du shes sdug sngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de de/ 
15a5('bum): myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba sa/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa
15a6('bum): yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed te de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de 'di na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs
15a7('bum): mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs dang 'i
15a8('bum): rnam par rtog par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba bdag myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
15b1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes bdag myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed bdag myed pa'i rnam par
15b2('bum): rtog par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa bdag myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed te de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor du 'di ni byang chub
15b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
15b4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de do mya dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa
15b5('bum): yid la bya bas/ tshor ba zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed te de myi dmyigaso/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed te de myi dmyigs
15b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed tid myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes
15b7('bum): rnam par shes pa zhi po'i rnam par rtog par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// ra
15b8('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong pa'i rnam par rto/ 
16a1('bum): rnal thos cang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yings bya / rnam shes blo rtogs par byed de kyi byims
16a2('bum): par byed te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
16a3('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed te de mya dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed te de mya
16a4('bum): dmyigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thibs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
16a5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams ca da mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mtshan mu myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed te de myi dmyigs so// rnam
16a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed te de myi dmyigs so// rna/ pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
16a7('bum): 'du shes mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed te de myi dmyig
16a8('bum): so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed pa'i rna bar rtog par byed te de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems da
16a9('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thes
16b1('bum): cid mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs smon pa myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba smon pa/ 
16b2('bum): myed pa'i rnam par rtog par rtog par byed de de myi dmyigs so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes smon pa myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de mya dmyigs so// 
16b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed smon pa myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
16b4('bum): rnam par shes pa smon pa myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed te de myi dmyi dgas so// rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sem/ su dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod/ 
16b5('bum): pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
16b6('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed
16b7('bum): ba'i rnam par rtog par byed te de myi dmyig so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed te de myi dmyigs so// rnam
16b8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya/ 
17a1('bum): bas/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ 
17a2('bum): spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
17a3('bum): lo bya bas/ gzugs dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed te de myi dmyigs
17a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed te de myi da dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
17a5('bum): bya bas/ 'du byed dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed te/ de myi dmyigs so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa'i dben pa'i rnam par/ 
17a6('bum): rtag par byed te de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// / 
17a7('bum): bam po gnyis pa'o// / rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar rtogs pa de 'di snyam
17a8('bum): du sems te/ sems can thams cad la gzugs myi rtag pa ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis chos bstand to// gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis chos / 
17b1('bum): gzugs bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstand to// gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshus
17b2('bum): gis chos bstan pa'o// gzugs mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis chos bstan to// gzugs
17b3('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshu la kyis chos bstan to// gzugs dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis chos bstan to// tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar de myi
17b4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos bstan to// tshor ba sdug pa sngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos bsta na to// tshor ba bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
17b5('bum): chos bstan to// tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos bstan to// tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa 'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshorab mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi
17b6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos bstan to// tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis chos
17b7('bum): bston to// tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis chos bstan to// 'du shes myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos bstan to// 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs
17b8('bum): pa'i tshul gis chos bstan to/ 'du shes bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos bstan to/ 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos bstan to// 'du shes stong
18a1('bum): zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos kyi bstan to// 'du shes smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
18a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos bstan to// 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos bstan to// 'du byed
18a3('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos bstan to// 'du byed bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
18a4('bum): gis chos bstan to// 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
18a5('bum): pa'i tshul gis chos bstan to/ 'du byed smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du ba/ da mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ 
18a6('bum): chos bstand to// 'du byed dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstand to// rnam par shes pa myi rti ga ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rna bar shwe/ 
18a7('bum): pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ rna bar shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyig
18a8('bum): pa'i tshul kyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 
18b1('bum): rnam par shes pa smon pa myed ces bya bar myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa deden
18b2('bum): zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to snyam mo// rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' seMs
18b3('bum): dpa' chen po de myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang
18b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ gzugs/ gang myi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la
18b5('bum): bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa ra yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ 
18b6('bum): gzugs gang bdag myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa'i de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ gzugs gang zhi ba'i rnam par
18b7('bum): yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ gzugs gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
18b8('bum): yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / 
19a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ gzugs gang smon pa myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang
19a2('bum): myi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ gzugs gang
19a3('bum): dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang myi rtag pa'i yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i/ 
19a4('bum): tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa ru yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// 
19a5('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ cho ra ba gang bdag myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyi/ gas pa'i tshul gis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang
19a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas tshor ba gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pa/ 
19a7('bum): tshor ba gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par
19a8('bum): yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang smon pa myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs kyi/ 
19b1('bum): tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// 
19b2('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid
19b3('bum): la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang myi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ 'du shes
19b4('bum): sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi sa yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang bdag myed pa'i
19b5('bum): rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi lnga/ na pas/ 'du shes gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de
19b6('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas 'du shes gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ 
19b7('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
19b8('bum): gi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang smon pa myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ nyan thos dang / rangasaHngas rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan
20a1('bum): pas/ 'du shes gang mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pa/ 
20a2('bum): 'du shes gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang myi rtag pa'i rnam par
20a3('bum): yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang sdug bsngal ba'i yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i
20a4('bum): gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang bdag myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan
20a5('bum): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ 2du byed gang zhi ba'i rnam par yi la byed pa de myi dmyigs/ na pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang spangs
20a6('bum): rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan
20a7('bum): pas/ 'du byed gang mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang smon dpa
20a8('bum): myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i rnam
20b1('bum): par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas// 'du byed gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa/ 
20b2('bum): tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang myi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis yid la
20b3('bum): byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyand
20b4('bum): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang bdag myed pa'i rnam par yid la// byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// 
20b5('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pa/ sa/ rnam par shes pa gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa dri myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos
20b6('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi
20b7('bum): yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang
20b8('bum): myi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang sman pa myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis yid la byed do/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan
21a1('bum): pas/ rnam par shes pa gang mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ 
21a2('bum): ga/ rnam par shes pa gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
21a3('bum): pa nyams pa myed pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
21a4('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag myi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag myed pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma/ 
21a5('bum): myed pa'i rnam pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par rtogs pa/ ra byed pa dang / bzod pa dang mos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dang/ 
21a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
21a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab
21a8('bum): tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
21b1('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de/ 
21b2('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad
21b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzug
21b4('bum): smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu/ dag go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya
21b5('bum): bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa tha/ mas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye bas/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab
21b6('bum): tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yin
21b7('bum): la bya bas/ tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
21b8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
22a1('bum): ldan pa'i yod la bya bas/ tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mtshan ma myed ces bya ba/ 
22a2('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams
22a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor/ 
22a4('bum): ba dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis rab tu rtog
22a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du// shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa
22a6('bum): yid la bya bas/ 'du shes bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lA na pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs
22a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
22a8('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mngon par 'du
22b1('bum): bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis rab tu rtog go// 
22b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du
22b3('bum): byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid lnga bya bas/ 'du byed bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
22b4('bum): rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ma dal bya bas/ 'du byed na zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'o// tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyidapa
22b5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mtshan ma myed ces
22b6('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// 
22b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
22b8('bum): yid la bya bas/ 'du byed dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye bas/ rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de mya
23a1('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ 
23a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar do myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
23a3('bum): la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyi/ 
23a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa ma tshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rab tu rtog go// 
23a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba/ sa/ rnam par shes pa sngon po myed ces bya bar de myi dmyig sa pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / 
23a6('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par
23a7('bum): shes dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// de ltar de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ myi gtong zhing brtson 'grus myi 'dor ba 'di ni/ byang
23a8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan
23b1('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyig/ 
23b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba'i chos ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba/ gzhan gyi skabs myi 'byed pa dang / byang
23b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa
23b4('bum): tshul gyis rab tu rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go mya 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems
23b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nga myi ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs bdag myed ces bya bar de myi
23b6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba de gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems
23b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis rtog
23b8('bum): cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go mya 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
24a1('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog cing / nyan/ 
24a2('bum): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
24a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang
24a4('bum): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin/ pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
24a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cadamakhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs so// na pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing
24a6('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
24a7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis to/ ga cing / nyan thos dang / 
24a8('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
24b1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
24b2('bum): dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab sa kyi pha rol tu phyi nang
24b3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend po nyid dang ldan ni 'a sa byas/ tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyand thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
24b4('bum): yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems da dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la
24b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi da myigs pa'i tshul gis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs
24b6('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mya dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan go go myi 'byed paHdang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
24b7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba bdage myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rtog cung / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 
24b8('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la
25a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / 
25a2('bum): myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub gi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
25a3('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gas rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba/ 
25a4('bum): gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba tshan
25a5('bum): ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go mya 'byed pa/ 
25a6('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
25a7('bum): pa'i tshul gis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
