25a8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
25b1('bum): rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
25b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
25b3('bum): yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thos
25b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes myi rtag/ ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma
25b5('bum): yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa
25b6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas dong myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi geg
25b7('bum): du 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du
25b8('bum): shes bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mya'i
26a1('bum): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ num rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bar 'du shes zhi ba zhes bya
26a2('bum): bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi phyogs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang
26a3('bum): chub kyi sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
26a4('bum): tshul kyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi / dgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub se
26a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi da la bya bas/ 'du shes mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyig
26a6('bum): pa'i tshul kyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sos
26a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rtog cing / 
26a8('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
26b1('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes 'ad mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis rtog cing / nyan thos
26b2('bum): dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
26b3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
26b4('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi glo myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
26b5('bum): nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi/ sa rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
26b6('bum): yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa 'gyur ba byang chub kyi gegasu 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ 
26b7('bum): pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / ldan pa'i
26b8('bum): yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa 'gyur ba byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go mya 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
27a1('bum): tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
27a2('bum): yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa 'gyur ba byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
27a3('bum): nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi
27a4('bum): dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi/ go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thos/ 
27a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi
27a6('bum): dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad
27a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma
27a8('bum): yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan go go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
27b1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub
27b2('bum): gyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
27b3('bum): yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi
27b4('bum): gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rno ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
27b5('bum): la bya bas/ 'du byed dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i chu la gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang lnga na pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs/ 
27b6('bum): su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba/ 
27b7('bum): rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzha/ 
27b8('bum): gyi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes
28a1('bum): pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba/ 
28a2('bum): gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par
28a3('bum): shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba/ 
28a4('bum): gzhan gyi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem/ nyes dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa de'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya/ 
28a5('bum): bas/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i chu la gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang lnga na pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegasu
28a6('bum): 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ nA
28a7('bum): par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi
28a8('bum): 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rna bar shes pa mtshan ma myed ces
28b1('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / 
28b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa smon pa myed ces bya
28b3('bum): bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub
28b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rna bar shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba
28b5('bum): myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan
28b6('bum): gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes
28b7('bum): la dbe no zhes bya bde myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sa ng+yas rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi
28b8('bum): 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de myi 'jigs myi sdang myi skrag par// 
29a1('bum): myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor du gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i/ 
29a2('bum): yid la bya bas/ rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste/ gzugs gi stong pa nyid gos/ gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba'i stong pa nyid
29a3('bum): gis so tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gis 'du shes sto/ ra pa ma ya ni gi/ 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 
29a4('bum): pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed gi stong pa nyid gis 'du byed stong pa ma yin gi/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyi/ nga 'du byed do// rna bar shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba
29a5('bum): shes pa stong pa ma yin kyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// myig gi stong pa nyid gis myig stong po ma yini gi/ myig nyid kyang stong pa nyid de/ 
29a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang myig go// rna ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba stong pa ma yin pa/ rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o/ sna'i stong pa nyid kyis sna stong pa ma yin gi/ sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 
29a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce'i stong pa nyid gis stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lus stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 
29a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyang lus so// yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gi/ 
29b1('bum): gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra'i stong pa nyid kyis sgra stong pa ma yin gyi/ sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o// dri'i stong pa nyid gis dri stong pa ma yin gyi
29b2('bum): dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dri'o// ro'i stong pa nyid gis ro stong pa ma yin gyi/ ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ro'o// reg gi stong pa nyid kyis reg stong pa ma yin gyi/ rig nyid kyi
29b3('bum): stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang reg go// chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos stong pa ma yin kyi/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos so// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis myig gi/ 
29b4('bum): rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang myig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gas rna ba'i rna bar shes pa
29b5('bum): stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rna bar shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i rnam par shes pa stong
29b6('bum): ma yin gyi/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sA'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ste nga pa nyid kyis lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin
29b7('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par she sa pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi rnam
29b8('bum): par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes
30a1('bum): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang / 
30a2('bum): stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin kyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa
30a3('bum): nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// sna'i stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg po
30a4('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg/ 
30a5('bum): pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyi da kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg sa
30a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshorab
30a7('bum): nyid kyis myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis chos
30a8('bum): ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 
30b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i/ 
30b2('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i cha rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba snod
30b3('bum): pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid
30b4('bum): kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin kyi / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang sto/ nga pa nyid do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o/ 
30b5('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa
30b6('bum): nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis sa'i khams stong pa ma yin gi/ sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sa'i
30b7('bum): kham so// chu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis chu'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// mye'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis me'i khams stong pa ma yin/ 
30b8('bum): gyi/ mye'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams so// rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis rlung gi khams stong pa nyi ma yin gi/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rlung
31a1('bum): rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa ma yin gi/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khamasas/ 
31a2('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// 
31a3('bum): ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis ma rig pa stong pa ma yin gi/ ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong
31a4('bum): pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyi da kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes
31a5('bum): pa'o// mying dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis mying dang gzugs s+ho/ nga pa ma yin gi/ mying dang gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mying dang gzugs so// skye mched drug gi
31a6('bum): stong pa nyid gis skye mched drug stong pa ma yin gyi/ skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go// reg pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ reg pa stong pa ma yin gi/ reg pa
31a7('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stod pa ma yin gi/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// srid pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sred pa stod
31a8('bum): pa ma yin gi/ sred pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa'i stong pa nyid kyis len pa stong pa ma yin gi/ len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang len pa'o// sring / 
31b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis srid pa stong pa ma yin gi/ srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba'i stong pa nyid kyis skye ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ skye ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang
31b2('bum): skye ba'o// rga shi'i stong pa nyid kyis rga shi stong pa ma yin gi/ rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste
31b3('bum): pa ma yin gi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
31b4('bum): pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyin pa nyid kyi nga stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid
31b5('bum): kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin go/ bzod pa/ 'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid// kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i/ brtson 'grus kyi
31b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyi da kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi/ 
31b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gi/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyi
31b8('bum): do/ stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
32a1('bum): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis nang stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gi/ nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 
32a2('bum): stong pa nyid da kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis phyi stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gi/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi stong
32a3('bum): pa nyid kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma
32a4('bum): yin gi/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis chen po stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gi/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa
32a5('bum): nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong // pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gi/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa
32a6('bum): nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ste nga pa nyid kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gi/ 2dus byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'dus
32a7('bum): byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gi/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa
32a8('bum): nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'ad/ 
32b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gi/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang thog
32b2('bum): ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gi/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dor ba myed pa stong
32b3('bum): pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin go/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa
32b4('bum): nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin/ rig/ chos thas cad stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid/ kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
32b5('bum): nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid de stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// myi dmyigs pa
32b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gi/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
32b7('bum): kyi stong pa nyid kyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis
32b8('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gi/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis dngos po myed pa'i
33a1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gi/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar bzhag
33a2('bum): pa'i stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar bzhig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba'i stong pa
33a3('bum): nyid kyis yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa ma yin gi/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ 
33a4('bum): rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams stong pa ma yin gi/ rdzu 'phrul kyi rkadang pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gi ka dang pa rnams so// dbang po'i stong pa nyid gis dbang po rnas
33a5('bum): stong pa ma yin gi/ dbang po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis stobs/ rnams stong pa ma yin kyi/ stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid de
33a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag gi stong pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnas stong pa ma yin gi/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi
33a7('bum): yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa ma yin gi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong/ 
33a8('bum): pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa ma yin gi/ 'phag sa bI
33b1('bum): bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan gyi stong pa nyid kyis bsam gtan rnams stong pa ma yin gi/ bsam gtan nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong
33b2('bum): kha nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad myed pa'i stong pa nyid kyis tshad myed pa rnams stong pa ma yin pa/ tshad myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshad myed pa rnams so// gzugs myingag/ 
33b3('bum): 'i snyoms par 'jug pa rna'i stong pa nyid kyis/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin ga/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid
33b4('bum): kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam so// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid gas/ rnam par thar pa rnams stong pa ma yi na ga/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyi
33b5('bum): rnam par tha rad pa rnams so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa ra 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mthar kyis gnas pa 'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong pa ma yin gi/ mthar gri/ 
33b6('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
33b7('bum): myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa/ 
33b8('bum): dang / smon pa myed pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna bar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa rnam so// mngon par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mngon par shes pa
34a1('bum): rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin gyi stong pa nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ ting nge
34a2('bum): 'dzin nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo'i stong pa nyid gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa ma yin gi/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang
34a3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnamaso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang
34a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams// myi 'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid da kyis myi 'jigs pa rnams stong pa ma yin gi/ myi 'jig/ sa pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang myi 'jigs pa rnamaso// 
34a5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa'i stong pa nyid gis so so yang dag par ra ga pa rnams stong pa ma yin gi/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa
34a6('bum): so/ snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid gis snying rje chen po stong pa ma yin gyi/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// snying pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas/ 
34a7('bum): chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rab 'byor nga 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa ste/ 
34a8('bum): rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'ibyang chub sems
34b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bstan pa 'di thos na/ myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur ro// bam po gsum pa'o/ 
34b2('bum): rab 'byor da kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gi sa yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 
34b3('bum): myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes nyen
34b4('bum): ni/ gang de la gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshu la gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
34b5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la/ tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
34b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dag
34b7('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gdod la 'du byed myi rtag ces bya bar de myi / 
34b8('bum): pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de/ 
35a1('bum): la rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
35a2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor da 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
35a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
35a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
35a5('bum): kyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan tha/ sa kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang
35a6('bum): de la 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
35a7('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed sdug sngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
35a8('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa sdug sngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i/ 
35b1('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' seMs
35b2('bum): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
35b3('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la tshor ba bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
35b4('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos da kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// 
35b5('bum): gang de la 'du shes bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyi gas pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tha ma sa cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
35b6('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
35b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i chub
35b8('bum): gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// 
36a1('bum): rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba/ 
36a2('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul/ 
36a3('bum): gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes
36a4('bum): zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos s+horten cing / dge ba 'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi snga
36a5('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba tham sa cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa/ 
36a6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rna
36a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
36a8('bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
36b1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams

36b3('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
36b4('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yo ngasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thos
36b5('bum): cad mkhyen kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar
36b6('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// 
36b7('bum): rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
36b8('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
37a1('bum): tshu ma tsha ldananapa dge ma ma nga na pa pa gtanas pa sa rgyas / sA sa rnas kyi mong su sngor gyi drug
37a2('bum): gangadas shes su rgyun pa myed kyis bya ba mye tsugs pa tshul gyi po chos so cing / dge ba rdzu ba sam cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pashi sa gtogs pa na pas kyi
37a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi mar yongs su stor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de sa du byed mtshan mi skyed ces bya ba de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gimi chos smon cing dge ba'i rdza ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mchen
37a4('bum): bya nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi/ sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gong des rnam pa pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
37a5('bum): chos rten nga/ dge ba rtsa pa mams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad basbyin pa nyid pa gtogs par na thos kyis 'am/ rang snas sa kyi sa mangs sbyor blo 'jug pa'o/ rab 'byor da gzhan
37a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i ba shes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs smon pa myed ces bya bar de myid myigs pa'i tshul gis nas ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tu
37a7('bum): rnam bya thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan pos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su spyor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor bya smon pa myed ces bya ba de m+b+hi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
37a8('bum): chos ston cing dge ze'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi so 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ro la'i su sngor myi 'jug pag gdod la 'dun sa sngon / 
37b1('bum): ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gris chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
37b2('bum): pa'o// gang de la 'du byed ston pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
37b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
37b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes nyen
37b5('bum): ni/ gang de la gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de mi// dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tham/ sa cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
37b6('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba

37b8('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// 
38a1('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// klung de la rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba skyed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyu
38a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cheno//

38a5('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams rgyud mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor gyi 'jug pa'i// gang de la 'du shes dben nas bye bar de myi dmyigs pa'i rgyul ni/

38b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thas cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad

38b6('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// 
38b7('bum): gang de la lce myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
38b8('bum): kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
39a1('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang

39a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngar myi 'jug po'o gang de la sdug sngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
39a6('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce sdug sngal zhes bya bar de myi/ 
39a7('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
39a8('bum): lus sdug bsngal zhes bya bar dri myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyisaH
39b1('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'dug pa'o// gang de la yid sngag stsal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di ma gtogs par rnyen/ 
39b2('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang la myig bdag myed ces bya
39b3('bum): bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi
39b4('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba bdag myed ces bya bar de mying dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos
39b5('bum): kyi sa 'amate rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mya 'a drug pa'o// gang de la sna bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyi gas pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thas cad kyang rnam
39b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa lo/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i
39b7('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
39b8('bum): ba'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mya 'jug pa'o// gang de la yA/ 
40a1('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi/ 
40a2('bum): sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston
40a3('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnab
40a4('bum): zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rto gas par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yos
40a5('bum): su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i zhes bya bar de myi dmyig sa pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams ca// da kyang / rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyand
40a6('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ste na cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
40a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus zhi zhes bya ba de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
40a8('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
40b1('bum): chos ston cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub seMs/ 
40b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs/ 
40b3('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thas cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
40b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyadas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gdod la sna stong zhes/ bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba
40b5('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs
40b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus stong/ 
40b7('bum): zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa
40b8('bum): gang de la yid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis
41a1('bum): yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
41a2('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba mtshan ma myed ces bya
41a3('bum): bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'o/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// 
41a4('bum): gang de la sna mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi sa chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thas cad kyang / rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang
41a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug po'o/ gang de la lho mtsha na ma myed ces bya bar da myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rna ba thams cad mkhyen
41a6('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus mtshan myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thos
41a7('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
41a8('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan
41b1('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thos
41b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa/ 
41b3('bum): ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la sna smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
41b4('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 8 sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la skye
41b5('bum): smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston ci / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
41b6('bum): kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus sman pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
41b7('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// ga de la yid smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
41b8('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig mdo
42a1('bum): par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
42a2('bum): yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
42a3('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rna ba thams
42a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce mngon pa der 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gas chos ston
42a5('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa/ nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus mngon par 'du
42a6('bum): bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yongasu sngor/ 
42a7('bum): myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
42a8('bum): sa la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs
42b1('bum): pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba dben zhes bya
42b2('bum): bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de lo sna
42b3('bum): dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasasu sngor myi 'ju// 
42b4('bum): pa'o// gang de la lce dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis da chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thas cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang spangs
42b5('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus dben zhes bya ba ri de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
42b6('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
42b7('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la
42b8('bum): gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
43a1('bum): sngor gyi 'dug pa'o// gang de la snga m+b+hi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs mar nyan thos na
43a2('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'drug po'o// gang de la dri myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnab thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtog
43a3('bum): par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
43a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rangs sa rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rig myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dani/ 
43a5('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thas cud kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mato/ gas par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos myi rtag ces bye bar de mi dmigs
43a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor dgazhi/ 
43a7('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs sdug sbrul zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang ma
43a8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra sdug sngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston ci/ 
43b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sku 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri sdug sngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa
43b2('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro sdug sngal zhes
43b3('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// 
43b4('bum): gang de la reg sdug sngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tham ngas cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
43b5('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos sdugasngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston/ cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thas cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
43b6('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sder yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzug
43b7('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
43b8('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bkyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
44a1('bum): ba/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i/ 
44a2('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / 
44a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos so// 
44a4('bum): cig dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyo len pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgya nyes kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos bdag myed
44a5('bum): ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi
44a6('bum): 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen no/ gang de la gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
44a7('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
44a8('bum): gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri zhi zhes
44b1('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug
44b2('bum): pa'o// gang de la ro zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
44b3('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thas cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
44b4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs
44b5('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi// 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sa mas dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs
44b6('bum): slong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos sbyin cipo dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngod/ 
44b7('bum): myi 'dug pa'o// gang de la sgra stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgya
44b8('bum): kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
45a1('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
45a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thos cad
45a3('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston
45a4('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ cha rang sang ngas rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub
45a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mtshan ma myed ces bya ba ra de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / 
45a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / 
45a7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi
45a8('bum): dmyags pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang
45b1('bum): de la ro mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
45b2('bum): sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs par/ 
45b3('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thas cad kyang / rnam pa
45b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug po'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
45b5('bum): bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
45b6('bum): par nyan zas kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
45b7('bum): ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
45b8('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la re smon
46a1('bum): ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
46a2('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
46a3('bum): thos gi sa 'amo/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngar mya 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
46a4('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chubab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnye sngon ni/ 
46a5('bum): gang de la gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad da kyang / rnam pa thos cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
46a6('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang du la sgra mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
46a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang la dri mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thos
46a8('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
46b1('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar
46b2('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang dude la
46b3('bum): chos mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
46b4('bum): sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
46b5('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams ca nad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sa// ngas rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra dben
46b6('bum): zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma go/ gas par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mo sa su
46b7('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge bya'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
46b8('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thong/ 
47a1('bum): kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
47a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
47a3('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
47a4('bum): chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
47a5('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ra yongs su sngor myi 'jug po'o/ gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
47a6('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa myi rtag
47a7('bum): ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
47a8('bum): myi 'jug pa'i// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog
47b1('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
47b2('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshu
47b3('bum): gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor
47b4('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la myug gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
47b5('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma ga togs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yod/ sa su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
47b6('bum): sdug sngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos sto/ cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
47b7('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug bya'o// gang de la sI'i rnam par shes pa sdug sngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
47b8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug po'o/ gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
48a1('bum): chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang
48a2('bum): de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa la
48a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug sngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
48a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug/ pa'o// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
48a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / 
48a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
48a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
48a8('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
48b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
48b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
48b3('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
48b4('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
48b5('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'ju/ ga pa'o// / bam po bzhi pa'o
48b6('bum): rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i ban sa gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa ni zhes bya bar
48b7('bum): dmyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge 'ang ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyisar mongs su spong
48b8('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos/ 
49a1('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
49a2('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa
49a3('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
49a4('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
49a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mya 'jug po'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i chul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / 
49a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan tho sa kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
49a7('bum): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i'o bshes gnyen na/ gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
49a8('bum): pa nyid ma gtog sdo mar nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bor de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi sas ston ci
49b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa la thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes bya stong
