49b2('bum): zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sra 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongasu
49b3('bum): sngor myi 'jug po'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
49b4('bum): prer nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yod/ gas su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
49b5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgya sa kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid
49b6('bum): kye rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
49b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su stor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni// ga nas myig gi rna pAr zhes pa mtshan mying sa
49b8('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thas cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug po'o/ gang
50a1('bum): de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
50a2('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
50a3('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
50a4('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
50a5('bum): stond cingadage ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cadamakhyend pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de
50a6('bum): la yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
50a7('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// / rab 'byord gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de myig gi rnam par shes pa smond pa myed ces
50a8('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi bsngor myi
50b1('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
50b2('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
50b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
50b4('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyisana'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
50b5('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa NA mas cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa / ma/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
50b6('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
50b7('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa mngon par shes 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
50b8('bum): tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
51a1('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas la
51a2('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
51a3('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'i// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing
51a4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de lha'i lus kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par
51a5('bum): 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos/ sto nad cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tha ma sa cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi ser 'am/ rang sangs
51a6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
51a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i nya shes
51a8('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
51b1('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
51b2('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
51b3('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am// rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
51b4('bum): chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sa sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam
51b5('bum): par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis tshe// sa stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams/ cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
51b6('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
51b7('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byorarang 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor/ 
51b8('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
52a1('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ 
52a2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs so sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
52a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen dang nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang nga la lce'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba myed ces pa'i chu/ 
52a4('bum): kyis chos su nad cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam par thams cad kyi mkhyen pa nyid ma gto gas par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam
52a5('bum): par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
52a6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams/ 
52a7('bum): cing mkhyen pa nyid mi gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su sngor mo 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bgos gnyen no// 
52a8('bum): del chog gi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de myi rigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cong mkhyen po nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas
52b1('bum): sa tho 'ag pa/ nga de ni nam na na byed gas pa nul skyes nas kyid du ga snang nga rdzu 'ang sa skye du
52b2('bum): na tha~Ms kyis ra da sas rgyas kyis yongs su bcwo skye gyu 'o// gad ltam rnam pa shes pa shin nas myi na gas pa'i nus kyis chos sbyin pa pa ma
52b3('bum): thams cad ma khyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos s+ho so'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par she pa byed nas bya bdud dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis rlon
52b4('bum): cing dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad kA mkhyen dang nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de lus kyi rnam par shes pa de ban nas
52b5('bum): bya byar nga myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam
52b6('bum): kho shes 'doben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsab thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gdugs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
52b7('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor dade 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge pa'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
52b8('bum): dge pa'i be shes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog
53a1('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus
53a2('bum): te reg pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
53a3('bum): myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
53a4('bum): sa 'amarang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
53a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis/ 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag myed b+har+ya de myi dmyigs pa'i
53a6('bum): tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de
53a7('bum): la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag myed ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
53a8('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
53b1('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// 
53b2('bum): gang de la rtsa ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
53b3('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang la de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs
53b4('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya b.rad de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
53b5('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog sa par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ma ngas su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg
53b6('bum): pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
53b7('bum): myi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par
53b8('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// / rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa
54a1('bum): spyong zhes bya myi dbyigs pa'i nus kyis chos sngon cing / dge d+hA ba thams cad bad+d+ha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su
54a2('bum): byor myi 'jug par// gdong la zla ba'i 'dus te dag pastong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / ngage bu'i rtsa ba thams cad kya / rnam pa rnams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
54a3('bum): thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis mongs su snor myi 'jug pa'o/ gang ma snga'i rgyus te reg pa stong nyis bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshus rgyas chos ston cing / dge po'i rtsa ba thams spyad kyang rnam
54a4('bum): thams chungs sbyin pa ting sa gtogs par rgan thos kyis rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su sbyor gyi 'jug pa'o// / dngos sgo'i 'dus ga pa nas byung de sbyi smyigs pa
54a5('bum): nus kyis nu thams spyo bya/ b+hathams rnyeng ma gyun pa nyid ma gshegs pa nan gyis kyi/ sa 'am/ nga sangs rgyas kyis mo sa du por myi 'dug pa
54a6('bum): gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
54a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sor yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa 'o// gang de la yod kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar yid myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston ng+ge/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / nam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs
54a8('bum): kyi kyis ya/ sa sa ma rgyas kyi mangs su kyi 'drun la byor ga'anas byang chu mas dang sems tsha po shes gtan/ rgyug gi su
54b1('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la na
54b2('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
54b3('bum): su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par
54b4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / 
54b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ darang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dalus kyi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
54b6('bum): tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi
54b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
54b8('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
55a1('bum): ge chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i
55a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
55a3('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs/ 
55a4('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su so// dar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge
55a5('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus
55a6('bum): te reg pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
55a7('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
55a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ya rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
55b1('bum): po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs
55b2('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
55b3('bum): ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar
55b4('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// 
55b5('bum): gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya b.rade myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa bathams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad ma gtogs par nyan thos
55b6('bum): kyi sa re/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
55b7('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang nge la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed/ 
55b8('bum): ces bya ba ring myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams nyid mkhyen panyid ma gtegs par nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su na
56a1('bum): myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
56a2('bum): chos skyon cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes
56a3('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sra 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug par
56a4('bum): gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
56a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce/ 'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis// chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
56a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ribe na zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / 
56a7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar
56a8('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor/ 
56b1('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i tha shes gnyen ni gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i
56b2('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi rtag
56b3('bum): ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sar 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
56b4('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stonang cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
56b5('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
56b6('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang po nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi
56b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs
56b8('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
57a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ram/ yongs su sor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bya ba shes
57a2('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
57a3('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thos
57a4('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nganyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la A'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
57a5('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend ba nyid ma gtogs par mnyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
57a6('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa los byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
57a7('bum): mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
57a8('bum): gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi
57b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis
57b2('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi 'bus te reg pa las
57b3('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
57b4('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshu la gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
57b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sang kyis rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sA'i/ 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag myed ces bya bar de mi
57b6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug par
57b7('bum): gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
57b8('bum): sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsho ra ba bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
58a1('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
58a2('bum): pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
58a3('bum): su myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi/ gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
58a4('bum): chos stond cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te
58a5('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam da pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis
58a6('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bzhi zhes byabar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dag pa'i
58a7('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
58a8('bum): bzhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
58b1('bum): myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya ba re myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
58b2('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sto nang cing
58b3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa
58b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myigagi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
58b5('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
58b6('bum): tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
58b7('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
58b8('bum): yongs su sbyor myi 'jug pa'o// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pas sna rnam par dag pa/ sna rnam par dag pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa ste/ de ltar na lam gi rnam pa shes
58b9('bum): stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
59a1('bum): nyid rnam par dag pa dang // gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
59a2('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
59a3('bum): tha thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya ba/ 
59a4('bum): do myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tha ma sa cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
59a5('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma myed ces bya bar
59a6('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// 
59a7('bum): gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par
59a8('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing
59b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i chor
59b2('bum): ba mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
59b3('bum): su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
59b4('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs dasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
59b5('bum): tshul gyis chos sto nad cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
59b6('bum): pa'o/ rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshu
59b7('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtags par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus
59b8('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
60a1('bum): sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de lta sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rje
60a2('bum): ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs/ 
60a3('bum): ba'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus
60a4('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa myed ces bya/ bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba mas cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par
60a5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
60a6('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byorarang gzhan
60a7('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i reg pa'i rtsa ba shes gnyen ni// gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bye ba myeng ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
60a8('bum): gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyad thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngar myi 'jug pa'o gang de la rna ba'i dus
60b1('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs
60b2('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngar ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gri/ 
60b3('bum): chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid mi rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i
60b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs pa
60b5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung dpa'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
60b6('bum): pa'i tshul gri chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sra 'am radwa sangs rgyas kyi sar
60b7('bum): yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg po las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gris chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
60b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
60b9('bum): dge ba shes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul chos ston cing / dge ba'i ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
61a1('bum): mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba de ban zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs
61a2('bum): pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus
61a3('bum): tereg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
61a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dra sa te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de myi da myigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thas
61a5('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rnam par dag ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sder myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung
61a6('bum): ba'i tshor ba de dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshu chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa / 
61a7('bum): yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad ma
61a8('bum): pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya bas// 
61b1('bum): bam po lnga pa'o// // rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba/ 
61b2('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
61b3('bum): yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sdug sngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
61b4('bum): mkhyend pa nyid rnam par dag pa 'di ma rtogs par nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs/ 
61b5('bum): ba'i rdul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / ma pa thas cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rnyog par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
61b6('bum): yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'a byung ba zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thos
61b7('bum): cad mkhyen de pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos
61b8('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing
61b9('bum): 'brel par 'byung ba mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos
62a1('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
62a2('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thas cad mkhyend pa nyid mya rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed
62a3('bum): ces bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor/ 
62a4('bum): myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dben zhes bya b.re dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtog
62a5('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu ste/ ra myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang
62a6('bum): de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de myi de myigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos
62a7('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsab thams
62a8('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid me rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gong de la mthod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya
62b1('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bres rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// 
62b2('bum): gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos
62b3('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyin pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
62b4('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi/ 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'bre shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
62b5('bum): ba myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ste na cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
62b6('bum): kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor du gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug sngal zhes bya bar de myi
62b7('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chas ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// 
62b8('bum): gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug sngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyen
63a1('bum): kyi sa 'amag rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sdug sngal zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thos
63a2('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid me rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug sngal zhes bya ba
63a3('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rgya ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ri yongasu sngor mi 'jug
63a4('bum): 'o// sal masam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa sdug sngal zhe ras bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtog
63a5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'dug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa smrag/ sngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston
63a6('bum): pa thams / rnam thams cad ma khyen pa thaMd mas pa na sa kyis / na sa pa kyis nga du stor myi ga // 'i rgyu nanas du
63a7('bum): pa na jis sbyin pa sa tu phyin pa rgya 'di rdzogs pa chu 'i ma pa
63a8('bum): thams cad sa byed panyid ma rtogs par sa sa ngas sacas kyi ra mi ma 'i gyi 'jug pa su rnams kyi kyi pa mas kyi sem 'i sbyin
63b1('bum): ba'i nul gis chos ston cing / dge rtsa ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod
63b2('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gris chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
63b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus gi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos sten cing / dge ba'i rtsa thams cad kyang / rnam pa
63b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bas gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa bdag myed ces bya bar demyigs
63b5('bum): tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rno pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyis te'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sder myi 'jug pa'o// gang de
63b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gri chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
63b7('bum): kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'dug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni zhes bya bar de myi dmyigra pa'i tshul gri chos son
63b8('bum): ni ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang / rna pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtog par nyan thos kyisa'i/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'dug pa'o// nga dis tshul khrims kyi pha ros tu phyin pa zhe nas bya kying byig nus khri chom sto ci
64a1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin/ 
64a2('bum): pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi
64a3('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
64a4('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa zhi zhes bya ba/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
64a5('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi gajug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa
64a6('bum): zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug
64a7('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i
64a8('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya bar de
64b1('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo ba myi 'jug go/ gang de la bzod pa'i
64b2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
64b3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
64b4('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de lta bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i// 
64b5('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs na par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar sngor myi 'jugapa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong zhes bya bar
64b6('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// 
64b7('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bu shes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
64b8('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug go// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa mtshan ma myed ces bya
65a1('bum): bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ 
65a2('bum): gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan ma myed pa ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
65a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
65a4('bum): pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma rngatshan myed pa ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
65a5('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rto/ gas par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
65a6('bum): phyind pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
65a7('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa smond pa myed pa ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
65a8('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha
65b1('bum): rol tu phyind pa smon pa ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
65b2('bum): myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
65b3('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
65b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rangs sa rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsamapa/ tan gi pha rol tu phyin pa smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyig/ 
65b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
65b6('bum): shes rab tu ro mang tu sbyin pa ston pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stonang parjing / dge ba'i smra ba rnams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad pakhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyi thos kyis 'am/ rangs
65b7('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par 'du byed pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyig
65b8('bum): nga'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul
66a1('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
66a2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
66a3('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge
66a4('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed
66a5('bum): ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam par thams cad mkhyen/ pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
66a6('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
66a7('bum): mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyi
66a8('bum): pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa dben pa zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen du pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis
66a9('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i
66b1('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'aya/ rangasas rgyas kyis yongs su stod myi 'drug pa'o// ga de la ga'od du'i ma rom tu nang pa dber zhes bya ba myi myigs pa'i chus kyis chos ston cing / dge ba'im
66b2('bum): ga ya myed gags pa da ma thos / ngas sa rgyas kyi ngas su hU~M gyu 'o// ba yom na kyi ma pa
66b3('bum): myur gas pa'i dum rgyas chos sto pong // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams pa byu / rnam pa thams cad ste sbyidan pa nyid ma rtogs par byen thos kyis ya/ rangs sa rgyas kyis yongs su sngo myi 'jug pa'o/ 
66b4('bum): de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben zhes bya bar de dmyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
66b5('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dben zhes bya b.rade myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
66b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes
66b7('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la ning stong pa nyid myi gtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'du/ 
66b8('bum): pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su/ 
67a1('bum): su 'jug 'o// nga des kyi slong ba nyid byi ces bya rgyu phyogs pa'i dus rgyas chos ston cing / dge na smra nga/ rnam pathams sa byed pa nyid pa gtogs
67a2('bum): myi dbyugs tshus kyis rgyam sto nang/ nga/ mas yang skye po'ingam gtogs nithos kyis la/ sa sa rgyas kyis mi sgyus pa smos
67a3('bum): pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'o tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
67a4('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya ba nga myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen rgyu nyid
67a5('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dag
67b1('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya ba
67b2('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// ga
67b3('bum): la ngor myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rangs
67b4('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis tshe/ ngas stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
67b5('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi'am/ rangs sa rgyas kyisar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang des rtso sa thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rta ga ces bya bar de myi dmyigs kyi
67b6('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan ci
67b7('bum): blo ga ces bya ba de phyir byigs pa'i rgyal rgyas chos ston kyang / dge ba'i sa pa thams cad byung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs por nyan thos kyis 'am/ rangs sa rgyas
67b8('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
68a1('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'gyur 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing
68a2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmig/ 
68a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su myi sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed
68a4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i brtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 8
68a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su stor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor da gzhan yang nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes pa nyin ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid sdug sngal ba zhes bya bar de myi darig
68a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyir stong pa nyid
68a7('bum): sdug sngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
68a8('bum): myi 'jug pa'o// gang des phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal ba zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston ming / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyen thos te/ 
68b1('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug sbal ba zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
68b2('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid sdug sngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
68b3('bum): stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong
68b4('bum): nyid sdug bsngal ba zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos s+ho// nad cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
68b5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigasapa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
68b6('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang ma de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug sngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyig
68b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
68b8('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug sngal ba zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis
69a1('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i
69a2('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes
69a3('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi/ 
69a4('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
69a5('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos tham sa cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs
69a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ gang
69a7('bum): de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
69a8('bum): sa 'am/ rang sas rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid ra sdug sngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i
69b1('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid
69b2('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
69b3('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal ba zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
69b4('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid da sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
69b5('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor/ 
69b6('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
69b7('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
69b8('bum): chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar
70a1('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'ju/ 
70a2('bum): pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
70a3('bum): sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
70a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
70a5('bum): stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am ra/ sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
70a6('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
70a7('bum): sa rlos kyi ngas su snor gyi drug s+ho/ gangs lums byas stong nyid dag da kyis bya ba myigs 'i tshus kyimachos smon nga / da thathamasas d+ha/ rnam pa
70a8('bum): bang myo pa zhid ma gtonas cho kyis gyis 'ang/ 'angs sa rgyas kyis rings su du'i gyi dug go// gang des mtha'ams 'das pa song pa nyi bdag rtsesas bya ba 'i chu phyogs
70b1('bum): gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog
70b2('bum): ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
70b3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa
70b4('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'o/ ma/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su ma sngor myi 'jugapa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag myed pa ces bya bar
70b5('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
70b6('bum): su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
70b7('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston gyi
70b8('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ nga sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi stong pa nyid bdag myed ces
71a1('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
71a2('bum): sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bdag srid ces bya ba ring myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston bcib nadage bya'is pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad kyi bye dang/ 
71a3('bum): nyid ma gtogs pa nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rangasangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su sngor myi mjug pa'o// gang sa de sa ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag myed ces bya ba tshad myi myigs pa'i tshum gyis chos skyon cing
71a4('bum): na pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa sams cid mabyed do/ cing ma gangags ma thos kyis 'i sa na kyi ma yongs su song myi 'drug bya'o// gleng de ma mi bskyed / 
71a5('bum): che bo 'i stong pa nyid bdag byed ces bya ba myi byigs tshul gyomachos son cing / dge bam sa carnam pa byang cung pa byed pa nyid ma gtogs 'a ba
71a6('bum): sa 'i ngas smrab nga 'o// myo gnan ltung ru sems sa khyen po rig na gad nga badzin nas bya b.rang
71b1('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid no zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis
71b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni zhes bya bur de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
71b3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid ni skyes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge
71b4('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyiskyed ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid
71b5('bum): zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston midage ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyenanyidame gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'amaH/ rangs sa
71b6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyidazhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigasapa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thasas
71b7('bum): cad kyangarnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs pa nyan thos kyi sa 'amarang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
71b8('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyis sengs
72a1('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thos
72a2('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs bre'i tshul gyis
72a3('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba myed pa stong ltan zhi zhes bya
72a4('bum): bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs// 
72a5('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni zhes bya bar de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos son cing / dge ba'i pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid mngam/ 
72a6('bum): bar nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
72a7('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
72a8('bum): tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang nges
72b1('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi na
72b2('bum): tshangs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par
72b3('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang skye yongs su sngar byi 'dug pa'o// gang del tso nyid skang po nyid zhe zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul rgyas chos rgan cing / dge ba'i rtsab thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
72b4('bum): pa nyid rnam rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed pa 'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
72b5('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngar mya 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gnan
72b6('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes panyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rna
72b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mya 'jug pa'o// gang de lo phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston rdzo/ 
72b8('bum): dge ba'i bya bathos cad kyan ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid martags par nyan thos kyis la/ rang sangs rgyas kyis snor ma 'jug pa'o// gang drol phyi nang gong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba de mya dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston/
