73a1('bum): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba
73a2('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po
73a3('bum): snang ba nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu snga
73a4('bum): myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar da myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
73a5('bum): kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i chu/ la gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
73a6('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas snang zhes bya bar ngo myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sngon cing / dge ba'i
73a7('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos snyan
73a8('bum): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi so 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
73b1('bum): stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi
73b2('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
73b3('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
73b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sad rangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos tham sa cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
73b5('bum): chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang
73b6('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
73b7('bum): yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma ga/ 
73b8('bum): bar nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sor yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid snang zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
74a1('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs
74a2('bum): ba'i tshul gyis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rna ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos
74a3('bum): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa le/ rang sangs rgyas
74a4('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngar myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gshen ni/ gang de la danang stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de mi
74a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs pa// nyan thos kyi sa 'o/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor
74a6('bum): myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar ngo ma dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thas cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos rgya
74a7('bum): sa le rangs sa rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'i/ gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar da myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tham
74a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan nyid ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
74b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi
74b2('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la don dam pa stong
74b3('bum): nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngon
74b4('bum): myiSh+Tha 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces/ bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'o// rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
74b5('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yod su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma tshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
74b6('bum): stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa
74b7('bum): stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
74b8('bum): sngar mi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pas
75a1('bum): cag dan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang dopor ba myed pastong pa nyid mtshan ma myad ces bya ba de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / 
75a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sang sangs su sngar myi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / 
75a3('bum): dge pa'i rtsakha thams cadas kyang rnam pathams cadas khyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyos 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su sngar mo 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de rgyu
75a4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis le/ rang sangs rgyas kyi srar yongasu sngar myo 'jug pa'o// sa
75a5('bum): la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar ro mi dmyig/ sa pa'i tshul gyis chas ston ning dge ba'i cha thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis
75a6('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gong de la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
75a7('bum): cad ma khyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan pas kyis yong su stor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngas pa myed pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma myong ces bya bar de myi myigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge bo'i rtsa ba mams
75a8('bum): nga kyang rnam pa mas cad ma byin pa nyid mi gcin pa por nyan mas kyis 'a/ rang sos rgyas kyi sar so su sdong mo su myi 'jug po'o// gang rol dum nyid song sa nyid mtshan ma med sa
75b1('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de
75b2('bum): la dngos pa myong ba'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rdzab thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa la
75b3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gnon yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid sminang pa myed ces bya bar myi
75b4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs parathos kyi sa'i/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi
75b5('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid smon pa myed ces bya ba rang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
75b6('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang snang de nyid sman pa mang ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
75b7('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyon thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la stong pa nyid snang ba nyid smon pa med ce
75b8('bum): bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug / 
76a1('bum): la chen po stong pa nyid smon pa myed ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
76a2('bum): rangasangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i nul gyis chos snyan cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen bzhi
76a3('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du basmra/ smon pa med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba rtsa pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa
76a4('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong banyid smond ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
76a5('bum): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa zhi dam gtogs pa ro nyan zas kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi cho sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las
76a6('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis
76a7('bum): kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sor yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tham
76a8('bum): ched kyang / rnaM ma thams cad ma byon pa nyid mi gtogs par nyan pas kyis ma/ rang sangs rgyas kyo sa yongs snga myi 'jug to'o/ gang des dngobo med pa snang ba nyid smon pa myed ces bya ra myi dmyigs
76b1('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid
76b2('bum): smond pa myed ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rmi ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
76b3('bum): pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid smond pa med ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
76b4('bum): kyi sa 'i rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gong de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid smond pa med ces bya bar de myi da / myigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
76b5('bum): cad mkhe kyang / rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// ga de la myi dmyigs pa'i stong pa nyid smond pa med ces bya bar de myi
76b6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba zas cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'amo/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ gang de lo dngos po ma ba smo
76b7('bum): pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thas cad kyang rnam par thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// 
76b8('bum): gdo de la ngo bo nyid snying po nyid smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams nad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi/ 
77a1('bum): sa yongs su sngor myi 'jug 'arjod pa gang de la dngos po myed pa'i ngobo nod stong pa nyid smond pa myed ces bya bar nga myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rna ba thams ca
77a2('bum): nakhye nad pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'amanarang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la na
77a3('bum): stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsab thams cad mkhye nad na/ gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngar myi
77a4('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang ro la phyi stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba me dad ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston de cing / dge ba'i rtsa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gdags
77a5('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'a drug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mngon pa ra 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
77a6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rno ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
77a7('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thas cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi cho sar yongasu sngar mi 'jug pa'o// 
77a8('bum): gang de la chen pa stong tha nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar dam po myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
77b1('bum): thos kyi sa 'am rab sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sngond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
77b2('bum): cad mkhand pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya bar myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
77b3('bum): stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ gang de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya bar med ces bya ba
77b4('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rdza ba yo thamasacad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang
77b5('bum): de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba ra de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stand cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'o
77b6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rna ba thams cad mkhyen
77b7('bum): ba nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dar ba med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thas cad ca
77b8('bum): mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jig pa'o gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sngoston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thags
78a1('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang pa nyid dam par dag ma tshugs par nyan thos kyi sa 'amarjing sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang
78a2('bum): la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtog par nan te/ 
78a3('bum): kyi sra 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston ci
78a4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid marton/ nyes par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi dmyigs
78a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ce bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rnam rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
78a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngon myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa bu thams
78a7('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen do pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ro yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'i// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces rgyu
78a8('bum): bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o
78b1('bum): gang de la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thas cad mkhyend pa nyid martog
78b2('bum): pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'juga'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyeni/ gang de la nang
78b3('bum): stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar dmye dmyingasu pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs nyan thos kyi sa 'am / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mo ma
78b4('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la hU~M stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mchog par nyan thos kyi sa la
78b5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la nang stong pa'i dadaben zhes bya ba mede myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
78b6('bum): da mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rangs sa rgyas kyi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
78b7('bum): gri chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtog par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid
78b8('bum): dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gri chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsal thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
79a1('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad/ kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis
79a2('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar sa yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ches ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ 
79a3('bum): nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang // 
79a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ dang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de lnga// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs sde
79a5('bum): tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang
79a6('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yosu
79a7('bum): sbyor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba myed stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos
79a8('bum): kyis 'am/ nga sangs rgyas kyisar yong su sngor mi 'dug pa'o// gang des rang bzhin go sa nyid par zhes bya ba dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams sa
79b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i ba tshul gis ches ston cing
79b2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sder myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar
79b3('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang des
79b4('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
79b5('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'i/ gang de la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben zhesabye bar du myigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa/ nye ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par
79b6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa tha
79b7('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge
79b8('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rnam rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
80a1('bum): chen po'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
80a2('bum): ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug sngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
80a3('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sbyor myi 'jug pa'i// gabya dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyin
80a4('bum): ba'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa thams cad kyang rnam pa pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa
80a5('bum): nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sa
80a6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
80a7('bum): pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de lo dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos cing
80a8('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
80b1('bum): rnams sman pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i rdul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
80b2('bum): sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa the
80b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos
80b4('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
80b5('bum): sgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston ci / dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sang sangs rgyas
80b6('bum): kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gris chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
80b7('bum): pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug sngal zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston
80b8('bum): rke ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag myed
81a1('bum): ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
81a2('bum): kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
81a3('bum): ma rnyog par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sngor mi 'jug pa'o// ga de la yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thos
81a4('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs kyi sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong bya rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs bri
81a5('bum): tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rna thams cad cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'a ma rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngon myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
81a6('bum): yang dag par spong pa rnams ston pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi/ 
81a7('bum): 25/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ri yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'i// gang de la yang dag par spong ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / ba'i rtswa zla ba
81a8('bum): kyang / rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs ni
81b1('bum): tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag pa
81b2('bum): spong pa rnams sgom pa'i phyir dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / rga ba'i bu thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad kyang / mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
81b3('bum): yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// // bam po drug pa'o// // gang de la rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
81b4('bum): gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs pa nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sor yongasu sngor myi 'jug

81b6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyig pa'i tshul gri chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
81b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gri rkang pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
81b8('bum): gis chos ston cing nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya bar je myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
82a1('bum): ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyenod pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de l+ya rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de/ 
82a2('bum): myi dmigs pa'i tshul gri chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rna ba thas cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams smin
82a3('bum): ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gri chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang
82a4('bum): lardzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gri chos ston cing / rke ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mong

82a6('bum): kyi sar yongasu sbyor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnaMs skye ba'i phyir de myi dmagla pa'i tshul gri chos ston cing che ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang // rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtog par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
82a7('bum): kyis yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gri ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba thas cad kyang / rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rengs
82a8('bum): rgyas kyi mar yong su sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams sug sngal zhes bya bar myi dmyi gra ba'i tshul gri chos ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ma nyid su rlog par na thon
82b1('bum): byas 'a sangs rgyas kyisar yongs sngor myi 'dug pa'o grang de la dpung po rnams bdas mye ces bya ba kyi myigs pa'i chul gri chos ston meng dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byung rnam pa bsgos kya sa myed kyings
82b2('bum): bar nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de sa dbang po rnas ni zhes bya ba ring myi dmyikra pa'i tshul gri chos ston cing / rke ba'i rtsa ba thos cad kya / na pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rdom pas
82b3('bum): tan thos kyi sa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gri chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thas cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtas
82b4('bum): bar nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sor yongasu sngor mi 'jug/ pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnas mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dmyigs pa'i tshul gri chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thas cad kyang / rna pa thams cad
82b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma rtog ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o gang de lo dbang po nas smon pa myed ces bya ba de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gris chos ston cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba zas cad kyang / na pa thos
82b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtog par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi slar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams mngon pa 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmi glo ba'i tshul gri chos ston cing dge 'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
82b7('bum): thas cad kyang mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs pa nyan thos kyi sa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gri chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thas cad kyang / rna ba thas cad mkhyen
82b8('bum): nyid ma rnam par nyan thos kyi sa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sngor myo 'dug po// gang de la dbang po rnas sgo ba'i phyir de myi dmig bu'i tshul gros ston cing / rke ba'i mo bams cad kya ng+ge ba zas cad mkhyen pa nyid ma Dom+ba pA nyan thos kyis 'am
83a1('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gto/ 
83a2('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
83a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa can thos kyis 'am/ rang sas rgyas kyis ma mu sngor kyi 'jug klung de sa sa rnams kyadas kyang ces bya bar dmyi myags pa'i rnas namam ston cing/ das
83a4('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad pa khyen pa nyid ma gtogs dranyan rjod kyis 'an ngas pa rgyas kyis sa su gyi 'jugagrang de la po nachos ni zhes bye bar myi byigs pa'i tshul
83a5('bum): rjem sun cing / dge ba'i rtsa tha thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams/ cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas rgya sar yongasu sarba ya sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la slobs nas
83a6('bum): spong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul giso chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidadi ma gtogs par nyon thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'dug can
83a7('bum): gang de la spobs rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bor de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sar 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
83a8('bum): sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams smon pa myed ces bya bar ri myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gas chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
83b1('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sor yongs su sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
83b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
83b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs mamanyan thos kyi sa 'am// rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams sgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
83b4('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de myi
83b5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba tha/ mas cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi/ das 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// 
83b6('bum): gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gas chos ston cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis
83b7('bum): 'am/ oMrang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag med ces bya bar de myi dmyags pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam bathas
83b8('bum): cad mkhyen po nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing
84a1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong
84a2('bum): zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de
84a3('bum): la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gas chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
84a4('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams s+ho/ nu ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
84a5('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi// 'jug pa'o/ gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
84a6('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang
84a7('bum): nub kyi yan lag rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gsi chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis/ 
84a8('bum): mi su thor kyi 'dug pa'o// gang des bya dus kyi yan lagan ma sgom pa'i phyi kyi byigs pa chul gzimam snyad cing dge ba'i ma bas cad kya sa bathams cad pa byen pa dis gdog su pa da tho / 
84b1('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'dug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / mAH
84b2('bum): ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
84b3('bum): tshul gis chos ston cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am \u0f7f rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i la yan lag phyar
84b4('bum): ba bdag med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing // rke ba'i rtsa ba thes da kyang rnam pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogasadar nyan thos gis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu so
84b5('bum): myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yang lag brgyad bzhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / rke ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnaM ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
84b6('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
84b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / 
84b8('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
85a1('bum): brgyad pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa nyid ma gtazhan thos kyis 'am/ rang sa sa
85a2('bum): dargyas kyisar yong su seM mi 'jug pa'o// gdodos 'phags pa'i sam yan lag brgyad pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing // dge ba'i chub bam
85a3('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i la yan lag brgyad pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyig
85a4('bum): ba'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thas cad kyang rnam pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa le/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'a#

85a6('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar

89a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha rad pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gas chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad

89a4('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha rad pa rnams smon pa medaces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
89a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rangs ngas rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha rad pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya
89a6('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
89a7('bum): snor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha rad pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis tshis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'dim
89a8('bum): gtogs par nan chos gi sa'am mang sangs rgyas kyisar yong su sngor mi 'dug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thad pa rnams rnam bu phyi mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis nas ston cing/ na/ 
89b1('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la mthar/ 
89b2('bum): gags gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa
89b3('bum): nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtharang gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul
89b4('bum): gas chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam rab thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa
89b5('bum): gang de la mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang gu bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis tshe/ sa ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam
89b6('bum): ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar dgas gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgun
89b7('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mo
89b8('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa tham
90a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mtshan ma
90a2('bum): myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad kyang mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yo/ 
90a3('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gong de la mthar de gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu smon pa myed ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
90a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mngon par 'a
90a5('bum): bya ba med ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams ca/ da mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs/ 
90a6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gas chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
90a7('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la mthar da gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
90a8('bum): pa dgu sgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
90b1('bum): sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i/ 
90b2('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa
90b3('bum): nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gas chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
90b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon
90b5('bum): ba med pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i chul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa b+ha thams cad kyang rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa'i
90b6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'its+tsha s+t+waM gis chos ston
90b7('bum): cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi lnga la gtogs pa
90b8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu ster mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha ra pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan mo med pa dang smod pa med pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos stan cing/ 
91a1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tham
91a2('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang ston pa med pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang nam+b+ha b+hU thams cad mkhyen
91a3('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smyon pa med pa ston
91a4('bum): pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos s+ho na cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thamasacad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
91a5('bum): rang sangs rgyas gi ser yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya
91a6('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
91a7('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar da pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
91a8('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar da pa'i sgo stong pa
91b1('bum): nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs/ 
91b2('bum): par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs par tshul gis chos ston cing // 
91b3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad malen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sngor mi 'jug po'o/ gang de la mngon par
91b4('bum): pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
91b5('bum): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'ju ga pa'o/ gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing
91b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnas
91b7('bum): zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang ma ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
91b8('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
92a1('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pan
92a2('bum): tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang
92a3('bum): de ma mngon par shes pa rnams ston pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
92a4('bum): sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'dag pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par 'a/ bya ba med ces bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis
92a5('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
92a6('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang
92a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams sgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad na
92a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing
92b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting 'dzin rnams sdug bsngal zhes/ 
92b2('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug ste/ 
92b3('bum): gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ 
92b4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad

92b6('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams
92b7('bum): mtshan ma yod ces bya ba 'amang / mtshan myed ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis ches ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
92b8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
93a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul

93a3('bum): rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos s+ho na cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
93a4('bum): yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams s+ho/ ma pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
93a5('bum): gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// ga de la gzugs go sgo rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / 
93a6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs gi sgo
93a7('bum): rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
93a8('bum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs gi sgo rnams bdag med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gas chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

93b4('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs gi sgo rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma

93b6('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams ca da kyang mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs
93b7('bum): gi sgo rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am
93b8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs gi sgo rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
94a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs gi sgo rnams sgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston ma

94b4('bum): nyan thos gi sa le/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston
94b5('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs
94b6('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
94b7('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
94b8('bum): par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ma 'jigs pa bzhi mo rtag ces bya bar de myi rta dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
95a1('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi 'jigs pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi phyi/ 
95a2('bum): pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gded la myi 'ji
95a3('bum): pa rnams sdug bdag med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
95a4('bum): sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnam sa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
95a5('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sarayong su sngor myi 'jug pa'irang sangs rgyas kyi sar/ gang de la myi 'jigs pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs
95a6('bum): pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi 'jigs
95a7('bum): ba rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
95a8('bum): kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi 'jigs pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gas chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
95b1('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi 'jigs pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / 
95b2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi 'jigs pa rnams dben
95b3('bum): zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor/ 
95b4('bum): myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi 'jigs pa rnams sgom pa'i phyi ra/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gas chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gtogs
95b5('bum): bar nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor/ myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing
95b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnas
95b7('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu/ 
95b8('bum): sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gtog
96a1('bum): bar nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
96a2('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mos yang dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi
96a3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad kyang rnam pa pa mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de/ 
96a4('bum): la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba tha/ mas cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
96a5('bum): thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug ba'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa med ce sa bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
96a6('bum): thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med/ 
96a7('bum): ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
96a8('bum): pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par na
96b1('bum): nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
96b2('bum): cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po mi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
96b3('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po sdug
96b4('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
96b5('bum): yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po bdag/ myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston gyi/ nga / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rno ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
96b6('bum): gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad/ 
96b7('bum): kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gri
96b8('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po mtshan ma/ 
97a1('bum): myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs
97a2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po smon pa med ces bya bar myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad
97a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
97a4('bum): gris chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sa ngas rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying
97a5('bum): rje chen po dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos/ ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams/ cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ 
97a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la ste/ nga rje chen po sgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
97a7('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos
97a8('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre/ 
97b1('bum): ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i rgyal gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi cho/ 
97b2('bum): sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
97b3('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge
97b4('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gto/ dgas par nyan thos kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de del sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi
97b5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan tho sa gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// 
97b6('bum): gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gis
97b7('bum): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
97b8('bum): ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa le/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de myi dmyig
98a1('bum): ba'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de las
98a2('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'o// rang sangs rgya
98a3('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas kyi chos chas ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
98a4('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyenangan pa nyid sgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / 
98a5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang byang chub sgom pa'i phyi
98a6('bum): de myi dbyigs pa'i tshul gas chos sngon cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa nyan thos gos 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// 
98a7('bum): bam po// / rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems pa'
98a8('bum): po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du shes par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen des yongasu zin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di thos na/ mi 'dzags kyi
98b1('bum): sdang skrag par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byorod kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol
98b2('bum): tu phyind pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing sdang la skrag par 'gyur zhing / thabs mi mkhas ste/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu lhung zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gis yongasu spangs pa lags/ bco ldan
98b3('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
98b4('bum): par/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom zhing dmyigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa dang / 
98b5('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom zhing dmyigs te/ bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyinid pa des rlom semasu byed pa dang nga / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
98b6('bum): par/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa sgom zhing dmyigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa des rlom semasu byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ bzod
98b7('bum): ba'i pha rolod tu phyinid pa sgom zhing dmyigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa des rlom semasu byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyin/ 
98b8('bum): bsgom zhing dmyigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa des rlom semasu byed pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mdo par/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinid pa sgom zhing dmyigs te/ 
99a1('bum): sbyid pa'i ma song du tsund pa des rlos sems su byed pa de ga khun/ rab 'byung dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi sa mamong tu bu ning du phyid pa la spyod pa'i thabs mi mkhas
99a2('bum): bar rig par gyi'o// rab 'byor dganan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha yod tu phyind pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi la bya ba skyed pa
99a3('bum): gzugs na stong gnas bya bar med pa mye // dmyigs pa'i rdul gas pa dmang stong ba ny-id kya myigs pa/ snong banan gyis kyang rnam sems byed do// de shes kyi mad tu phyin pa la nga
99a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs phyi stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyin/ sa pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong po nyid kyis kya
99a5('bum): rlom sems su byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i de la bya ba myed par/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
99a6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
99a7('bum): yid la bya ba myed par gzugs stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes
99a8('bum): rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong
99b1('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid le bya ba myed par/ don dam pa stong / 
99b2('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa zas/ 
99b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
99b4('bum): semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod nga pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la/ 
99b5('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas
99b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
99b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs thog ma dang tha ma med
99b8('bum): ba stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang rlom sems dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin
100a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba med pa stong pa
100a2('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs rang bzhi
100a3('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
100a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa/ ra/ gzugs chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la bye/ dade/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
100a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do/ de shos rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs rang gi man
100a6('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
100a7('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
100a8('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par gzugs dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes
100b1('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
100b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sa su
100b3('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
100b4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// ngarab 'byorard gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
100b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gri
100b6('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sa ma su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 
100b7('bum): tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
100b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
