101a1('bum): rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid
101a2('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
101a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba chen po snang pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom ses
101a4('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pade'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
101a5('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid / kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
101a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ 
101a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba 'dus ma byas
101a8('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
101b1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das
101b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ra lod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
101b3('bum): ba myed par/ tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
101b4('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba dor ba med pa
101b5('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul/ gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
101b6('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin
101b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
101b8('bum): myed par/ tshor po chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// 
102a1('bum): ji shes rab kyi pha rosong tu phyid pa ma spyod pa'i che/ rna pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di dang ldan pa'i yidas byu ba med par/ tshor pa rang gi ma tshan nad stong ba zhes bya ba ma yi la byed de/ phyi
102a2('bum): gis dang nga byed da byeng rtsigs pa/ gleng pa di kyis kyi rjes sem su rnyed/ sa kyi pa ma du phyind pa la snang ba che/ rnam bcoms cad mkhyod pa da
102a3('bum): bu'i yingal bya ba myed par/ tshor ba myi dmyigs pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i numi gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// 
102a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha'i mang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pasam sa cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa myed par/ tshor ba dngos po myed pa spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byedade/ dmyig
102a5('bum): pa'i tshul gas dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna tha thams cad mkhyen pa
102a6('bum): nyi dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tsher po ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// 
102a7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa med par/ tshor ba dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
102a8('bum): pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi
102b1('bum): phyi rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba med par/ 'du shes nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed na/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyi/ 
102b2('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du shes phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid
102b3('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnamo semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
102b4('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du shes phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yi/ da la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang nga dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
102b5('bum): rab kyi phar long tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du shes stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
102b6('bum): gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ra lad tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yidas bya ba
102b7('bum): bar/ 'du shes chen po srung ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dbyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnamo sem su byed / de shes rab kyi pha rom tu phyinang pa la
102b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du shes don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis
103a1('bum): rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du shes 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yin
103a2('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
103a3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du shes 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sa su/ 
103a4('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la/ bya ba med par/ 'du shes mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya ba/ 
103a5('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
103a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du shes thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gristi thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang
103a7('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du shes dor ba med
103a8('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba med pa/ stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa
103b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du shes rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa
103b2('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rald tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du shes chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya/ 
103b3('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha yod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tham
103b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du shes rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyig
103b5('bum): stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed / de shes rab kyis mamothong du phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam patham cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'dunas
103b6('bum): myi dmyigs pa grong lazhes bya bar ma dril byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gas sbyi dmyigs pa spong po nyid kyang dmyigs la/ sbyong ba nyid kyis kyang rlos sem su byed de/ de shes rab kyi par 'a ju
103b7('bum): kyi spyod pa'i ma/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'id dang ldan pa'i yongs bya ba skyed por/ 'du shes dam bzod pa skyong pa zhes bya bar med la byed de/ dbyigs pa'i nul gis dam ze med po
103b8('bum): da kyang dmyigs pa/ spong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed/ de shes rab kyi par yod tu nid pa la spyod ba'i mi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yongs bya ba med par/ 
104a1('bum): shes tho za nad stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas nga ma nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlos sem su byed do// de zhes rab kyi ma chom tu phyin pa sa sa/ 
104a2('bum): ba'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed ba med par/ 'du shes dngos po myed pa'ingo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmi mi myed/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas dam po med kyi
104a3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// rab 'byor gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha ra lod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
104a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gri/ nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
104a5('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'irnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rmi/ dpar/ 'du byed phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs/ 
104a6('bum): pa'i tshul gis phyi na stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
104a7('bum): ba med par/ 'du byed phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
104a8('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
104b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed chen po stong pa zhes bya/ 
104b2('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
104b3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do/ 
104b4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
104b5('bum): gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyi/ sa kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
104b6('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed 'dus byas stong pa ni sa bya bar yid la byed do/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis phying rlom sem su byed/ 
104b7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
104b8('bum): tshul gas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
105a1('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis/ 
105a2('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 
105a3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolong tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
105a4('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed rang bzhin stong pa/ zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhi ngan stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sas
105a5('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid
105a6('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
105a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
105a8('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes
105b1('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
105b2('bum): ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ 
105b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
105b4('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid da kyang dmyigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba tham
105b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du bye// de dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la bye// dade/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
105b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha ra lod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
105b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ nang stong pa
105b8('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya ba
106a1('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha lod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
106a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
106a3('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid/ 
106a4('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
106a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
106a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// shes rab kyi pha ra lod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa don
106a7('bum): dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod
106a8('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid
106b1('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par
106b2('bum): shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
106b3('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ 
106b4('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / 
106b5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa thog/ ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang
106b6('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par/ 
106b7('bum): ba dir ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gAs dor ba meng pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dang ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs ma
106b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlos som su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha/ nam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid ma bya ba med par/ rnam po shes pa rang can/ 
107a1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhini stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la
107a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gas chos thams cad
107a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid gis kyang rlomo semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
107a4('bum): rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyi dad kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed
107a5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa ra/ rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar
107a6('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
107a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
107a8('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 
107b1('bum): rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
107b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 
107b3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// rab 'byord gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
107b4('bum): po dri shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba me dad par/ myig nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
107b5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
107b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// 
107b7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gri/ 
107b8('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med/ 
108a1('bum): par da myig stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes
108a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ myig chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po
108a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa
108a4('bum): mig don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
108a5('bum): rolo tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
108a6('bum): tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid gis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyinang po la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
108a7('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ myig 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// 
108a8('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mig mtha' las 'odas pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
108b1('bum): pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
108b2('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba skyed par/ mig zog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlos/ 
108b3('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ myig dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
108b4('bum): dmyags pa'i tshul gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la de stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pharold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
108b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig rang ba zha ni stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gi sa rang bzhini stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
108b6('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha lod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mag chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar
108b7('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
108b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyid kyang dmyigs la/ 
109a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig myi dmyigs pa stong / 
109a2('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas
109a3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ myig dngos pa myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigaso la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyis rloms
109a4('bum): sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mi da par/ myig ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
109a5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs/ la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shwe/ rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
109a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig dong sa po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
109a7('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// rab 'byo'o gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
109a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byedado/ 
109b1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed pa/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gos phyi sa/ 
109b2('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba phyi/ 
109b3('bum): nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
109b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mye da par/ rna ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la
109b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi/ pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad/ rna mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba chen
109b6('bum): po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
109b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa
109b8('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar
110a1('bum): mid pa byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlos sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ma/ 
110a2('bum): rnams cad sakhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la byed pa skyed par/ rna ba 'dus ma byas sring ba zhes bya bar yi la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i nus gis 'dus ma byas grang ba nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong ba
110a3('bum): kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro lod tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya
110a4('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das/ pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlo ma sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolong tu phyinang pa la
110a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi da la bya ba myed par/ rnab thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis tho'o// 
110a6('bum): mo dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mi
110a7('bum): la bya ba myed par/ rna ba dor ba myed pa spong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes
110a8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang
110b1('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed/ 
110b2('bum): bar/ rna ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed de/ de shes rab kyi
110b3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
110b4('bum): pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro/ lad tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
110b5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba myi dmyig/ sa pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
110b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ra lod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba dngos po
110b7('bum): med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
110b8('bum): byining pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna bo po bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas ngo ba nyid
111a1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs pa/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi phar mod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan cas/ 
111a2('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ rnab dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa'i ziT nad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
111a3('bum): kyang rlom sem su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha ro lod tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa tshe
111a4('bum): ma bya ba med par/ snga nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la / de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigadas la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes ra
111a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
111a6('bum): gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
111a7('bum): la bya ba myed par/ sna phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi
111a8('bum): rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas stong pa
111b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
111b2('bum): myed par/ sna chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
111b3('bum): po la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa
111b4('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
111b5('bum): par/ sna 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed// de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong po nyid kyi/ nyeng dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// 
111b6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rolo tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ni ma pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa myed pararo// sna 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags
111b7('bum): pa'i tshul gris 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
111b8('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
112a1('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
112a2('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod/ 
112a3('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs/ 
112a4('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna rang bzhin stong pa zhes
112a5('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gsi rang bzhin sto/ da pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom se/ ma su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i
112a6('bum): tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas chos thams cad stong pa
112a7('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro lod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 
112a8('bum): sna rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi
112b1('bum): ro lod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sna myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs
112b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
112b3('bum): par/ sna dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab
112b4('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna ta ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul/ 
112b5('bum): gas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol/ da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
112b6('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
112b7('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
112b8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed deng / dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
113a1('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha yod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyag
113a2('bum): pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
113a3('bum): la bya ba myed par/ lce phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha
113a4('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
113a5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis/ kyang rlom semasu byed do// dashos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ da pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
113a6('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// 
113a7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
113a8('bum): gas don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rarolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan ci
113b1('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ lce 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do/ de shes rab/ 
113b2('bum): kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus
113b3('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlo mo semasasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
113b4('bum): myed par/ lce mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yi da la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gAs mtha' las 'ad rnas pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
113b5('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa 'i yid la bya ba myed par/ l+ya thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhe
113b6('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
113b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
113b8('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 
114a1('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gsi rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
114a2('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
114a3('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
114a4('bum): tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
114a5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyi
114a6('bum): kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
114a7('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / 
114a8('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
114b1('bum): rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmyigs pa'i tshul
114b2('bum): gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomo semasu byed do// rab 'byorod gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu
114b3('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
114b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus phyi stong pa zhes bya ba
114b5('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang da/ migs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
114b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par lus phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la ba nyid kyang dmyigs
114b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi phar yod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus stong pa nyid stong pa zhes
114b8('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rna mo sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas
115a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom ste/ 
115a2('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
115a3('bum): tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
115a4('bum): bya ba med par/ lus 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
115a5('bum): ra lo tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus 'dus ma/ byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
115a6('bum): gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin dad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
115a7('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
115a8('bum): semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar
115b1('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rno ba thams
115b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
115b3('bum): sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
115b4('bum): pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong / pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro// lad tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ 
115b5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gri chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyi/ 
115b6('bum): kyang rnamo semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
115b7('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed du/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma
115b8('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
116a1('bum): rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
116a2('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
116a3('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
116a4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan dpa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed
116a5('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// / bam po// 
116a6('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
116a7('bum): ma na du spong ba zhes bya bar yid byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas nang slong ba nyid kyang dazigs so/ stong ba nyid kyis kya rmig sems byed // dgas pakyi la tu byung pas sna bam/ 
116a8('bum): cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba yod par/ yod gyi stong pa zhes bya bar yo la byed de// dmigs pa'i tshul gas kyi song pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong banyid kyis kyang chum sems byed de/ rjen
116b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la myed par/ yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas phyi nang stots+tsha pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ 
116b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid spong ba nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
116b3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
116b4('bum): bya ba myed par/ yid chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs lang stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
116b5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan// pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid don dam pa stong pa zhes/ bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa zhes
116b6('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha ra lod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid 'dus byas
116b7('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
116b8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gos 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
117a1('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya ba
117a2('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
117a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong
117a4('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid dor ba med pa
117a5('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis do ra ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa
117a6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
117a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid chos thams cad stong pa zhes
117a8('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
117b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid rang gi mchan nyidi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gsi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmya gas la/ stong / 
117b2('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ra long tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
117b3('bum): la byed do/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad maskye
117b4('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
117b5('bum): kyang rnam semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi phar long tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid ngos nyid stong pa zhes bya
117b6('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
117b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
117b8('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byorod gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas
118a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang chos
118a2('bum): semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sa spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs phyi stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
118a3('bum): pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la/ 
118a4('bum): bya ba med par/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigatshangs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi/ 
118a5('bum): pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma// khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs s+ho/ nying pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gri
118a6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
118a7('bum): gzugs chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod/ 
118a8('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam cu stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
118b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin lam spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
118b2('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i nul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha yong tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
118b3('bum): ldan pa'i yod la bya ba myed par/ gzugs 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gos 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// 
118b4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid bya ba myed par/ gzu gas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
118b5('bum): pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyi/ gas la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de n+de kye rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
118b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs po'i tshul gis theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ 
118b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs dor ba med pa stong pa
118b8('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dar ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna 'a thams
119a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
119a2('bum): semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
119a3('bum): pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
119a4('bum): la bya ba myed par/ gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bayid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid/ stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom so su/ 
119a5('bum): byed da do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
119a6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
119a7('bum): po'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// 
119a8('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
119b1('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byedade/ de shes rab kyi pha lold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 
119b2('bum): gzugs dngos po me pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gsuM b+h+yo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed de/ rab 'byor gzhan yang / 
119b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
119b4('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
119b5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sgra phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong / pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu
119b6('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sgra phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gis phyi
119b7('bum): nong stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par// 
119b8('bum): sgra stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad pa'i
120a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sgra chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
120a2('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sgra don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
120a3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / 
120a4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu
120a5('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// 
120a6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
120a7('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid/ 
120a8('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sgra thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya
120b1('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
120b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sgra dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
120b3('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasu byed dodo// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
120b4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
120b5('bum): po nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra chos tham sa cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i chu la gos chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa
120b6('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
120b7('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
120b8('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang
121a1('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra dngos po
121a2('bum): po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod/ 
121a3('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sgra ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
121a4('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sgra dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
121a5('bum): bya bar yid la byed sde/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
121a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
121a7('bum): pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa
121a8('bum): dri phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thos
121b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ dri phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//

121b3('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri chen po stong pa
121b4('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu bye dado/ de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
121b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa/ 'i tshul gas don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid

122a1('bum): ral tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas mtha'/ 
122a2('bum): las 'das pa stong pa zhes nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
122a3('bum): myed par/ dri thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
122a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ dri dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyamyigs pa'i tshul gis
122a5('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i

122a7('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ dri chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa
122a8('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri rang gi mtshan
