122b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyi
122b3('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ dri dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
122b4('bum): pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong da pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / 
122b5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ dri ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do/ 
122b6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dri dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
122b7('bum): tshul gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed de/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab kyi pha
122b8('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ro nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
123a1('bum): nga'ag/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ro phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
123a2('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
123a3('bum): par/ ro phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
123a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ro stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
123a5('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mye da par// ro chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
123a6('bum): pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyi sa kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
123a7('bum): bya ba myed par/ ro don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
123a8('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ro 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ 
123b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ro 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
123b2('bum): dmyags pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
123b3('bum): ma bya ba myed par/ ro mtha'i kyis 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed de/ de shes rab/ 
123b4('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenangan pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ro thog ma dang / tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
123b5('bum): gsi thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod po'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
123b6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ro dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor bu myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
123b7('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ro rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa
123b8('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ro chos thams cad stong
124a1('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
124a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ro rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
124a3('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ro mi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
124a4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
124a5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ro dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gi/ sa dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
124a6('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ro ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyig
124a7('bum): pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid sto pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la/ 
124a8('bum): bya ba myed par/ ro dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// 
124b1('bum): rab rtso dganan yang byung nub sems da' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi ma mamo d+hA ldand pa ma myod ba'i sa/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang dran pa'i sadris bya ba med par/ regan na ste
124b2('bum): bya bar yi la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas n+yang stong banyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed / de shes rab kyi par mod du phyind pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ rnam tha thams cad mkhyen pa
124b3('bum): dang ldan tha'i yod la bya ba myed par ge bya slong ba zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis kyi stong po nyid kyang dmyigs so/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom skyes su byed / de shes rab kyi pharom
124b4('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba myed par/ reg phyi nang stong pa zhi/ bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid
124b5('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 
124b6('bum): reg stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyidri stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la/ 
124b7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong
124b8('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar
125a1('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
125a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
125a3('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
125a4('bum): tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyi da kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha romad tu/ phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
125a5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg mtha' las 'das pa ste// ting pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
125a6('bum): kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg thog ma dang tha mo med pa stong pa zhes
125a7('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
125a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong
125b1('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid/ 
125b2('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par mas cad ma
125b3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
125b4('bum): sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi da la bya ba myed par/ rig rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
125b5('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la
125b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang
125b7('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg dngos po med pa
125b8('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
126a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa/ 
126a2('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhe/ 
126a3('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
126a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol/ da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chos nang stong pa zhes
126a5('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gsi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
126a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chos phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
126a7('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba myed par/ chos phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
126a8('bum): rlom gas phyin spong ba nyid kyang phyogs san stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlos sems byed // rishes rab kyi pha ma tu byin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang sngon pa'i yi ma
126b1('bum): bya ba myed par/ chos stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
126b2('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chos chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kya
126b3('bum): dmyigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
126b4('bum): chos don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gris don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
126b5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lnga/ na pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chos thams ca 'dus byas/ stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
126b6('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kye nga rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa le spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
126b7('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ chos 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// 
126b8('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chos mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
127a1('bum): gas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
127a2('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chos thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyang
127a3('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chos dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
127a4('bum): dmyags pa'i tshul gas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong panyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
127a5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chos rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin s+ho// nga pa nyid kyang dmyags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu
127a6('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chos chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
127a7('bum): pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
127a8('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ chos rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes
127b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chos myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs
127b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 
127b3('bum): chos dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa
127b4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chos ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar mi da la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
127b5('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 
127b6('bum): chos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyidi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlob sem su byed de/ de shes
127b7('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gis
127b8('bum): por shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rgyang/ 
128a1('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
128a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa
128a3('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
128a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
128a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro/ lad tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/ nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi rnam par shes
128a6('bum): pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
128a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la
128a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sam su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stos/ 
128b1('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
128b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong
128b3('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa
128b4('bum): sdang ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
128b5('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gri
128b6('bum): thogo ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
128b7('bum): ba myed par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa don pa med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de zhes/ 
128b8('bum): rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gi
129a1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la/ 
129a2('bum): bya ba myed par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed/ 
129a3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
129a4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyig sa la/ stong pa nyid kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ra lod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
129a5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ myig gi rnam par shesas pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyi gas pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ 
129a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po
129a7('bum): med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod ci
129a8('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
129b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po
129b2('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang
129b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nang stong
129b4('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
129b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i// rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmyags pa'i tshul gas phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyags la/ 
129b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol de tu phyind pa la spyod po'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam por phye nang stong
129b7('bum): pa zhes bya bar spyod la byed de/ dpyugs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ sbyong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed / de shes rab kyi phar mod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa mas
129b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stsong pa
130a1('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlos semasas byed// de zhes rab kyi royong tu phyid pa sa spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ na pa'i rnam pa shes pa chen no/ 
130a2('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
130a3('bum): cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
130a4('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan dpa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'dus byas
130a5('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gsi'/ dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyi nga rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la
130a6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas
130a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// do shes rab kyi pha lod tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rdzu'i
130a8('bum): rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes

130b2('bum): pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
130b3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes po dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
130b4('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan dpa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong

130b6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed / 
130b7('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
130b8('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rang // R+shi gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs lag stong pa
131a1('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa stong /
