131a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pharo/ dald tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi du dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa // 
131a5('bum): bopo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gi sa ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis/ kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/ 
131a6('bum): bu'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa/ 
131a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang phyogs so// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// / sa so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen mo ni
131a8('bum): rab kyi pha yod tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa na stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i du rje/ 
131b1('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyamyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
131b2('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa
131b3('bum): li spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gas nang stong pa nyid
131b4('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
131b5('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar yad la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang da migs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// 
131b6('bum): de shes rab kyi phar ldod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa chen po skyong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
131b7('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shos rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam po thams cad mo khyen
131b8('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i ya la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
132a1('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'dus
132a2('bum): byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i
132a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang
132a4('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
132a5('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya ba ra yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'ang sa pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
132a6('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa theg ma dang tha ma med pa
132a7('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la
132a8('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid/ 
132b1('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha lod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ snga'i rnam pa / 
132b2('bum): pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
132b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs/ 
132b4('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam par shA
132b5('bum): pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyig sa pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes ra
132b6('bum): kyi pha ra yod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
132b7('bum): tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha lod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
132b8('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dbyugs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myod pa stong pa nyid kyang rnamags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang chu
133a1('bum): sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid/ 
133a2('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
133a3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas ngo bo nyid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang
133a4('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
133a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyi gas pa'i tshul gas nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
133a6('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pho rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid
133a7('bum): la byed de// dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
133a8('bum): pa'i yid la byed de/ ba med par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// 
133b1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lha'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
133b2('bum): tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol ngo tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
133b3('bum): par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind/ 
133b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam sa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya
133b5('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa/ nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su// byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
133b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid
133b7('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i rnam par
133b8('bum): shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomo semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyin dpal
134a1('bum): spyod pa'i chong rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di dang ldan pa'i yi la bya ba med par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gri/ 
134a2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
134a3('bum): bya ba myed bu malce'i rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
134a4('bum): kyang rlom sems su byung ngo // de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi/ da la bya ba myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dor ba myong
134a5('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byedad/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis do ra ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin/ 
134a6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
134a7('bum): tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba/ 
134a8('bum): myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// 
134b1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
134b2('bum): tshul gas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
134b3('bum): su bya ba srid par/ lce'i rna bar shes pa rashA na 'tshan mi dmigs pa myong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
134b4('bum): sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myi/ dad par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhe/ 
134b5('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
134b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ 
134b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dngos po
134b8('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan
135a1('bum): sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pa ma tu banid pa la spyod pa'i di/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi dang ldan pa'i yidi la bya ba byed par/ rgyus kyi rnam par shes pa
135a2('bum): nang stong ba zhes bya bar song la byed de/ dumags pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams ca
135a3('bum): khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba myong bar/ mus gi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong panyid kyis kyang rlom semasu
135a4('bum): bye di/ de zhes rab kyi pha ba tu spyospyod pa la spyod pa'ing/ num rab thams cad mkhyen pa 'di dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa lus gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang spang ba zhes bya bar yid la byed do// 
135a5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang sring bo nyid kyang dmyigs la/ snying pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pharo/ lud tu phyini pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sme shes rabakyi par rdzob tu phyid/ 
135a6('bum): la myod 'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mabyod pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myod pa'o/ lus kyirnam par shes pa stong po nyid steng ba zhes bya bar yid mi byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis snyi
135a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 
135a8('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa chen po steng ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nod kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su bye dang / de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin das
135b1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshus gas don dam pa stong pa ni/ 
135b2('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi rnam par
135b3('bum): shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod/ 
135b4('bum): ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas s+ho/ dang pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas 'dus
135b5('bum): ma byas stong pa zhes nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kya/ nga rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
135b6('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
135b7('bum): kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha lod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba myed par/ sus kyi rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
135b8('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
136a1('bum): rnam parnams ca ma byed pa 'di dang ldan pa'i yid su zla ba myed par/ sras kyi rnam par shes pa rlong ba med pasnod pa zhes bya bar sa sa byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul ga ma dong ba med pa stong ba'i
136a2('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong banyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shis rab kyi phar lang tu phyind pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus gi rnam pa
136a3('bum): shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la
136a4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus go rnam par shes pa/ chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i chu/ 
136a5('bum): gos chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi
136a6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus gi rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong
136a7('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la skyed pa'i tshernam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi/ 
136a8('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind
136b1('bum): bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas dngos
136b2('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha ra lod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba me
136b3('bum): ba rau/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes ra
136b4('bum): kyi pha rarolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
136b5('bum): bar yid la byedod/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// rab 'byorard gzhan yang byang chub
136b6('bum): sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid gi rnam par shes pa nang stong
136b7('bum): ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tham
136b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
137a1('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba'i med par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa
137a2('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyi nid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
137a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong
137a4('bum): kha nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha ra lod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye/ na pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes
137a5('bum): kha chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa 'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyin
137a6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dor ba myed pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
137a7('bum): gris don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
137a8('bum): myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes
137b1('bum): rab kyi pha roro tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid gi rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i/ 
137b2('bum): tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yin
137b3('bum): la bya ba med par// yid gi rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
137b4('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba me dra par/ yid gi rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes/ 
137b5('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
137b6('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid gi rnam por shes pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas ngar ba myed pa stong pa
137b7('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid gi rnam par
137b8('bum): shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i na
138a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid gi rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa/ 
138a2('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes
138a3('bum): pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
138a4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa/ 
138a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem/ su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa
138a6('bum): yid gi rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab
138a7('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi/ 
138a8('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dbyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyining pa la spyod pa'i cha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myeng ba'i/ 
138b1('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// 
138b2('bum): rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg
138b3('bum): pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
138b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi/ 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyig/ zhes pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
138b5('bum): kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la skyo da pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya
138b6('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da / 
138b7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid sa kyis kyang rlom sems
138b8('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
139a1('bum): pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i/ 
139a2('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// 
139a3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
139a4('bum): tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyi dad kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin da pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
139a5('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'du sa ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
139a6('bum): semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid/ 
139a7('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs lang / stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
139a8('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang
139b1('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dor ba skye
139b2('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de shes ra / 
139b3('bum): kyi pha rarolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas rang
139b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ myig gi
139b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang / dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi
139b6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
139b7('bum): tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
139b8('bum): bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes
140a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
140a2('bum): tshul gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med/ 
140a3('bum): par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
140a4('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan dpa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
140a5('bum): pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor dag zhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab
140a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa
140a7('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang po la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg
140a8('bum): pa phyi stong po zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong po nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
140b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom/ 
140b2('bum): semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
140b3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
140b4('bum): la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// 
140b5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams/ cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba 'i 'dus te reg pa nang don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 
140b6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
140b7('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus byas sto te reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
140b8('bum): byed do// de shes rob kyi pha rolong tu phyin po la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
141a1('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ra lod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
141a2('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su
141a3('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
141a4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyi/ dgas la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
141a5('bum): ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa de/ ra ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa 'i tshul gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
141a6('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid
141a7('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
141a8('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa nya zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas ches thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems/ 
141b1('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya ba/ 
141b2('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
141b3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sas
141b4('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam da ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med padar/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
141b5('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyi/ gas la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
141b6('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gos ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byeng/ 
141b7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
141b8('bum): pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
142a1('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas nang stong pa na/ 
142a2('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
142a3('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod
142a4('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya b.rad yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas phyi nang stong pa nyid
142a5('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de zhesarab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ snun
142a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la nastong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// 
142a7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
142a8('bum): tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
142b1('bum): myed par// sna'i 'dus te reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes
142b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 
142b3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi phu rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / 
142b4('bum): ljon pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byos stong pa zhes nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
142b5('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang // ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa
142b6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig sa pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// 
142b7('bum): rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te rig pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
142b8('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog mo dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
143a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ 
143a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong/ 
143a3('bum): pa zhes bya bar gyur yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams/ 
143a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'a// dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yad la bya// dade/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
143a5('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams ca mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus
143a6('bum): te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
143a7('bum): phyi nid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs
143a8('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro lad tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ snga'i
143b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyining
143b2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
143b3('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
143b4('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyi/ nas kyang rlom semasasu byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems
143b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyor pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
143b6('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
143b7('bum): ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyad
143b8('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
144a1('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la/ 
144a2('bum): khyed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid/ 
144a3('bum): la bya ba myed par/ sro'i 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha ro long tu phyin/ 
144a4('bum): ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa myed par/ sde'i 'dus te reg pa don dam pa stong pa des bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa
144a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 
144a6('bum): lce'i 'dus te rig pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
144a7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang
144a8('bum): dmyigs la na stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'a
144b1('bum): kha stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la bya'o// dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid du kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
144b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang
144b3('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dor ba med pa stod/ 
144b4('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba myi dad pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kying rlom/ semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
144b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med/ par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
144b6('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod depa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad
144b7('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
144b8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ 
145a1('bum): slong ba nod kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma byedan pa nyidi dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sde'i 'dus te reg pa myi dbyigs pa
145a2('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
145a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
145a4('bum): kyang rlom semasu sbyor/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
145a5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
145a6('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg po dngos po mye da pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa
145a7('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sim su byed do// bam go// / bcupa'o// rab 'byor dganan yang byang chub sems
145a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha lod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
145b1('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
145b2('bum): ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa
145b3('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus gi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yangad la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi ning stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
145b4('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
145b5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
145b6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa chen po stong po zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid
145b7('bum): kyang demyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol do tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidi dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus
145b8('bum): reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
146a1('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid
146a2('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
146a3('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i/ 
146a4('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das
146a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem/ su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
146a6('bum): par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
146a7('bum): sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dor bu med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
146a8('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
146b1('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu
146b2('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
