146b4('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshadon nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
146b5('bum): kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmyagri
146b6('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasam su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
146b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
146b8('bum): ma/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ra lod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnga za nyid chung / 
147a1('bum): ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro yod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams/ 
147a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
147a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do/ rab 'byord gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i/ 
147a4('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas nang stong pa nyid kyang nga myigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed de/ de shes rab
147a5('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te/ reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gri/ 
147a6('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba med par/ yid gi 'dus te/ 
147a7('bum): reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong po nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thos/ 
147a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
147b1('bum): rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yad kyi 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
147b2('bum): pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyig su myed do// lnga stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha lod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pan
147b3('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gos den dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha sod tu phyin pa la
147b4('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya/ dar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi/ 
147b5('bum): dmyags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams ca da mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus/ 
147b6('bum): te rig pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyad 'i
147b7('bum): che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das bstong da/ 
147b8('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha long tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg bzhi/ 
148a1('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod/ 
148a2('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba med pa
148a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus/ 
148a4('bum): te reg pa rang bzhini stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyig/ das pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ s+ho// nga pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyin
148a5('bum): ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa chos tham sa cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos
148a6('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid
148a7('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
148a8('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa
148b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus
148b2('bum): te reg pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
148b3('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
148b4('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te/ 
148b5('bum): reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// / 
148b6('bum): rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi 'dus
148b7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
148b8('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan po'i yid la bya ba med par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i nul gis phyi stong pa na
149a1('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ myig gi/ 
149a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi
149a3('bum): riying tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
149a4('bum): pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ dang pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro// lang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
149a5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mag gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa
149a6('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba don
149a7('bum): dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe
149a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa sa/ mag gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid
149b1('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mig gi 'dus te reg
149b2('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralong tu
149b3('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
149b4('bum): tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyid kyang dmyig sa la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ 
149b5('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa/ 'i rkyen kyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar/ yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
149b6('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ myig gi 'dus te reg
149b7('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
149b8('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gas rang bzhin/ 
149b9('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus
150a1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shwa
150a2('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
150a3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
150a4('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mug gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyi gas pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ 
150a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro// lad tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenaH/ nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
150a6('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu
150a7('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed paru/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
150a8('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 
150b1('bum): myug gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom/ 
150b2('bum): sem su byed do// rab 'byorod gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i/ 
150b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la
150b4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba/ phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas phyi
150b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
150b6('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de/ de shes
150b7('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
150b8('bum): pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
151a1('bum): bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
151a2('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba don dam pa stong
151a3('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gos don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
151a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa/ zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas
151a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sa ma su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
151a6('bum): par rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
151a7('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa
151a8('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
151b1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
151b2('bum): pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
151b3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa
151b4('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / nga ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
151b5('bum): tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyig/ sa pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ ste/ nga pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold
151b6('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
151b7('bum): pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
151b8('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong
151b9('bum): nas cad kyi thar bachos pa du min bya bar med pa kyid/ gas pa'i chu gi ma tu ga man kyi rna babyed/ deshesas tum med phyin pa sa po rnamasas myi 'ding lda ma myo dpa/ 
152a1('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg na
152a2('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
152a3('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tsher ba ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
152a4('bum): pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyi da kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
152a5('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye/ nad kyis tshor ba dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba ra yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa'i
152a6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
152a7('bum): tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gas nang stong pa nyid kyang
152a8('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg
152b1('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyin pa la spyod
152b2('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed do// dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa ni
152b3('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg par
152b4('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
152b5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus bya reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
152b6('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidang / 
152b7('bum): ljon pa'i yod la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyi
152b8('bum): kyis kyang rlom sem su byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'a/ 
153a1('bum): byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gos 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs pa/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha mod dutu phyind pa la
153a2('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma/ 
153a3('bum): khyas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 
153a4('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das nga pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gi sa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
153a5('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid// dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend
153a6('bum): kyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid lo byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de
153a7('bum): rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
153a8('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
153b1('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
153b2('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong
153b3('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe
153b4('bum): ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa ru/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tsher ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas rang gi
153b5('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyi gA d+ha la byed du/ stong pa nyid kyi sa kyang rlom semasu byed/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
153b6('bum): la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
153b7('bum): sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus
153b8('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dngos po myed po'i ngo bo stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// 
154a1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
154a2('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
154a3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
154a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'/ sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
154a5('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi de la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
154a6('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i
154a7('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
154a8('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid
154b1('bum): dmyags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyi
154b2('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
154b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ 
154b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor
154b5('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs/ pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa/ nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
154b6('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi de la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus/ 
154b7('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong panyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi dang ldan pa'i yid sa bya ba myed par/ smye'i 'dus so// 
154b8('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin dpa
155a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
155a2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stongang pa nyid kyang dmyig sA lu/ rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ra long tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dungs te reg pa'i
155a3('bum): rkyen kyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
155a4('bum): rolo tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyi/ des tshor ba dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
155a5('bum): pa'i tshul gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
155a6('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// 
155a7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
155a8('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
155b1('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
155b2('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bab/ 
155b3('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni/ 
155b4('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyig/ sa pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ 
155b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen
155b6('bum): kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i chu la gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlam sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
155b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dngos po myong ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa'i
155b8('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams/ 
156a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong
156a2('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha yod tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa/ 
156a3('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
156a4('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la bye dad de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ 
156a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg gi
156a6('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
156a7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
156a8('bum): chen po snying pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong panyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha lang tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba skyed par/ 
156b1('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// 
156b2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
156b3('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe sa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da/ 
156b4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dri dmyigs pa'i tshul gas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
156b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyipha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg
156b6('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs po'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed de/ rdo rje
156b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
156b8('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
157a1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ 
157a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rang
157a3('bum): bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
157a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gas chos thams
157a5('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem/ su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
157a6('bum): par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyi da stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
157a7('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes/ 
157a8('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
157b1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ 
157b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba
157b3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
157b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa dar/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dngos po myed dpa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i/ 
157b5('bum): tshul gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'gyu/ rang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
157b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
157b7('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
157b8('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom ses
158a1('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolo tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes
158a2('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
158a3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa
158a4('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lnga/ na pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
158a5('bum): tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyad
158a6('bum): pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya ba re yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong/ 
158a7('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te re/ 
158a8('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin
158b1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus
158b2('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 
158b3('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gos mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom ses
158b4('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mye dad par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba thog ma dang / 
158b5('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs/ la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi
158b6('bum): pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
158b7('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
158b8('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rang bzhini stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong
159a1('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
159a2('bum): kyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmyigs pa'i tshul gris chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
159a3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
159a4('bum): pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha da rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
159a5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus/ te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya ba ra yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong
159a6('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 
159a7('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
159a8('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyi nid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
159b1('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad/ 
159b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med
159b3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// // bam po// 
159b4('bum): rab 'byorod gzhan yang byang chub sems da dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa de la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
159b5('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya khar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// / 
159b6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
159b7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
159b8('bum): sa'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
160a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid/ 
160a2('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams chen
160a3('bum): po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ rang gi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
160a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid dang ldan pa rnga'i yid dngapal bya ba myed par/ sa'i khas don dam pa stong pad zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gas don dam pa
160a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sa// ma su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa 'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya/ 
160a6('bum): kha myed par/ sa'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
160a7('bum): tu phyi nid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong
160a8('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khas
160b1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
160b2('bum): phyi nid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gis thog ma
160b3('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyamyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
160b4('bum): sa'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu/

160b6('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 
160b7('bum): sa'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
160b8('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa

161a2('bum): khams myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

161a5('bum): sa'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyi gas pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ ste nga pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
161a6('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po
161a7('bum): myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zha nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i

165a6('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa
165a7('bum): rlung gi khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// 
165a8('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams thog ma dang tha ma med par stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
165b1('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thos
165b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// / 
165b3('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams
165b4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i chu dal gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyi sa kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
165b5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams chos thams cad stong pa/ te zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thos
165b6('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha yid tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa
165b7('bum): rlung gi khas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
165b8('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas myi dmyigs
166a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rarolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
166a2('bum): myed par/ rlung gi khams dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gris dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes
166a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
166a4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dri shes rab kyi pha rolong tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
166a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung // gi khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar mi de la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
166a6('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sem su byed do// rab 'byorod gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe
166a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid/ 
166a8('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid
166b1('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha ra lod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan gi
166b2('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
166b3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems/ 
166b4('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
166b5('bum): pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid/ kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin da pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
166b6('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gris don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
166b7('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags
166b8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya/ 
167a1('bum): ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// 
167a2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i/ 
167a3('bum): tshul gas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
167a4('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams thog/ da ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyiganyes pa'i tshul gas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
167a5('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams
167a6('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i/ 
167a7('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas rang bzhini stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
167a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams chos thos
167b1('bum): cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gas chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed / de shes rab kyi pa lod tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par
167b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
167b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams myi dmyigs pa stong
167b4('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe
167b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rang gi nam mkha'i khams dngos po med pa stong / pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med
167b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha lod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 
167b7('bum): nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin/ 
167b8('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas dngos po
168a1('bum): mamed pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa zhes bya nyid kyang dmyags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha ro mong tu phyin/ 
168a2('bum): pa la sbyong ba'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong ba nyid kyang dmyu/ 
168a3('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi stong pa zhes
168a4('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gas nang stong pa nyid kyang du myags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shesarab kyi pha lod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
168a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes/ pa'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa
168a6('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas stong pa nyid stong pa
168a7('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i
168a8('bum): khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gas chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
168b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ 
168b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dus
168b3('bum): byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe
168b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed/ par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhe/ su bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus
168b5('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa 'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
168b6('bum): bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
168b7('bum): rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong / 
168b8('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
169a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gsi dor ba med pa
169a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 
169a3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams rang bzhini stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
169a4('bum): rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cadamakhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
169a5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thos/ 
169a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
169a7('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams myi
169a8('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod
169b1('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed
169b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 
169b3('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
169b4('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa/ de'i khams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
169b5('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas dngos po myed pa'i ngo kho nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub ses
169b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
169b7('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu bya nid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
169b8('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// 
170a1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha ro lod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa
170a2('bum): tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
170a3('bum): myed par/ ma rig pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol
170a4('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa chen po stong dpa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen
170a5('bum): po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
170a6('bum): la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// rdo shes rab kyi
170a7('bum): pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
170a8('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang skya rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
170b1('bum): la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes
170b2('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
170b3('bum): tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
170b4('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa tho ga ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid lta byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nas
170b5('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
170b6('bum): ma rig pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
170b7('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma 'gi ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas rang bzhin stong pa nyid
170b8('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ljon pa'i/ yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig
171a1('bum): ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gris chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
171a2('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par ma rig pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong
171a3('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha yang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa rgyun myi/ 
171a4('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyi rags pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ralod tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i
171a5('bum): tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba/ myed par/ ma rig pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid/ la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid/ 
171a6('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa ngo bo nyid sto
171a7('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
171a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ 
171b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// rab 'byord gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sa sa dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
171b2('bum): myed par// 'du byed nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
171b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// 
171b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byad da pa myed par/ 'du byed phyinang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
171b5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
171b6('bum): par// 'du byed stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed// dmyigs pa'i tshul gri stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
171b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms su
171b8('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don
172a1('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i na/ rnam pa thams cad
172a2('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byos stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ 
172a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed 'dus ma
172a4('bum): byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i nga tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi
172a5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad/ mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du/ byed mtha' lngas 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
172a6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed / dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
172a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
172a8('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 
172b1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i mi/ rnam pa sa su cid ma khyen pa nyid dang ston pa ni mid la blo ba skyed par/ 'du bye rang ban song ba nis rgyu yid 'a byed de pa'i / 
172b2('bum): ni 'ang ba nyid kya phyos sa song pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// deshes ra kyis sno tu phyin pa'o spyod pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyod pa nyid do ldan pa'i yongs
172b3('bum): par 'du byed chos thams cad song ba zhes bya bar yi sa byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ tshesnga thams cadastong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
172b4('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod blo'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed rang bzhin spong ba zhes
172b5('bum): bya bar yang mi byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jog mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ gang pa 'di kyis kyang rloms su byed do// bloshis rjob kyi sa rab tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chen/ rnam
172b6('bum): byamams kyad ma khyen pa nyid dong ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed myi dmigs pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi myigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dam gas/ 
172b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid lo bya ba myed par 'du byed dngos po myong ba
173a1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
173a2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang ri myig
173a3('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed dngos po myed
173a4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor
