173a5('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
173a6('bum): myed par/ rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang myigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed de/ 
173a7('bum): dr-igs rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi sa bya ba med byar/ rnam par shes pa phyi song ba zhes bya bar yi sa byed de dmyigs pa'i chus gis
173a8('bum): phyi stong ba nyid kyang phyog so la spong po nyid kyis kyang nim sem su byed de/ re shes rab kyi ma rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yings bya ba mi sa
173b1('bum): rnam par shes pa phyi nang gong ba zhes bya ba yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la song pa nyid kyis kyang rnom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rom du phyin na
173b2('bum): pa spyod pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis song ba nyid stong
173b3('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par// 
173b4('bum): rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs ngal stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
173b5('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'iyid la bya ba myed par rnapar shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
173b6('bum): de dmyigs pa'i tshul gris don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha roladu tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mi
173b7('bum): ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de 8/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gris 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ song
173b8('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa 'dus ma/ 
174a1('bum): rgyas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
174a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das
174a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
174a4('bum): par rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya ba dar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gris thogra ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang / 
174a5('bum): sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan/ pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rnam par shes pa dor po myed pa stong
174a6('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang dri ma sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
174a7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid
174a8('bum): kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par
174b1('bum): parang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
174b2('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gso rang gi mtshan
174b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
174b4('bum): rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la bye da de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
174b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams/ cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
174b6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
174b7('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sas
174b8('bum): su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
175a1('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// rab 'byorang byang chub sos
175a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par mying dang gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la/ 
175a3('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis nang stong pa nyid kyang rimyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
175a4('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par ming dang gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gris phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed/ 
175a5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tham/ sa cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa// ra ming dang gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
175a6('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kye pha rol du tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
175a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par ming dang gzugs stong nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kya
175a8('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
175b1('bum): byed de migs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la sod pa nyid kyis kyang rloms su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / 
175b2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mying dang gzugs don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms
175b3('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par mying dang gzugs 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
175b4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// je shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
175b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzu/ gas 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang ngadamigs
175b6('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzun
175b7('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha'o las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de gas
175b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ming dang gzugs thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya ba
176a1('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
176a2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
176a3('bum): pa'i tshul gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
176a4('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mying dang gzugs rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs dpa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong
176a5('bum): ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pharo/ lang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ming dang gzugs
176a6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
176a7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gri
176a8('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba me
176b1('bum): ming dang gzugs myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
176b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dngos po myed par stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
176b3('bum): kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ming dang gzugs
176b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
176b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myi// da par/ mying dang gzugs dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid s+ho/ nga ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
176b6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// / bam po bcu gnyis pa'o// 
176b7('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched
176b8('bum): drug nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba thos
177a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par skye mched drug phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
177a2('bum): su byed do// dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
177a3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
177a4('bum): ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug/ stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
177a5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam paH/ mas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa
177a6('bum): skye mched drug chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
177a7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nying / 
177a8('bum): kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par skye mche
177b1('bum): drug 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed/ 
177b2('bum): par/ skye mched drug 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu
177b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa
177b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
177b5('bum): myed par/ skye mched drug thog ma dang tha ma myed pa spyod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
177b6('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya/ 
177b7('bum): khor yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
177b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug rang bzhin stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis/ 
178a1('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par myi slad mched drug chos thams cad stong pa zhe
178a2('bum): bya bar yid la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
178a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par skye mched drug rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis
178a4('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi dad la bya ba myed par skye mched drug mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya
178a5('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa/ nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su te/ do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
178a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par skye me ched drug dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ 
178a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug ngo bo nyid stong pa zhe
178a8('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas
178b1('bum): cang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par skye mched drug dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stod
178b2('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
178b3('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa zhes bya bar nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi/ 
178b4('bum): pha rolang tu phyin pa sa spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang
178b5('bum): dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye chen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par reg pa phyi nang
178b6('bum): kha zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas
178b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis kyang
178b8('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshun
179a1('bum): kyis chen po song ba nyid kyang sbyinas ma snod pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ying sa byam/ 
179a2('bum): myed par reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi/ 
179a3('bum): ba spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la spong ba ni/ 
179a4('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa 'i yid la bya ba myed par reg pa 'dus ma byas skyong ba zhes bya
179a5('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tha
179a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rig pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid/ 
179a7('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar
179a8('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
179b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par reg pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang ra yid la byed de/ dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis/ 
179b2('bum): bya rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin du pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi la bya ba myed par/ reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de dmyigs ni
179b3('bum): tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed/ 
179b4('bum): par reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
179b5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de shes rab kyi pha ral tu bya nad pa la spyad pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da nga ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rig pa rang gi mtshan nyid/ 
179b6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
179b7('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
179b8('bum): dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par reg pa dngos po myed pa stong na
180a1('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams/ 
180a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
180a3('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par reg pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
180a4('bum): pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong po nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
180a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tha/ mas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
180a6('bum): tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyi nga rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
180a7('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sos su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
180a8('bum): tu phyin po la spyod pa'i cha/ rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par tshor ba phyi nang stong pa gres bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
180b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid
180b2('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
180b3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
180b4('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan ba'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang zhe sa bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa sto/ 
180b5('bum): ba nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tha ma/ sa cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par tshor ba
180b6('bum): 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus bya pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem sa su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
180b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ljon pa'i yid la bya ba myed par tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang / 
180b8('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyis
181a1('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la sto pa nyid kyis kyang rlom so su byed do// 
181a2('bum): pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
181a3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sa spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
181a4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// 
181a5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
181a6('bum): de'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
181a7('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang ro/ 
181a8('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
181a9('bum): mas pa'i tshus gis ra nam can nyid song bad kyang myigs pa/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sems byed de// rigs rab kyi pa la tu phyin pa la spyong ba chi/ rnams
181b1('bum): rang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bu byed par/ nor ba myi dmyigs pa sbyong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la sbyong ba/ 
181b2('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par tshor ba dngas po myed pa song pa
181b3('bum): zhes bya bar ying la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gris dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyong rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyod pa'i
181b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba / dad par tshor ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la so
181b5('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi ba rudu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba dngos po mo
181b6('bum): ba nga po nyid myong pa zhes bya par ying la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i rlos gis ngus po med pa'i ngan ni stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid rjes kyang rnam ses su byed do/ rang 'byor dag
181b7('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa de zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par srid pa nang stong pa zhes bya
181b8('bum): yi lo byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom ses su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po'i
182a1('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de/ 
182a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sred pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong
182a3('bum): ba nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sred pa/ 
182a4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyi da kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
182a5('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa chen po// stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis
182a6('bum): po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
182a7('bum): sred pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nang
182a8('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
182b1('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid
182b2('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
182b3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
182b4('bum): do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags
182b5('bum): ba'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs/ de la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sos su byed do/ de shes rab kyi/ pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
182b6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sa
182b7('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
182b8('bum): gas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
183a1('bum): sred pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyangar yid la byed dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
183a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid
183a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa myi dmyin/ 
183a4('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la
183a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yi de la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa slong pa nyid
183a6('bum): kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la/ spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes
183a7('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma
183a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyi
183b1('bum): rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa
183b2('bum): len pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thos
183b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
183b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ len pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa
183b5('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tha sems cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myong bar len
183b6('bum): stong pa nyid stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dbyigs pa'i dugis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs pa/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi par ming du phyin pa la
183b7('bum): rnam pa tham mo cang su khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i 'dis kyi bskyed par/ yin pa chen po sang bzhis bya bar yid 'byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshum gis chen po stong pa nyid kya dbyigs ma spong ba
183b8('bum): khyeng ngom sems su byed do/ rigs rab kyi sa'i mang du phyinid pa la spyod pa'i che rnam thathams cad ma byon pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la kyi med papa yin padon pa pa spong ba'i byar mings byed kyid do// 
184a1('bum): pa nus gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dgas la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha 'olang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i rje/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
184a2('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ len pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de zhes
184a3('bum): pa lang du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par len pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
184a4('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par len
184a5('bum): pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
184a6('bum): rolang tu phyin pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ len pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha/ 
184a7('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par len pa
184a8('bum): dong ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa zas/ 
184b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par len pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// 
184b2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ len pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos
184b3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 
184b4('bum): len pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
184b5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ len pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa
184b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su bye da do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len
184b7('bum): pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
184b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// 
185a1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul/ 
185a2('bum): gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pal
185a3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba myed par/ srid pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
185a4('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed parasrid pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gri/ 
185a5('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
185a6('bum): bar srid pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rmi ma sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
185a7('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ srid pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa
185a8('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ srid pa chen po stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
185b1('bum): tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa
185b2('bum): srid pa don dam pa stong pa 'i zhes bya bar yid la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
185b3('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sred pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa
185b4('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhe/ 
185b5('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus ma byas s+ho/ byeng pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem sa su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
185b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ srid pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs
185b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ srid pa thog ma dang tha ma mye/ 
185b8('bum): pastong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang pa ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong/ 
186a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ srid pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ 
186a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ srid pa rang bzhin stong
186a3('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kying rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
186a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa/ ra/ srid pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
186a5('bum): dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 
186a6('bum): srid pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
186a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ srid pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i rgyu
186a8('bum): gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de/ 
186b1('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ srid pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
186b2('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par// ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs/ 
186b3('bum): pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
186b4('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ srid pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong
186b5('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
186b6('bum): khams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba skyed pa skye ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong ba nyid kyis kyang rno/ 
186b7('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba phyi stong po zhes bya bar yid la byed de dmyigs pa'i
186b8('bum): tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang tsam sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
187a1('bum): pa myed par/ skye ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
187a2('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
187a3('bum): kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba chen po
187a4('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa
187a5('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan/ pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
187a6('bum): gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
187a7('bum): la bya ba myed par/ skye ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
187a8('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma
187b1('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
187b2('bum): skye ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolong du
187b3('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma
187b4('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rno dam sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
187b5('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yi/ de la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dor ba myed pa stong pa/ nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su bya
187b6('bum): do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par// skye ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ra
187b7('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
187b8('bum): skye ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kya ngar yi dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
188a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pazhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid sgo/ 
188a2('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba myi dmyigs/ 
188a3('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
188a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye rab dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
188a5('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind/ pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa/ 'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid
188a6('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shesar ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
188a7('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid/ 
188a8('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
188b1('bum): bya ba myed pa/ shi nang song ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa la spyod
188b2('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ shi phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang tshum
188b3('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
188b4('bum): gis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa de'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa po nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
188b5('bum): la bya ba myed par/ rga shi stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid/ kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ 
188b6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rga shi chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chen po// 
188b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang po la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rga shi do// 
188b8('bum): dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs pa/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
189a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rga shi 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid
189a2('bum): kyis kyang rloms su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rga shi 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
189a3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid pa nyi dang ldan pa/ 
189a4('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'a ngas pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su/ 
189a5('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mye/ da par/ rga shi thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
189a6('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
189a7('bum): bya ba myed par/ rga shrI dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du
189a8('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rga shi rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la rdo/ 
189b1('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rga shi chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
189b2('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
189b3('bum): bya ba myed par/ rga shi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
189b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa de'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rga shi myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kya
189b5('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa tham/ sa cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rga shi dngos
189b6('bum): lo myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
189b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rga shi ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
189b8('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rga shi dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
190a1('bum): tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab/ 
190a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ngan pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmyigs
190a3('bum): la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes la rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
190a4('bum): sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba de dag kyang de dmyigs la/ yang dag par spong ba de dag gis kyang ngarlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
190a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rdzu// 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang dmyigs la/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang/ 
190a6('bum): pa de dag gyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ dbang po rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs ji
190a7('bum): tshul gis dgang po rnams kyang dmyigs la/ dbang po bde dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
190a8('bum): myed par stobs rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stobs rnams kyang dmyigs la/ stobs de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
190b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis byang chub kyi yan lag de dag kyang dmyigs la/ byang chub kyi yan lag de dag gis kyang rlo// 
190b2('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i
190b3('bum): tshul gis/ 'phags pa'i le yan lag brgyad pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
190b4('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mye/ dad par/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs dpa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag kyang dmyigs
190b5('bum): la 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag gyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa
190b6('bum): bsam gtan rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan de dag kyang dmyigs la/ bsam gtan de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// 
190b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshad myed pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ tshad myed pa de dag gyis kyang rlom
190b8('bum): sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom
191a1('bum): steg dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag gyis d+hA rlom sems su byed do// den/ 
191a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol de tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par tha rad pa de dag kyang
191a3('bum): dmyigs la/ rnam par thard pa de dag gyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mthar kyis gnas/ 
191a4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
191a5('bum): pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi phra/ rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma// khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par thar
191a6('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ 
191a7('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myong ba dang smon pa myed pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lo spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
191a8('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mngon par shes pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
191b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang dmyigs la/ 
191b2('bum): ting nge 'dzin de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom
191b3('bum): ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo de dag kyang dmyigs la/ gzungs kyi sgo de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
191b4('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ de bzhin gshegs pa' stob sa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshe gas pa'i stobs de dag kyang dmyigs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
191b5('bum): stobs de dag gyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha/ rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye na pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mi 'jigs pa
191b6('bum): rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mi 'jigs pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ mi 'jigs pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
191b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ so so yang dag par rig pa de dag
191b8('bum): gis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par snying rje chen po sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chenapo
192a1('bum): de yang dmyigs la snying rje chen po des kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
192a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gyis kyang rlom sems su
192a3('bum): byed do// bam po gsum pa'o// // rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
192a4('bum): dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar thabs mi mkhas pas ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa bstan pa 'di thos nas/ 'jigs shing sdang la skrag
192a5('bum): par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grog sa pos yongs su zin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
192a6('bum): pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing dngang la skrag par 'gyur te/ sdig pa'i ngogs po'i sug par ltung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub so// 
192a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa mos pa myed par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// bsamanga' gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa mos pa myed pa
192a8('bum): byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod cab mos pa myed par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa mos pa myed par byed cing zlog par bye da
192b1('bum): pal/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa mos pa myed par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa mos pa myed par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// 'di ni de bzhin
192b2('bum): gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin/ 'di na chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin/ 'di la bslab par bya ba'i myi chu'o// mdo'i sde 'di dag ni ring bzor byas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mnyan par myi bya
192b3('bum): bzung bar mi bya'o// bcang bar myi bya'o// klag par myi bya'o// kun chub par myi bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la myi bya'o// 'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par myi bya'o// zhes zer ba 'di ni/ rab 'byor byed/ 
192b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ 'di ltar dus
192b5('bum): sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag/ byang chu/ ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas pa/ rol tu phyind pa drug las zlog cing mos pa myed par byed de
192b6('bum): rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gi pha rolang tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa
192b7('bum): bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
192b8('bum): phyind pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud gi las myi smra myi ston/ bdud kyi nyes pa mi ston pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdud
193a1('bum): pa'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ nyan thos
193a2('bum): dang ldan pa'i mdo' dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng bzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang
193a3('bum): chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang rten la phab pa bstan pa dag ston to// 'grel to// rnam par 'byed do// gsal bar byed dro ston to// las gi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ 
193a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdud kyi las su/ rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang bdud sdig to can/ sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems
193a5('bum): dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang myed/ khyod ni phyir mi ldog ba yang ma yin/ khyed kyisi ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
193a6('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so// zhes zer 'di lta bu'i bdud gi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por
193a7('bum): rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu myig gi bdag gam/ 
193a8('bum): bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / lce ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yid ni bdag gam pa/ 
193b1('bum): gyis stong ngo // gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // sgra ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // dri ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ro ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // reg ni bdag gam bdag/ 
193b2('bum): gyis stong ngo // chos ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // myig gyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa ni
193b3('bum): bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // yid gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag/ 
193b4('bum): gyis stong ngo // myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // lce'i
193b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo / lus kyi/ 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo / yid kyi/ te'adus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // myig gyi
193b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag phyis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
193b7('bum): tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // 
193b8('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // sa'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // chu'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo / me'i khams na bdag gam bdag/ 
194a1('bum): gyis stong ngo // dang rlung gi khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / nam mkha'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong // 
194a2('bum): ma rig pa ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo / 'du byed ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo / rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // mying dang gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // skye
194a3('bum): mched drug ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo / reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // sred pa ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // len pa ni bdag gam
194a4('bum): bdag gyis stong ngo // srid pa ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo / skye ba ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // rga shi ni bdag ga/ ma bdag gis stong ngo / sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa ni bdag
194a5('bum): gam bdag gyis stong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyin/ pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // bzod pa'i pha rol/ tu phyind pa ni bdag gamo bdag gyis stong ngo // brtson 'grus
194a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // 
194a7('bum): nang stong pa nyid bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // phyi stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gyis
194a8('bum): stong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo / don dam pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'dus ma byas s+ho// 
194b1('bum): pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni
194b2('bum): bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // chos thams cad ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // 
194b3('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid
194b4('bum): stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar ga/ zhag pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // dran pa nye ba1rngar gzhag pa rnams ni bdag bdag gyis stong ngo / yang dag par
194b5('bum): spong ba rnams ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // dab/ nga po rnams ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // stobs rnams
194b6('bum): ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa
194b7('bum): rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // bsam gtan rnams ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // tshad med pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni
194b8('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par thar pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
195a1('bum): pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo / mngon par shes pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong / ting nge 'dzind rnams ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong ngo // gzungs
195a2('bum): kyi skyonams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // de 'di gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni bdag gis stong ngo // myi 'jigs pa rnams ni bdag gis bdag gis stong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni bdag gas bdag ni/ 
195a3('bum): stong ngo // / snying rje chen po ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni bdag gam bdag gyis stong po// de ltar de dag bdag dang bdag gis stong na/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
195a4('bum): sangs rgyas te 'ang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag myi skye myi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i dogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan
195a5('bum): yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang // chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di/ skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
195a6('bum): dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyis stong ste/ 'di la sang sa rgyas zhes bya ba yang myed do// nyan thos zhes bya ba yang myed do// de bzhin du shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / 
195a7('bum): byang phyogs dang / 'og dang steng dag stong ste/ phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba myed/ byang chub sem
195a8('bum): dpa' zhes bya ba yang myed/ nyan thos zhes bya ba myed do zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
195b1('bum): gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi cha byang du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog cing nyan thos dang / 
195b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'dems shing rjes su ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag myi smra myi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs bor bya'o// 
195b3('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag mkhan po dang / slob dpon gi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyind te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
195b4('bum): zlog cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la
195b5('bum): sbyor ba dang / dbang po rnams la sbyor ba dang / stobs rnam sa la sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spro ra ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag rnams la sbyor/ 
195b6('bum): dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / bsam gtan rnams la sbyor ba dang / tshad myed pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
195b7('bum): ma dang / nam b+hA rnams ma skyer ba dang / mamar kyis gnas pa ni sems par 'jug pa rnams kyi sbyor bya dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma skyed pa dang ston pa skyed pa'i tsam
195b8('bum): sbyar ba / rigs kyis khyed kyis des mas de ngag yongs su brnams sa cad thos kyi semasus kyis nig rmar myong pa maung 'i pa 'i
196a1('bum): khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba/ de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rigs par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdin/ 
196a2('bum): to can dag pha ma'i cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci
196a3('bum): zhig bya/ de'i don du ni skal pa tshad myed dngas myed par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing / rkalag dang 'gro bcad pa tshad med pas/ nyon mongs par 'gyur gis gang la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / lan
