231a1('bum): dbang po rnams myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byorang stobs rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// stobs rnams 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// stobs rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa/ 
231a2('bum): med pa dang rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// stobs rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// stobs rnams 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// stobs rnams myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor
231a3('bum): byang chub kyi yan rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang rnam par byang ba myed pa la
231a4('bum): gnas pa myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mngon par 'du bya ba/ myed pa la gnas myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'byung bu myed pa la gnas myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi dmyigs pa la
231a5('bum): gnas myed do// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa skye/ ba myed pa la gnas myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag/ brgyad pa 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan
231a6('bum): lag brgyad pa kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang rnam par byang ba myed po la gnas myed do// 'phags pa'i la yan lag brgyad pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'byung ba myed pa la garma/ 
231a7('bum): myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'gag pa myed pa la gnas mye
231a8('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnaMs 'byung ba myed pa
231b1('bum): gnas myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// bsam gtan rnams 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// bsam gtan rnams
231b2('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// bsam gtan rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// bsam gtan rnams 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// bsam gtan rnams myi/ 
231b3('bum): dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor nga tshad myed pa rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// tshad myed pa rnams 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// tshad med pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa myong ba dang rnam par byang ba myed pa la
231b4('bum): gnas myed do// tshad myed pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// tshad myed pa rnams 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// tshad myed pa rnams myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor gzugs
231b5('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'gag pa myong ba la gnas myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kun nas
231b6('bum): nyon mongs pa myed pa dang rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'byung ba
231b7('bum): myed pa la gnas myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byorang rnam par thar pa rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// rnam par thar pa rnams 'gag pa mye
231b8('bum): pa la gnas myed do// rnam par thard pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// rnam par thar pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed do// rnam par thar pa rnams 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myo'o
232a1('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
232a2('bum): 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa la gnas myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa
232a3('bum): gnas myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byord rnam par
232a4('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa skye ba me dad pa la gnas med do// rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// 
232a5('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang rnam par byang ba myed pa la/ gnas myed do/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
232a6('bum): myed pa dang smon pa myed pa myed pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa 'byung ba myed pa la gnas pa myed do// rnam par thar pa'i
232a7('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de mngon par shes pa skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// mngon par shes pa rnams 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// 
232a8('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gnas myed do// mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// mngon par shes pa rnams 'byung ba
232b1('bum): myed pa la gnas myed do// mngon par shes pa rnams myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor da ting nge 'dzin rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// 
232b2('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed
232b3('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de gzungs kyi sgo rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kun nas nyo// 
232b4('bum): mongs pa myed pa dang rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// gzungs kyi sgo mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnaMs
232b5('bum): myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i// stobs skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa 'i stobs rnams 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// de bzhin
232b6('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa rnamasar byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
232b7('bum): stobs 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de myi 'jigs pa rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams 'gag pa
232b8('bum): myed pa la gnas myed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang rna bar byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// mi 'jigs pa rnas 'byung ba
233a1('bum): myed pa la gnas myed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnas 'gag pa
233a2('bum): myed pa la gnas myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do/ 
233a3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor da byams pa chen po skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// byams pa
233a4('bum): chen po 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// byams pa chen po kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// byams pa chen po mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed
233a5('bum): byams pa chen po 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// byams/ pa chen po myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor snying rje che/ na po skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// snying rje chen po 'gag pa myed
233a6('bum): pa ma gnas myed do// snying rje chen po kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed dong/ snying rje chen po mngon par 'du bya ba myong ba la gnas myed do// snying rje chen po 'byung ba myed pa la
233a7('bum): gnas myed do// snying rje chen po myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor nga sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skye ba myed pa la gnas myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'gag pa myed pa
233a8('bum): la gnas myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas myed/ 
233b1('bum): de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs rnam par dag ga
233b2('bum): la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// tshor ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// 'du shes shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// 'du byed shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma
233b3('bum): gnas myed do// rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
233b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste dper na myig shin tu rnam par dag pa lnga mtshan ma ga/ nas myed do// rna ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas
233b5('bum): myed do// sna shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// lce shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// lus shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// 
233b6('bum): yid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi
233b7('bum): don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// spu shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// dri shin tu rnam par dag
233b8('bum): la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// ro shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do/ reg shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// chos shin tu rnam par dgra ba la mtshan ma'i gnas
234a1('bum): byung / nga 'thod de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' byen pa zhes rab kyi pa mang du phyind pa la spyod pa'i byeng chu ba sems dpa'i tshig gi dan myemed de/ rab 'byor 'dis ste dper na/ 
234a2('bum): myig gi rnam par shes bshin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan mi gnas myed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes bzhin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// sna rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa
234a3('bum): mtshan ma'i gnas myed nga/ bu'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pas mtshan ma'i gnas myed do/ yid kyi rnam par shes
234a4('bum): pa rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi sa ramang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rmi/ 
234a5('bum): gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste bor na/ myig gi dus te rig pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas mye/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas
234a6('bum): myong // sna'i 'dus te reg pashin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan mo'i gnas myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa
234a7('bum): nama'i gnas myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rang 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa la spyod/ 
234a8('bum): pa'i byeng chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di sa ste dper ma/ myig gi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba shin tu rna par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis rtso ma
234b1('bum): ma'i gnas myed do/ mas kyi 'dus te reg pa'i sa kyis tsha ba zhin du rnam par dgru pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// srid kyi dus ga pa'i rkyed kyis tsho ba shin tu ma thar dag pal mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// 
234b2('bum): bya 'byar de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myong ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sa'i khams shAn
234b3('bum): bdag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed nga/ rtswa 'i khams pa napar dag pa sa mtshan ma'o gnas kyi dang / mas rnaM rnam par dganas mtshan ma'i gnas med de/ 
234b4('bum): na ma par dag pa la mtshan ma'i smanas myed do// nam mkha mas shin d+ha rnam pa dag pas mthun pa'i gnas myu pa zhes pa'i khams shin tu rnam par dgrapa la mtsham
234b5('bum): nas skyed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen gyi zhes rab kyi pha rosang du phyind pa sa spyong pa'i nyi nub sems dbu'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di la ste dper na/ sa
234b6('bum): 'khrugs gan surnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// skye yin drug gi kun par dag pas mtshan ma ga sa rgyad do/ bzhi dzin kyis tshan pa'i gas byed do/ ma zug rnam
235a1('bum): la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// sred pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// len pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// srid pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i/ 
235a2('bum): gnas myed do// skye ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rga shi shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
235a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// 'dags bam po bcu drug pa'o// / rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na
235a4('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu / 
235a5('bum): pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// brtson/ 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la ma/ tshan ma'i gnas myed do// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni/ 
235a6('bum): tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// shes rab kyi pha ro lod tu phyinang pa shin tu rnam par dge ba la mtshan ma'i gnas myed de/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
235a7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na nang stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// phyi stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par
235a8('bum): dag pa' la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do/ phyi nang stong ba nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma ci gnas srid do// stong pa nyid stong ba nyid shin tu rna par dag pa sa mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// chen po stong ba nyid gis/ 
235b1('bum): rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// 'dus ma/ 
235b2('bum): byas stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong ba nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par nga
235b3('bum): pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// chos thams cad stong pa
235b4('bum): nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'ig/ nas myed do/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa
235b5('bum): kha mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myong ngo do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed
235b6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byorang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
235b7('bum): pa'i byang chub sems pa'i tshig gi don myed // rab 'byor nga 'dis ste dper na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// yang dag par spong ba shin tu rnam par dag pas mtshan ma'i gnas
235b8('bum): byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa shin tu rnam por dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// dbang po shin tu rnam par dag pa lamatsun ma'i gnas myed do// stobs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// 
236a1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag shis rje drag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
236a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di la ste dper na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa shin tu rnam par dag pa
236a3('bum): mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// bsam gtan shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// tshad med pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
236a4('bum): shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rnam par thar pa shin tu rnam par dgu pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa shin tu rnam par dag
236a5('bum): la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rnam par thar po'i sgo stong ba/ nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// mngon par shes pa ni/ 
236a6('bum): rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// ting nge 'dzinan tu rnam par dag go la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// gzungs kyi sgo shin tu rnam par dag pa lnga mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor/ 
236a7('bum): 'dis la dam / de bzhin gshegs pa du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ rab 'byor nga 'di lta/ 
236a8('bum): dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do/ myi 'jigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa shin tu rma
236b1('bum): par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// snying rje chen po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rag
236b2('bum): 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag myed pa'i
236b3('bum): phyir bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byord de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshe/ 
236b4('bum): gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sems can myed pa'i phyir sems can shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
236b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ 'ibyang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byorang/ 'di lta ste dper na/ srog myed pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag/ 
236b6('bum): ba la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor/ 
236b7('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ gso ba myed pa'i phyir gso ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
236b8('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu med pa'i phyir skyes bu shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub seMs
237a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gang zag myed pa'i phyir gang zag shin tu rnam
237a2('bum): par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byorang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab
237a3('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ shed can myed pa'i phyir shed can shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
237a4('bum): ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ shed bdag myed pa'i phyir she bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab / 
237a5('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po she nyes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na byed
237a6('bum): pa po myed pa'i phyir/ byed pa po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang / 
237a7('bum): chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshor ba po myed pa'i phyir tshor ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
237a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na shes pa po myed pa'i phyir shes pa po shin tu rnam par dag pa la
237b1('bum): mtshan me'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta
237b2('bum): ste dper na mthong ba po myed pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
237b3('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na nyi mo'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba'i tshe mun pa'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa/ 
237b4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ skal pa'i me 'bar ba'i che/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thas cad kyi gnas
237b5('bum): myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la / dpa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor
237b6('bum): 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la tshul khrims ngan pa'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dang / 
237b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
237b8('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin pa 'khrul pa'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub ses dpa'i tshig gi sa
238a1('bum): myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shes rab la shes rab 'chal pa'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang
238a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
238a3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba la rnam par ma grol ba'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
238a4('bum): sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdza gas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs/ 
238a5('bum): pa la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma gzigs pa'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
238a6('bum): sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la gnas myed ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
238a7('bum): phyining pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'dis ste dper na/ gan dang skar ma dang / nor bu rin po che dang / klog gi 'od sa gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chu/ 
238a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don byed do// rab 'byor 'di sa ste dper na/ rgyal chen ba'i 'od lnga gnas byed do// rab 'byor do po ni/ 
238b1('bum): du byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams kyi 'od la/ 
238b2('bum): gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na mtshe/ 
238b3('bum): ma'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab
238b4('bum): 'di lta ste dper na dga' ldan gi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dang/ 
238b5('bum): tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ 'phrul da/ ga' lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de ba/ zhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha/ 
238b6('bum): rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gi lha rnams ga 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
238b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed
238b8('bum): ngo// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams
239a1('bum): ni ci / skye skye par me sa ma ga nams kyi 'ongs ga ma myed do/ 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ci zhes kyi ro mang du phyin
239a2('bum): ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ snang ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
239a3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dpe/ ra na/ chung snang gi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'phye/ 
239a4('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na tshad myed snang ba'i lha
239a5('bum): rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// ra
239a6('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la/ 
239b1('bum): ga byor 'a sa ste pe da// dge rgyas kyi stanas kyi 'ang bya gnas myed do// rab byo de zhin du byang tshus pa dngoms pa'i chen po trem kyi sa do tu nyin pa sa spyod pa'i byang chu mos pa'i tshig gi med do/ 
239b2('bum): spyod pa'i byeng chub sems dpa'i nig gdon myeng ngo // rab 'byor du 'di lta sa dper na/ dge ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pa
239b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ chung dge'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa
239b4('bum): sems dpa' sen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab
239b5('bum): 'byord de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub se/ nyams dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper
239b6('bum): na/ che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor da de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshig
239b7('bum): gdon myed do// rab 'byorang 'di lta ste dper na/ che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
239b8('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ chung che'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
239b9('bum): rab kyi sa yang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi don myong de/ rab 'byor 'dis sa dper na tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams kyi 'od la gonas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sem pasamasas
240a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ gnas rtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor/ 
240a2('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub sems dang / 
240a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po chen po rnams kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi
240a4('bum): don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshe gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nas kyi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub ses
240a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi don myed do// de ci'i byar zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang yin
240a6('bum): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs myed pa bstan du myed pa thogs pa myed pa 'di ltaram
240a7('bum): nyid myed par mtshan nyid gcig bsha stag ste/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad gi myed pa yang dag pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// chos thams cad kyang byang chub grong
240a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bya'o// gas yod po bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen thos ma mchis su yang dag pa nyid / 
240b1('bum): ji ltar bslab par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dge ba dang myi dge/ 
240b2('bum): ba dang lung du bstan pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa dang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang / 
240b3('bum): bcas pa dang / kha nas ma tho ba myed pa dang / thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa dag ste/ rab 'byor de de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos thams
240b4('bum): cad gi myed pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes par kyi pha rol tu phyinang po chos thams cad de dag nyid do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig
240b5('bum): rten pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten po'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni phar shes pa mar shes pa dge sbyong du shes pa bram zer
240b6('bum): sa pa/ rigs kyi nang na rgan pa la rim gro byed pa/ sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi/ 
240b7('bum): dngos po dang nyams su blang ba dang / ldan pa'i dngos po dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/ 'di ltar rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang 'bru ba can gi 'du
240b8('bum): shes dang rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus pa'i 'du shes
241a1('bum): dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig 'arten pa'i bsam gtan gzhi dang / tshad myed pa gzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
241a2('bum): dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge' 'dun rjesu dran pa dang / tshul khrin
241a3('bum): rjes su dran pa dang / stong pa rje su dran pa dang / lha rje su dran pa dang / dbugs byi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus gi rnam pa rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjesu dran pa dang / 'chi ba
241a4('bum): rje su dran pa dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig 'arten pa'i chos dge ba'o/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa pa'i chos myi dge ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das gis bka'
241a5('bum): stsal pa/ myi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/ 'di ltar rab 'byor srog gcod pa'i 'jig rten pa'i chos myi dge ba'o// rab 'byor ma byin par len pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos myi dge
241a6('bum): ba'o// rab 'byor 'dod pa'i log par g.yem pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos myi dge ba'o// rab 'byor rgyun du slar ba ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// rab 'byor phra ma ni 'jig rten pa'i chos
241a7('bum): mye dge maso// rab 'byor me gcod pa ni 'dzag rten pa'i chos myi dge ba'o/ rab byor tshig 'khyal ba ni 'jig rten pa'i chos myi dge ba'o// rab 'byor chags sems ni 'dzag rten pam
241a8('bum): chos myong gi 'a'o// rab 'byor gadzad sems na 'dzag nan pa'i chos kyi dge ba'o// rang 'byor log par lta ba na 'tshagazhan pan rgyas su dag 'an/ ra kyi ma
241b1('bum): bdang / mdud par 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang 'che ba dang 'phra dog dang gser sna dang / nga rgyal dang log pa'i nga rgyal ste/ rab 'byor de dag
241b2('bum): ni 'jig rten po'i chos myi dge ba'i/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das lung du ma snyan pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus
241b3('bum): gri las ni lung du ma snyan pa'o// ngag gis las ni lung du ma stan pa'o// yid gi las ni lung du ma snyan pa'o/ 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung du stan pa'o// 
241b4('bum): dbang po lnga ni lung du brtan pa'o// skye ched drug ni lung du rgan pa'o// gzugs myed pa ni bzhi skyes pa ni lung du ma snyan pa'o// phung po rnaMs ni lung du ma stan pa'o// 
241b5('bum): khams rnaMs ni lung du ma rten pa'o// skye mched rnaMs ni lung du ma stan pa'o// rnam par smin pa tham cad ni lung du ma snyan pa'o// rab 'byor de dag ni lung
241b6('bum): ma snyan pa'o// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni lung phung
241b7('bum): bo lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khaMs bco rgya dang / dge ba bcu'i las gi lam dang / bsam gtan gzhi dang / tshad med pa gzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyom par 'jug pa
241b8('bum): bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma rtogs par de ma yin pa'i 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed yod pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos shes bya'o// 
242a1('bum): bya ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa / 
242a2('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa myed pa dang / ma shes pa yongasu shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang yongasasu shes pa'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa rtogs pa'i dbang po rtog pa/ 
242a3('bum): dang bcas pa'i spyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa myed pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa myed cing spyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rig pa dang rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang shes bzhin dang / 
242a4('bum): tshul bzhin yid la bya ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de brgyad gang zhe/ na/ gzugs dang ldan pas gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par/ thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs myed pa'i 'du shes pa dang ldan pas/ 
242a5('bum): phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// stu ga par mos pa 'di ni rnam par gsum pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnas/ 
242a6('bum): nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du ni
242a7('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam shes mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha
242a8('bum): las skye mched las yang dag par 'das te// cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las
242b1('bum): yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed mini skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 
242b2('bum): 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de 'dod pas
242b3('bum): dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye/ 
242b4('bum): bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa spyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa de'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar sgrubs te/ 
242b5('bum): gnas to// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te bde ba lus kyis myo// nga ba 'phags pa rnams kyis de la den pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par
242b6('bum): spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ 
242b7('bum): bde ba yang myed sdug bsngal ba yang myed pa bdang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so gdi nom pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs
242b8('bum): pa'i 'du shes rnam par rngub par nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha yas so zhes nam mkha' mtha yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' ma/ 
243a1('bum): yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam shes mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag
243a2('bum): par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed min skye mched la
243a3('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de ltar mthar kyis gnas pa
243a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi ste/ dang ba nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de/ nga / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong
243a5('bum): ba nyid dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid da dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / 
243a6('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig
243a7('bum): pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang lags/ 
243a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang khams bco brgyad dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs
243b1('bum): byed pa ma rnams par 'jug pa pa zhi dang / mngan pa shes pa lnga dag de/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas par chos zhes byar/ gsa'ang ba bcom ldas das zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos gang sags bam tham pas kyi dang / 
243b2('bum): sul pa/ rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos ni drin pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa pani dang / dbang ba lnga dang stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i ma
243b3('bum): yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par bar ba brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad
243b4('bum): dang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig rab bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi
243b5('bum): chos ma 'dres pa dag ste/ de dag na zag pa myed pa'i chos zhes bya'o// gsolang pa bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi
243b6('bum): chos zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs myed pa'i khams dang / gzhan yang de ma yin pa'i 'dus byas kyi khams su rtogs pa rnams dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang
243b7('bum): dag par spong ba bani dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag 'dun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang bsaH
243b8('bum): gtan pani dang / chang myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa/ 
244a1('bum): stobs bcu dang ma 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya'o// 
244a2('bum): ges yang pa bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni grong la skye ba myed cing 'jig pa myeng pa dang gnas pa las
244a3('bum): gzhan du 'gyur ba myed pa ste/ 'dod chags zad pa zhe sdang zad dpa gti mug zang ba de bzhin nyid ma nor ba'i de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid/ chos nyid chos skyon med pa nyid bsam gyis mi
244a4('bum): pa'i dbyings yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ rab 'byor de de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos shes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan la/ ngas thun mong gi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa/ 
244a5('bum): pa/ rab 'byor thun mong gi chos zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan bzhi drang tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang
244a6('bum): thun mong gi chos zhes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das thun mong ma lags pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni dran pa nye bar bzhag
244a7('bum): pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rna bar/ 
244b1('bum): pabargyad dang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi
244b2('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sa// 
244b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa spyod pas rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa myed pas chags par myi bya'o// chos thams cad gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa myed cing rnam/ 
244b4('bum): par rtog pa myed pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad khong du chud bar bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'dis da ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang 'ang byang chub sems dpa' ses
244b5('bum): dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la ba/ rab 'byorang sems can gi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed par
244b6('bum): gyur pas de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sems can ga phung po chen po nges pa de lta bu'i phul byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyid par gyur
244b7('bum): ba de lta bu'i sems can gi phung po chen po nges pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang ba/ rab 'byorang sems can gi phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni// rigs kyi sa dang brgyad pa'i sa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / 
244b8('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pon
245a1('bum): par dag ste/ rab 'byor de ni sems can gi phung po nges pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na ji lta bu'i phul byed par 'gyur ro// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos jiH/ 
245a2('bum): lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gi phung po nges pa'i phul zhes bya'o// gsomed pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chu/ 
245a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'khor ba dpag tu myed par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o// bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar bya'o// bdag gis
245a4('bum): sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// de ltar sems can thams cad yongs su
245a5('bum): mya ngan las bzlas kyang sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa myed pas chos thams cad skye ba myed pa dang 'gag ba myang ba bdag gis shes par bya'o// bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i rnams/ 
245a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gi sems gos pha rol tu phyinang pa drug la spyad par bya'o// bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad gi rjes su 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa la bslab par bya'o// bdag gis chos kyi tshul gcig tu/ 
245a7('bum): bsgrub pa khong du chung bar bya'o// bdag gis chos dpag tu myed pa thams cad yongasu bsgrub pa la bslab par bya'o// snyam du sems bskyed pa/ rib 'argyang de'ini byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rjes/ 
245a8('bum): bu ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi phung ba chen po chen po myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 
245b1('bum): mamame pa sa rgyag nga/ ma na nathams sa rjes lazug pa la cho sa su myong 'i drug sa gang ba dag pasas sa dag nga
245b2('bum): bla'o snyam du sems bskyed do// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal ba bya ba khrag khrig brgya snang mang por sems can gang / 
245b3('bum): yang phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag kyang bdag gi nyam su myong bar bya'o zhes thabs de lta bus sems can thams cad kyi/ 
245b4('bum): don du sems can thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das dpa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang nyams su myong bar bya'o// 
245b5('bum): de nas rjod bdag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de skal pabye ba khrag khri ga brgya stong du mar byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bsags te/ blam myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tsha ma
245b6('bum): bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor da 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can gyi gyi
245b7('bum): po nges pa'i phul du myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu rgyun mi 'tshang ba rlabs po che'i sems gang gis sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba / 
245b8('bum): la bu'i sems rlabs po che bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'dod chags kyi sems ma bskyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi bskyed rtsi mug gi/ 
246a1('bum): sems mi bskyed/ rtse ba'i sems myi skyed/ nyan thos kyi sems mi skyed/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems myi skyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o// des sems
246a2('bum): can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang sems can rlabs po che des rlom sems su myi bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi sgul ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa'
246a3('bum): dpa' chen po'i sems mi skul ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed cing des rlom sems su myi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba'o// 
246a4('bum): des sems can thams cad kyi phul du myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'a gyur ro// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems/ dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i sems
246a5('bum): bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems ni sems can thams cad la skyob cing sems can thams cad yongs su mi rtong la/ des rlom semasu 'gyur/ 
246a6('bum): ba myed pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems te/ de la gnas shing sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan
246a7('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos 'dod par bya'o// chos la dga' bar bya'o// chos la mos par bya'o// de la chos gang zhe na/ chos thams cad dbyer myed pa ste 'di ni chos zhes bya'o/ 
246a8('bum): de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos chos de la mos cing 'dod pa ste/ 'di ni chos 'dod pa'o// de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya
246b1('bum): de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na/ chos de la yon tan du lta ba ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la sgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos la mos
246b2('bum): pa'i rnal 'byor pa brtson pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul myi dmyigs pa
246b3('bum): tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas// nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phya stong pa nyid la gnas phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas
246b4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ cho po stong pa nyid la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gan sa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma myedapa
246b5('bum): stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba myed pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid
246b6('bum): sa gnas/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ ngo bo nyid la gnas dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub
246b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gas rab kyi pha lang tu phyind pa la spyod pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sa gnas/ yang dag par spang ba rnams la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas/ dang / 
246b8('bum): po rnams la gnas/ stobs rnams la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas/ bsam gtan rnams
247a1('bum): la gnas tshad myed pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par thard pa rnams la gnas/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam pa/ 
247a2('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la gnas/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la
247a3('bum): gnas/ mya 'jigs pa rnams la gnas/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas/ byams pa chen po la gnas snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas te/ sems
247a4('bum): can gi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi das 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dadapa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas
247a5('bum): dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ seng ge rnam par brtse ba'i ting nge la dzin la gnas/ zla ba bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba rgyal
247a6('bum): mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad gi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas
247a7('bum): chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad la 'jug po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin la rgyal
247a8('bum): bo ltar rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dpung rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nges pa'i tshig
247b1('bum): ma rngon mi za bar 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas// tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ phyogs bcu rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
247b2('bum): la gnas// nyam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' rgyas pas 'grengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge/ 
247b3('bum): 'dzin la gnas/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dbang po dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas rgyun gi rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge
247b4('bum): 'dzin la gnas snrel gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyon mong ngas pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam par spong ba'i ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ tshol ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas gnas la rten
247b5('bum): pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems myed pa'i ting nge la/ dzin la gnas/ dri ma myed pa'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gan/ sa/ 'od mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od byed pa'i
247b6('bum): nge 'dzin la gnas/ kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od dri ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dga' ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la la gnas/ klog gi ts+tshaH/ 
247b7('bum): ma tong nge 'azhi la gnas/ da ci shes pa'i ting 'dzin la gnas/ mi 'bas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gzi ba rjid yod pa'i dang 'dzin la gnas/ zad pa dang dral pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mig ma ma/ 
247b8('bum): gadzin la gnas/ 'jigs pa skyed pa'i ting 'dzin la gas/ nam smon ma ting nge 'dzin pa gnas/ zla ba dri ma myed pa'i nga 'dzin la gnas/ shes rab sgo ma ti nge 'dzin la gdas / snang bags sa pa'i'i tshe
248a1('bum): la gnas snang ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ye shes dpal gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas kun tu snang / 
248a2('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rin chen mtha'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dga'
248a3('bum): spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos kyis 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam par 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas yi ge mnyam par 'god pa'i ting
248a4('bum): nge 'dzin la gnas/ yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dmyigs pa gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'gyur ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas ming nges
248a5('bum): par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas myed par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rab rib myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas spyod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas g.yo ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa
248a6('bum): gnas/ g.yul las rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yon tan thams cad kyi tshigs su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems myed par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba'i na
248a7('bum): nge 'dzizhi la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mi mnye ba dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thas cad las 'ad ba'i ting rje
248a8('bum): 'dzin la gnas yongs su gcod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nem nur rnam par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas su bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gcig tu rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gar+b+ha
248b1('bum): rnam par mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam par 'dor ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa 'i ting nge 'dzin lags
248b2('bum): bda' dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba'i ting zlange 'dzin la gnas/ sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas mngon par dmyigs me
248b3('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba thams cad la mngon par dga' ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge/ 
248b4('bum): 'dzin la gnas/ gzungs kyi blo gros kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yang dag pa dang log pa dang thams cad yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba'i ting

249a1('bum): ga'i sems pa skyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' sa rU pa'i ting nge lazhis gnas/ nam mnga' sa
249a2('bum): chags pa myed pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor chos de dag la gnas ni/

249a7('bum): rnams la chos ston pa dang / sems can du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / srog tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gso bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / skyes bur lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /

249b1('bum): lta ba la rab tu spang ba dang / tshor ba po lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshor du 'jug pa por lta bla spong ba dang / shes pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mthong ba bor lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chang par lta ba rab tu spang ba /

249b5('bum): rab tu spang ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden par lta ba rab tu smra nga ba dang / bsam gtan du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang tshad myed par lta/ 
249b6('bum): ba rab tu spang ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rnam par thar par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /

250a1('bum): snying ni chen por lta ba ra tus dang / sa dus kyi rgyamam grel bya rang tu snang ba dang / chos can ma su sbyin par bya ba lta bar byas pa dang / ma pan m+b+hig+sa sangs rgyas kyi ning sa u dag par bya lta sa sa dang / byang nu sul pa ma sa sungs su pa sa dang/ nasu byas sa shA dge sun du su btus ma ma skor ba
250a2('bum): lta ba rab tu spang ba dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das par lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston par bgyid kyang / de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/ de'i slad du byang /

251a1('bum): stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin

251a3('bum): ba yin rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/

251b1('bum): masas dan pa skyab sa ma tha / sa [ऽ] / sa gyu
252a1('bum): gyis lta bskyed do// myig gi rnam par shes par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// sna'i rnam par shes par dmyigs
252a2('bum): shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// lce'i rnamar shes par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed do// lus kyi rnam par shes par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// yid kyi rnam par shes
252a3('bum): par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed do// myig gi 'dus te reg par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sna'i run

252a6('bum): sbyin kyis char bar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gas sku bskyed do// snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshar bar dmyigs shi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis la bskyed do// klu'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmyigs zhing kyis/

252a8('bum): pa'i khams su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ga bskyed do// chu'i khams su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgo ba skyed do// me'i khams su dmyigs shi'i myigs pa'i tshul gis lba ba skyed do// rlung gi kham su dbyig/ 
252b1('bum): rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis la bskyed do// nam ma kha yi rnams su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lha bskyed do// rnam par shes pa khams su dmyigs shing myigs pa'i tshul gis swa bskyed do// ma rig par myig
252b2('bum): gang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// 'du byed du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// rnam par shes par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta bskyed do// mying dang gzugs su dmyigs shing
252b3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// skye mched drug tu dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rig par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// tshor bar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta
