252b6('bum): pha rolang du phyinin par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lha bskyed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi sa lnga bskyed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind par dmyigs ni/ 
252b7('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// bsam gtan gi pha rolang tu phyind par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis la bskyed do/ nang sto/ 
252b8('bum): kha nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis la bsgra dang / phyi stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis sde bskyed do// phyi ning srung ba nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sa bskyed do// slong pa nyid mongs
253a1('bum): nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// chen po stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ltad
253a2('bum): skyed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs
253a3('bum): shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed
253a4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa 'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dmyi/ 
253a5('bum): shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul
253a6('bum): gyis lta bskyed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa 'i tshul gis lta ba skyed do/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag
253a7('bum): bar dmyigaso shing dmyigs sgra'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// yang dag par spong bar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed do/ 
253a8('bum): dbang por dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// stobs su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed do// byang chub kyi yan lag du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// 'phags pa'i/ 
253b1('bum): mam yun meg brgyad par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// 'phags pa'i bden par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// bsam gtan du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgru ba
253b2('bum): skyed do// tshad med par 'damyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug par 'jug par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rnam par thar par dmyigs
253b3('bum): shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed
253b4('bum): par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// mngon par shes par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta'o/ ting nge 'dzin du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// gzungs kyi sgo
253b5('bum): dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// de bzhin ga/ shegs pa'i stobs su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// mi 'jigs par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul
253b6('bum): rgyas lha bskyod do// so so yang dag par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta bskyed do// byams pa chen por dmyigs shing myi gas po'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// snying rje chen por dmyigs
253b7('bum): shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// sems can yongs su smin par bya bar dmyi gas shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba
253b8('bum): byed do/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// byang chub tu dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis la bskyed/ sangs rgyas su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
254a1('bum): lta ba skyed do// chos su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// dge 'dun du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul
254a2('bum): gyis lta ba skyed do// yongs su mya ngan las 'ang bar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba
254a3('bum): tshor bar lta ba dang 'du shes su lta ba dang / 'du byed du lta ba dang rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir myig tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna bar lta ba dang sngar lta ba dang / lcer lta ba dang lus su lta
254a4('bum): dang yid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir gzugs su lta bar 'gyur/ rab yin/ slar lta ba dang drir lta ba dang / ror lta ba dang reg tu lta ba dang / chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir myi
254a5('bum): rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes par lta/ ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa lta ba dang / lce'i rnam par she/ sa par lta ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes par
254a6('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir myig gi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang sna'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / lde'i 'dus te reg par lta/ 
254a7('bum): ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen/ 
254a8('bum): kyis tshor bar lta ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar la ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin// de ma
254a9('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta ba nga / 
254b1('bum): de kyiches kyi khams su smra par 'gyur ba yin/ rtswa khams su lta ba dang / me'i khams sus pa dang / drang gi khams su lta ba dang / rnam ma lazhi khams su sa pa dang / rnam pa shes pamigs su / 
254b2('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir ma rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du byed du lta ba dang rnam par shes par lta ba dang / mying dang gzugs su lta ba dang skye mched drug tu lta ba dang / reg par lta ba dang / tshor bar sna ba / 
254b3('bum): sred par lta ba dang len par lta ba dang / srid par lta ba dang skye bar lta ba dang / rga shir lta ba zung de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa ra lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
254b4('bum): bar lta ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind par lci ba dang / bsam gtagyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
254b5('bum): tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin// de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid du / bar 'gyur ba yin/ phyi stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / phyi nang stong po nyid du lta ba dang / song pa nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / chen na/ 
254b6('bum): stong ba nyid du lta ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / 'dus byas stong ba nying du lta ba dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / thog ma
254b7('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid du lta bo dang / rang bzhin stong ba nyid du la ba dang / chos thams cad stong ba nyid du lta ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid du lta ba dang / rmyi
254b8('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag par lta bar
255a1('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ yang dag par spong bar lta ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang par lta ba dang / dbang po sa pa dang / stobs su lta ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam du bar 'gyur ba yin/ de phyir 'phags pa
255a2('bum): bden par 'gyur ba yin na bsam gtan du lta ba dang / tshad med par lta ba dang // gzug myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba dang / rnam par thar bapar lta ba dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par / 
255a3('bum): ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes par lta ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du lta ba dang gzungs kyi sgor lta bar 'gyur ba yin// de'i phyir de bzhin gshes
255a4('bum): ba'i stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yodadas su dag par bya/ mi 'jigs par lta ba dang / so so yang da dag par rig par lta ba dang / snying rje chen por lta ba dang / sangs rgyas
255a5('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir sem sa can yongs su smin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta bar/ 
255a6('bum): sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang dge 'dun du lta ba dang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'ang bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenan
255a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spangs pa'i phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la ni
255a8('bum): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis spobs pa skyed
255b1('bum): cig/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu yang chags/ 
255b2('bum): pa ma mchis pa de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag pa ma mchis shing khongasu chud pa mchis
255b3('bum): ste/ de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum gi khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la 'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis
255b4('bum): ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' ni sems dpa' chen po'i drangs su mchi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i dbus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga la 'ang skad ces smras so// 
255b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems da pa' chen po sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i seMs
255b6('bum): gang yin/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ta'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad chos gang yang skye bar yang dag par rjes
255b7('bum): su mi mthong ba dang / 'gag pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byung bar yang dag par rje su myi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha/ 
255b8('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu gang la skye ba myed cing 'gag pa myed pa dang 'phel ba myed cing 'grib pa myed pa dang / 'ong ba myed cing 'gro ba myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed cing rnam par byang ba myed pa de la nyan thos kyi
256a1('bum): sems myed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi sems myed do// byang chub sems dpa'i sems myed do// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems
256a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de gang khyod kyis 'di skad/ 
256a3('bum): du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa myed pa khongs su chud pa myed pa de lta bu'i sems de la yang chags pa myed do// zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bas na gzugs kyang chag pa
256a4('bum): myed do// tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// 'du shes kyang chags pa/ myed do// 'du byed kyang chags pa myed do// rnam par shes pa ya dang chags pa myed do// myig kyang chags pa myed do// rna ba yang chags/ 
256a5('bum): ba myed do snga yang chags pa myed do// lce yang chags pa myed do// lus kyang chags pa myed do// yid kyang chags pa myed do// gzu gas kyang chags pa myed do// sgra yang chags pa myed do// dri yang chags
256a6('bum): ba myed do// ro yang chags pa myed do reg kyang chags pa myed do// chos kyang chags pa myed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa yang
256a7('bum): chags pa myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do// 'i
256a8('bum): 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do// 
256b1('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi/ 
256b2('bum): tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// sa'i khams kyang chags pa myed do// chu'i khams kyang
256b3('bum): chags pa myed do// me'i khams kyang chags pa myed do// rlung gi khams kyang chags pa myed do// nam mkha'i khams kyang chags pa myed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chags pa myed do// ma rig pa yang chags pa myed do// 
256b4('bum): 'du byed kyang chags pa myed do// rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed/ mying dang gzugs kyang chags pa myed do// skye mched drug kyang / dgas pa myed do// reg pa yang chags pa myed do// tshor ba yang chags pa
256b5('bum): myed rje/ sred pa yang chags pa myed do// len pa yang chags pa/ myed do// srid pa yang chags pa myong ngo // skyo ba yang chags brgya ngo // rga shi yang chags pa myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ya
256b6('bum): chags pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa myed do// bsam gtan gyis
256b7('bum): rol tu phyind pa yang chags pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang chags pa myed do// nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed/ 
256b8('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed
257a1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// chos
257a2('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kya/ 
257a3('bum): chags pa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rjes kyang chags pa
257a4('bum): myed do// dbang po rnams kyang chags pa myed do// stobs rnams kyang chags pa myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chags pa ste nga dngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa lnga chags pa myong ngo // 'phag/ 
257a5('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams la chags pa myed do// bsam gtan rnams kyang chags pa myed do// tshad myed pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// gtsu gas myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// 
257a6('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yang chags pa myed de/ 
257a7('bum): mngad pa shes pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chags pa myed nga/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang chags pa myod do// 'jigs pa mas
257a8('bum): chags brkyang / sa so mang dag par rig pa rnams kyang chags pa myed de/ ming rje chen po yang chags pa myed nga/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chags pa myed de/ mes pa dgas pa nyid kyang chashes pa myed do das
257b1('bum): garnam pa zhes pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chags pa skyed do// rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ni dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa myed do// ba yang chags
257b2('bum): ba myed do 'du shes kyang chags pa myed do// 'du byed kyang chags pa myed do// rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do// myig kyang chags pa myed do// rna ba yang chags pa myed do// sngo yang chags pa myed do// lho yang chags pamyed do/ 
257b3('bum): lus kyang chags pa myed do// yid kyang chags pa myed do// gzugs kyang chags pa myed do// sgra yang chags pa myed do// dri yang chags pa myed do// ro yang chags pa myed do// reg kyang chags pa myed do// chos kyang chags pa
257b4('bum): myed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do// rna ba'i ni/ dam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do// lus kyi rna
257b5('bum): par shes pa yang chags pa myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang / chags pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yang chags pa myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang
257b6('bum): chags pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chag
257b7('bum): ba myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa mye // sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis/ 
257b8('bum): tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed // sa'i khams kyang chags pa myed do// chu'i khams kyang chags pa myed do// me'i khams chags pa myed do// rlung gi khams pa myed/ 
258a1('bum): nam ma kha'i khams kyang chags pa myed nga/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chags pa myed do// ma rig pa yang chags pa myed do// 'du byed kyang chags pa skyed do// rnam par shes pas nags pa byed do/ phyin
258a2('bum): gzugs kyang chags pa myed do// skye mched drug kyang chags pa myed do// reg pa yang chags pa myed do// tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// sred pa yang chags pa myed do// lon pa yang chags pa myed do// srid pa yang chags paskye
258a3('bum): do/ skye ba yang chags pa myed do rga shi yang chags pa myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yang chags pa myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa
258a4('bum): myed de/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa myed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang chags pa myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa myed do// nang stong
258a5('bum): ba nyid kyang chags pa myed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid da kyang chags pa myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// 
258a6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// thog ma dang tha myang ba
258a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang
258a8('bum): ba myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// ngo na nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// dran
258b1('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// dbang po rnams kyang chags pa myed do// stobs rnams kyang chags pa myed do// stobs rnams kyang chags pa myed do// byang chub kyi yan/ 
258b2('bum): lag rnams kyang chags pa myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang chags pa myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// bsam gtan rnams lnga chags pa myed do// tshado med pa rnams la
258b3('bum): chags pa myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa myed do// rnam par thar pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang chags pa myed do// rnam par tha
258b4('bum): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yang chags pa mye dra // mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang chags pa myed do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams
258b5('bum): kyang chags pa skyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs rnams kyang chags bskyed do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms pamyi 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa skyed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi
258b6('bum): chags paskyed don/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang chags pa myed de/ byams pa chen po yang chags pa myed do// snying rje chen po yang chags pa myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do// 
258b7('bum): thams ca shis pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang tshogs pa myed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa 'byor kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
258b8('bum): kyi sems de yang gang zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de der yang ma zad de/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su
259a1('bum): chud pa myed do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// rab 'byor kyis smras
259a2('bum): pa/ de yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// nyan thos rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 
259a3('bum): zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin
259a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de de lta yin na/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa med
259a5('bum): tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongasu chud pa myed do// 'du shes kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir za ga pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// 'du byed kyang rang bzhin sto/ 
259a6('bum): ba nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhini stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// myig kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongasu
259a7('bum): chung ba myed de/ rna ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// sna yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// lce yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zagapa
259a8('bum): myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// lus kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chung ba myed do// yid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongasasu chud ba myed do// gzugs kyang rang bzhin sto / 
259b1('bum): nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed de/ sgra yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chung ba myed do// dri yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed ci khongs su chud ba myed do// yang
259b2('bum): bzhin spong ba nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// reg kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ chos kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa skyed cing khongasu chung ba
259b3('bum): drug gi rnam par gas pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// rna ba rnam pal shes pa m-i zug pa myed cing khongs su chud byed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa su na ba ma
259b4('bum): nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do/ lce'i rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir bga'i myong/ gcing khongs su chung ba myed do/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang zag
259b5('bum): sbed po yongs su chud dang byed de/ yid kyi rnam pa shes / yang rang bzhini stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed pong 'angs su myong mye dang/ phyag gi 'dus te dag pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid
259b6('bum): ciga'i skyes pangos su chung ba skyed do/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhinin stong pa nyid kyi phyir ga pa myed cing khongs su nung bskyed do/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir rtag pa myed ci rdzom
259b7('bum): surung ba skyed do/ mra'i 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chung ba myod
259b8('bum): 'ad kyi 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pamyed cing khongs su srung ba myed do/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang rang bzhin spong ba nyid kyi phyi'i zag pa myed cing yongs su chud ba myed do// 
260a1('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rkyen kyis tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// skye sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba
260a2('bum): mye // lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang rang bzhizhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chung ba myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chung ba myed do/ 
260a3('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyes kyis tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do/ sa'i khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// chu'i khams kyang
260a4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// dmo'i khams rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// rlung gi khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir
260a5('bum): pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// nam mkha'i khams kyang rang na stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// rnam par zhes pa'i khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa
260a6('bum): myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// ma rig pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// 'du byed kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing / khongs su chud pa myed do// rnam par shes pa yang / 
260a7('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// mying dang gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongasu chud pa myed do// skye mched drug kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing
260a8('bum): khongs su chud pa myed do// reg pa yang rang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// sred pa 'ang rang bzhin
260b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// len pa 'ang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongasasu chud pa myed do// srid pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongasu
260b2('bum): chung ba myed do// skye ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// rga shi yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang rang
260b3('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang rang
260b4('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// bsam gtan gyi
260b5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa / da cing khongs su chud ba myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su
260b6('bum): chung ba myed do// nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// phyi nang stong pa
260b7('bum): nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongasu chud pa myed cing rnam par ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang rang
260b8('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chung ba myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi
261a1('bum): phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myong ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud ba myed do// mtha' las 'ongs pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin sto
261a2('bum): nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongasu

261a4('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// myi dmyigs pa so/ dpa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyira'i zag pa myed cing khongs
261a5('bum): su chung ba myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag
261a6('bum): myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid/ 
261a7('bum): kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chung ba myed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong / 
261a8('bum): nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su rung ba myed do/ dpung po rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khong su chud ba myed do// spobs rnams kyang 'dra bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir thog pa myi
261b1('bum): khongs su chud ba myed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyi
261b2('bum): zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// bsam gtan rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir
261b3('bum): zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do/ tshad myed pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// gzugs myed pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams kyang ra

261b5('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rang ba/ zhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ngu myed do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
261b6('bum): myeng pa dang smon pa myed pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chung ba myed do/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su

261b8('bum): khongs su chung ba myed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag po myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid

262a5('bum): pa de bzhin byed/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa mye da cing khongs su chud ba myed do// tshor bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// 'du shes rang bzhin

262b6('bum): cing khongs su chud ba myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin sgo nga ba nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing kho
262b7('bum): su chung ba byed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing yongs su chung ba myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa skyed cing khongs su chung ba myong // sus kyi
262b8('bum): 'du te ga pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag bskyed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// yid kyi lus te reg pa yang ra bzhini stong pa nyid kyi phyir bag pa skyed ci khongs su chud ba byed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa las blang
263a1('bum): sus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su

263a5('bum): su chud pa myed do// 'du byed kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// mying dang gzugs

263b3('bum): rga shi yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyin

263b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed kyi/ nga khongs su chud ba myed do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa
263b6('bum): myed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// nang stong pa nyid kyang rang ba zhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongasasu chud ba myed do// phyi stong pa
263b7('bum): nyid kyang rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chung ba myed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa
263b8('bum): nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// don de pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su
264a1('bum): chung ba myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// 'dus ma byas kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongasu chung ba myed do// mtha
264a2('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud ba myed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chung ba myed do// dor bskye
264a3('bum): ba stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// rlung bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir /

269b7('bum): rnams la chags pa myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa myong ba yang so so yang dag par rig pa sto ni/ khang chags pa myed do// byams pa chen po myed pa yang byams pa chen po la chags pa myed

270a1('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid myed pa yang thams cad shes pa nyid la chags pa myed do// lam gi rnam pa nyid myed pa yang lam gi rnam pa nyid la chags pa myed do// rnam pa zas cad mkhyen pa nyid
270a2('bum): myed pa yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ byang chub kyi seMs mi mi
270a3('bum): pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad la dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba myed/ mngon par chags par
270a4('bum): bi myed pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ad/ 
270a5('bum): don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkam stsal ba/ gang po khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig/ gang pos gso
270a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni thog pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags te/ de ni theg pa chen po yang dag par gnas pa'i
270a7('bum): sems can lags pas de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' zhes bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa ga
270a8('bum): ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sos can nyung zad / 
270b1('bum): me zhig gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rolal tu phyin pa la gnas shing sbyin pa'i pha yongasu tong ba ma yin gi sems can gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs tshong / sems can nyung zad nyi ci'i don/ 
270b2('bum): du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sa gnas shing tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gi sems can thams cad kyi don du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khyim sa srung ngo // sems can nyung zad ni ci'i phyir
270b3('bum): bzod pa 'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing bzod pa sgom pa ma yin gi/ sems can thams cad gi don du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bzod pa sgom mo// sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir
270b4('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus rtsi pha pa ma yin gi sems can thams cad kyi ma yin du brtson 'gru/ nas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems
270b5('bum): can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing bsam gtan skyed pa ma yin gi/ sems can gyi don du bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bsam rten
270b6('bum): skyed do// sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing shes rab sgom pa ma yin gi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing shes rab sgo
270b7('bum): mo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// seMs can 'di snyed cig ni yongasu
270b8('bum): mya ngan las bzla bar myi bya'o zhes sam/ sems can 'di snyed cig tu byang chub tu dgod par bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par myi bya'o// zhes sems can dpag pas go cha mi gyon gi bya
271a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi go cha gyon to// de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o sas
271a2('bum): nan thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang tshul khrims kyi pharo/ 
271a3('bum): tu phyinang pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// seMs can thams cad kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyu
271a4('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa del sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol// 
271a5('bum): phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyar bar bya/ bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongasasu / 
271a6('bum): bar bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang nang stong ba nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang nang stong pa
271a7('bum): nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang phyi stong pa nyid yong su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang phyi stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang stong pa nyid song ba nyid yongs su rdzogs
271a8('bum): par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang spong ba nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ seMs tsan mas so n+de po stong pa nyid la su rdzogasu na
271b1('bum): bya'o// bdag gis kyang don de pa stong pa nyid yongasasu rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
271b2('bum): bya'o sems can thams cad kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la sbya
271b3('bum): bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang thog ma dang tha ma myo
271b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dor ba myong ba stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// sos
271b5('bum): can thams cad kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// ba8/ ga gis kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la sbyar ba/ 
271b6('bum): bya'o// bdag gis kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang chos thams cad stong nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang rang gi mtshan nyid so/ 
271b7('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thos
271b8('bum): cad kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag
272a1('bum): seMs can thos cad kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi pa sbyar bar bya'o// 
272a2('bum): gyis kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid song su rdzogs par bya
272a3('bum): sems can thams cad kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o/ 
272a4('bum): bdag gis kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas par bya'o// bdag gis kyang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang
272a5('bum): dbang po lnga la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dbang po lnga la snyam par bya'o// bdag gis kyang stobs lnga la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang stobs lnga la sbyar bar bya'o// 
272a6('bum): bdag gis kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la// sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
272a7('bum): brgyad pa la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang 'phags po'i bden pa rnams gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang
272a8('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang bsam gtan rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang tshad myed pa rnams
272a9('bum): po gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang tshad med pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang gzum
272b1('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang mthar kyis
272b2('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
272b3('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang mngon par shes pa rnaMs lagan
272b4('bum): par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// 
272b5('bum): bdag kyang gdungs na kyi sgo rnams la gnas par bya'o// semasacan thams cad kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/ de bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas par byan
272b6('bum): mas cad kya ba de bzhin gagags pa'i stobs brgyas skyer bar bya'o// bdag kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhis gnas par byor// sems can thams cad kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la sbya ba cu / 
272b7('bum): bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang snying rje chen po la gnas par bya'o// sems can
272b8('bum): thams cad kyang snying rje chen po la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spya
272b9('bum): bya'o// zhes byam seMs bskyed par bya'o// mi dang ldan pa ga ra dwa ti la bu de tsam gi sen/ byang chub sems dpa' soms dpa' chen po gas chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shar dra'i hU~M
273a1('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ sbyin pa gang yongasu rtod pa de dag nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin/ 
273a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su rtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su
273a3('bum): bsngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su rtong pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
273a4('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin/ pa yongs su rtong zhing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du
273a5('bum): yongs su mo bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su rtong pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
273a6('bum): kha'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba la sbyin pa yongasu rtong zhing chos
273a7('bum): dag la bzod pa dang mos pa dang rten pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa'i pharold tu phyind pa yangasu dong ba'i bzod
273a8('bum): pha rold tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ta'i bu gzhan yang byang chub se sa? dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa yongasu rtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa
273b1('bum): yid la bya bas brtson 'grus nyams par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su rtong pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du
273b2('bum): phyi nad pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su rtong pa'i tshe/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas se
273b3('bum): rtse gcig tu byed cing de la dmyigs pa gcig pa'i phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod
273b4('bum): cing sbyin pa yongs su rtong pa'i Shasaits+li k+ki'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha/ 'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha re dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems/ dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongasu
273b5('bum): rnyong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ des sbyin pa yang myi dmyigs rtong pa yang myi dmyigs/ len pa yang myi dmya
273b6('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongasu rtong pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi ning pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nas byang chub sems da
273b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa de dag mtshan mar byed cing myi dmyigs pa de'i tshe/ byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
273b8('bum): tu phyin pa la skyong ba'i ci/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go ma chen po bgos par shes par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa'
274a1('bum): gcen po chug khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa gang yongasu spyod pa de sems can thams cad dang thun mong dbyas shing zu bye
274a2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan
274a3('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'ang mos
274a4('bum): mi skyed na/ so so skye bo'i sa lta smos kyang mi smos pa 'di ni byang chub sos dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
274a5('bum): dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khri// mas kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / de dag la bzod pa dang / 
274a6('bum): mos pa dang rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ses
274a7('bum): chen po rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus nye bar mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi
274a8('bum): pa la spyod pa'i rtson 'grus kyi pha rol na byin dpa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
274b1('bum): su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems das
274b2('bum): rten po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya mas ma yin kI/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha romad dutu phyin pa'i spyod pa'i chi/ chos thams cad sgyum byas zhing / 
274b3('bum): rbu zhes nye par gnas chul khrims kyi des rlom sem su ma byed de/ rang bani na stong pa nyid kyi phyi'i tshul khrims de yang myi phyogs shing dge da'i dri bde yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla byed
274b4('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa mo// tshe dang ldan pa
274b5('bum): ka ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chug khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyinin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de ci'i phyir go mchen po bgros nas rgya
274b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha ro lang tu phyin pa dpyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan rdzom/ 
274b7('bum): yid la bya ba sbyin pan yongs su rtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thon mong du byas shing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen no// 
275a1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang
275a2('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ 
275a3('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa/ 
275a4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang / 
275a5('bum): mos pa dang rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
275a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'am
275a7('bum): nye bar myi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub se sang
275a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas mthod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sems rtse gcig
275b1('bum): tu byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa 'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
275b2('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba sa ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes te/ 
275b3('bum): bar gnas te/ bzod pa de rlom sems su myi byed cing myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sos
275b4('bum): dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha ro// tu phyind pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chu
275b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bas ma yin gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa/ 
275b6('bum): yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su rtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ches
275b7('bum): bo brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan pang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan
275b8('bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ 
276a1('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bya/ 
276a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod ci
276a3('bum): chos de dag de ltar bzod pa dang mos pa dang rten pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
276a4('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi/ 
276a5('bum): pha rolang tu phyin pa spyod cing sems can thams cad kyi don dugabartson 'grus nyam par myi byed cing / btun mi mnga' bas 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha
276a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin ni
276a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan bI yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti/ 
276a8('bum): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thas cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du
276b1('bum): shes nye bar gnas te/ brtson 'grus des rlom sems su myi byed de/ brtson 'grus de yang myi dmyigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
276b2('bum): byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
276b3('bum): rten pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
276b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa/ 'i yid la bya ba ma yin gi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
276b5('bum): ba'i yid la bya bas tshul khris srung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang se mas can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub se
276b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha
276b7('bum): rolang du phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims srung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams
276b8('bum): dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
277a1('bum): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / 
277a2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa yongs su sgom ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyis
277a3('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ 
277a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus nyam par myi byed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun
277a5('bum): mong du byas shing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa le spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha
277a6('bum): dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ de
277a7('bum): dmyigs pa gcig pa'i phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi gro 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
277a8('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa le spyod pa'i bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po
277b1('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bsam gtan des kyang bsam gtan des kyang rlom sems su myi byed cing / bsam gtan yang
277b2('bum): dmyigs te dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi
277b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyinang pa drug po thams cad yongs
277b4('bum): 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan dbe sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rtse nu bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang
277b5('bum): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gi/ rnam pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'khor ba/ sum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yongasu rtong ste dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang
277b6('bum): sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
277b7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin 'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
277b8('bum): ma yin gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/ 
278a1('bum): yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold/ 
278a2('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa la mos shing rten te/ dge ba'i rtse ba de/ 
278a3('bum): yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha/ 
278a4('bum): re dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
278a5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus nyam par myi byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasasu bsngo ba 'di/ 
278a6('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos pa
278a7('bum): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba sems rtse gcig tu byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed
278a8('bum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyinang pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa
278b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes gnas te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan gyi/ 
278b2('bum): yid la bya bas ma yin gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
278b3('bum): bsngo ba 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lda
278b4('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba'i sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag dang / sem das can dang byang chub la mtshan mar byed cing myi dmyigs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
278b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas shing pha rol tu phyin pa
278b6('bum): drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang mnya
278b7('bum): bar 'jog ste/ bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang / gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams kyi myong bar myi byed do// bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang
278b8('bum): mi 'phrogs te/ bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis dang mi skye'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
279a1('bum): gzabs mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa ga ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang cang myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la bden pa dang / 
279a2('bum): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa mthong bas mnyam par 'jog ste/ de dag gi dbang gis dang mi skye yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang myi byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to// 
279a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' seMs/ 
279a4('bum): dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// bam po bcu dgu pa'o// // / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ta'i bu byang chub sems
279a5('bum): dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa la/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi kham sa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhug sa rnams ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing / ming yongs su sgrog pa mdza
279a6('bum): de 'jig rten gi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul/ 
279a7('bum): gis rnam par brtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du
279a8('bum): brjod pa ched du brjod cing / mying yongs su spogs pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongasu sbyin
279b1('bum): bar byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par brtse'o zhes sgra brjod par mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi klung gi bye ma snyed da// 
279b2('bum): ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing mying yongasu sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen
279b3('bum): po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par brtse'o// zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// byang
279b4('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye mo snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing mying yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten
279b5('bum): gi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen na/ 'i go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ 
279b6('bum): rdzu 'phrul gis rnam par brtse'o// zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ byang shar gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhug
279b7('bum): brjes kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongs su sgrog par mdzad de/ 'jig rten gi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig
279b8('bum): sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gis rnam par brtse'o zhes sgra marjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi
280a1('bum): 'jig rten gi lus gang ga'i rlung gi byes srid dag na/ sangs rgyas mam ldan 'das zhugs pa rnams kyang rnyeng du brjod paci du brjo mying yongs su stsogs pa mdzad de/ 'ag rten ni
280a2('bum): mi go ma zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go che chen po bags pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par brtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing bya
280a3('bum): rjes su sgrog go// lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgon/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du
280a4('bum): pa ched du brjod cing mying yongs su sgrogs pa mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi/ khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig seMs can yongs su/ 
280a5('bum): smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par byed do// rtswa phrul gis rnam par ban+de'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams
280a6('bum): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing mying yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpal
280a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed de rdzu 'phrul gis rnam par brtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs
280a8('bum): rjes su sgrog go/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing mying yongasu sgrogs pa mdzad de 'jin
280b1('bum): rkyen gi khams che go mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ko cha bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongasu smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gis rnam par brtsen
280b2('bum): zhes smra brjod pa mdzad cing mdabyangs rjes su sgrog go/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klub gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing
280b3('bum): mying yongs su b+h+yo smra ba mdzad de/ 'jig rten gi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongasu sbyin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
280b4('bum): dag par byed do/ rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par brje'o zhes sgra brjod pa / dra cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po lnga
280b5('bum): dag par zhugs zhes bya byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// 'di gang yin gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin
280b6('bum): badrug la spyo nga / de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing 'dod bas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa spyod pa dang bcas pa dben sas skyes smra'i dga' ba dang
280b7('bum): bcan thasam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par spyod pa nye bar zhinas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa/ 
280b8('bum): rnam thar spyod pa byed 'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang 'de bcam/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral nas dran pa dang ldan zhing gis badzin
281a1('bum): du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba sus kyis myong ba 'phags pa pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa 'de ba sa rnam par spyod par btang soms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtam sa/ 
281a2('bum): pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba dang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid myi de bas nas kyang nub pas 'do ba yang skyed sdug bsngal ba myed pa btang snyoms 'dran pas bsam gtan bzhi sa la
281a3('bum): bar sgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen shin tu yangs pa myi gnyis pacad myeng pa gzugs pa myeng ba gnod pa myed pa spong pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs bzhin du bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi/ 
281a4('bum): kyis las parnams pa sa gas par zugs byang / rdzo ma na
281a5('bum): spyod pa gcugs pa myed pa gdong ba skyed pasod pa skyed payongs su ga dug tu gasgoms pa/ ga rte so kyi rgyas kyi sa tha rnam ma kha'i mams gtugs pags bcu rgyas par ba
281a6('bum): mos par byas gi rgyam par spyong do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad myed pa gcugs pa myed pa gnod pa myed pa lhod pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs bshin tu bsgoms pas/ 
281a7('bum): 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shim tu/ 
281a8('bum): yungs pa myi gnyis pa tshad myong po gcugs pa myed pa gnod pa myed pa lhong pa myed bu yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten gyi chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas rdugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas
281b1('bum): par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha
281b2('bum): mtha' yas so zhes te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam shes
281b3('bum): mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zangs ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar/ 
281b4('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed min skye mched la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// 
281b5('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan to// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang gzugs myed pa na yod pa
281b6('bum): 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par 'jog cing / rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yong su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
