281b7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'o// de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i
281b8('bum): dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas/ de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par spyod pa/ zhi nas nang yongasu dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rno bar rtog pa myed pa rnam par spyod pa myed
282a1('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa sa nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bras ngas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyom su gnas te// 
282a2('bum): bde ba lus kyis myong ba 'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pa rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug snga/ 
282a3('bum): ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang myed sdug bsngal ba yang myed pa btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan
282a4('bum): pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa tshad myed pa/ gcugs myed pa gnod pa myed pa lhod pa myed pa yongs su rdzog das pa shin tu sgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam/ 
282a5('bum): mkha'i mthas rmugs pa phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa tshad myed pa gtsug myed pa gnod pa myed pa/ 
282a6('bum): ltong pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten gi chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// 
282a7('bum): de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa tshad myed pa gcugs pa myed pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam
282a8('bum): mkha'a'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya ches na po shin tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa tshad myed pa gcugs myed pa
282b1('bum): gnod pa myed pa lhod pa myeng pa yongasu rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten gyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thas
282b2('bum): cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar
282b3('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag 'das te rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnaso// de rnam pa thams
282b4('bum): cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas mtha' skye mnadra la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha'
282b5('bum): yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rna/ ma pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 
282b6('bum): 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myi ni skye mched la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sos
282b7('bum): dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang gzugs myed pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rna ba dang / tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par 'jog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang rnam pa thas cad N+Di
282b8('bum): pa nyid du yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog
283a1('bum): dang bcas pa spyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par spyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongasu dang se
283a2('bum): sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa myed pa rnam par spyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas/ de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang
283a3('bum): bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te bde ba lus kyis myong ba 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa
283a4('bum): bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed sdug bsngal ba yang myed pa/ 
283a5('bum): btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi la nye bar bsgrubs te/ gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu ya nges pa myi gnyis pa tshad myed pa gcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa
283a6('bum): stod pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas zhugs par bya gas bcu rgyas par bkang ste// mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// 
283a7('bum): de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa tshad myed pa gcugs myed pa gnod pa myed pa lhod pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ 
283a8('bum): nam mkha'i mthas zhugs pa'i phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rna bar spyong ngo // de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shini tu yangs pa ma gnyis batshad myed pa gzugs myed pa gnod pa myed na
283b1('bum): stong pa myong ba yongs su rdzogs shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pas phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos byas shing rnam par spyod do// de myi dmyigs dang
283b2('bum): tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa tshad myed pa gcugs pa myed pa gnod pa myed pa lhod pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings
283b3('bum): kyis gras pa/ nam mkha' mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i/ 
283b4('bum): 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes dang la myi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnamapa
283b5('bum): thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang da ga bar 'das te/ rnam shes mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes ma tha' yas skye mched la nye bar smrabs te gnas so// de rnam pa zas
283b6('bum): cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched
283b7('bum): las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ 
283b8('bum): nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang gzugs myed pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par 'jog cing rna bar
284a1('bum): ldang ba'i tshe yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ci
284a2('bum): 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa spyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog/ 
284a3('bum): ba dang rnam par spyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa rnam par spyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa
284a4('bum): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas tre/ bde ba lus myong ba 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan
284a5('bum): pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar sgrubs te/ gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs// 
284a6('bum): shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myod pa sdug bsngal ba yang myed pa btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de byas pa dang ldan pa'i seMs rgya/ 
284a7('bum): chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad myed pa gcugs med pa gnod pa med pa lhod pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas// 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas rtags/ 
284a8('bum): pa phyogs bcur rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa tshad med pa gcugs myed pa gnod pa myed pa lhod pa myed pa yongasu
284b1('bum): rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha' mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen
284b2('bum): po shin tu yangs pa mya gnyis pa tshad myed pa gcugs myed pa gnod pa myed pa lhod pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas rdugs pa'i phyogs bcu
284b3('bum): rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa ses rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad myed pa gcugs pa myed pa gnod pa myed pa lhod pa mye/ 
284b4('bum): ba yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi da byings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs pacu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa
284b5('bum): thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thog pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du/ shes yid la myi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes nam
284b6('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te rnam shes mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar
284b7('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnaso/ de rnam pa thams cad du cung
284b8('bum): zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang
285a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad myed pa 'di dag dang / gzugs myed pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par 'jog cing
285a2('bum): rnam par ldang ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing
285a3('bum): 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa spyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par
285a4('bum): rtog pa dang rnam par spyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa'i/ rnam par spyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / 
285a5('bum): bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar sgrubs te gan/ so ba/ de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shos bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te bde ba lus kyis
285a6('bum): myong ba 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnaso/ de bde ba yang spangs
285a7('bum): sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas// bde ba yang myed sdug bsngal ba yang myed pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnas
285a8('bum): de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa tshad myed pa gcugs myed pa gnod pa myed pa lhod pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyi
285b1('bum): klas pa rnam ma kha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis patshad myed pa gcugs
285b2('bum): myed pa gnod pa myed pa ldong ba myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas rtags pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas bgang ste/ mos
285b3('bum): par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i se mas rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa tshad myed pa gcugs myed pa gnod pa myed pa lhod pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin
285b4('bum): tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pra/ namakha'i mthas rdugs pa'i phyogs pa/ cu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ 
285b5('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa tshad myed pa gcugs myed pa gnod pa myed pa lhod pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin
285b6('bum): bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas rtags pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs/ 
285b7('bum): kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la
285b8('bum): nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dge bar 'das te/ rnam shes mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye tir bsgrubs
286a1('bum): gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te// cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// den
286a2('bum): pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub ses
286a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag dang / tshad myed pa 'di dag dang gzugs myed pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang tshul dang ma
286a4('bum): mas mnyam par 'jog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe/ yang rnam pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub se/ dmas dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'i/ 
286a5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa spyod ba dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam
286a6('bum): gtan dang po la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par spyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa myed pa/ rnam par spyod pa myed pa'i ting nge
286a7('bum): 'dzin de las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyomasu gnas te/ 
286a8('bum): bde ba lus kyis myong ba 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsuM ba la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ 
286b1('bum): de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed sdug bsngal ba yang / med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar sgrugs
286b2('bum): te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad myed pa gcugs myed pa gnod pa myong ba lhong pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig nyin chos kyi dbyings
286b3('bum): kyis khros pa/ nam mkha'i mtha'i gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod de/ de sring rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen bzhin tu yangs rgya mi gnyis batshang myed pa gcugs
286b4('bum): myong ba gnon pa myed pa lhong ba myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nas mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos pa
286b5('bum): byas shing rnam par spyong ngo / de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa tshad med pa gcugs myed pa gnod pa myed pa lhod pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa yongasu sgom
286b6('bum): 'jig rten chos kyi tshungs kyis byas pa rnams pa'i mnas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mas par byas shing rnam par srung de/ demyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis btang sems dang ldan pa
286b7('bum): rgyacan pogs tu yang sgrub mo gnyis bcad myed pa gzugs myed pa gnod ba skyed pa kod pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs bzhon tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten gocas kyi dngas kyis klas pa/ nam mA la'i sabyas su
286b8('bum): ba'i phyogs bcur rgya'i bar bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod / de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna chon so/ 
287a1('bum): 'du shes yid la myi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnaso/ de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par 'das/ 
287a2('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye
287a3('bum): mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed min skye mched la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// 
287a4('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad myed pa 'di dag dang / gzugs myed pan yod pa/ 
287a5('bum): 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par 'jog ce nga rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yod/ sa su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mo/ 
287a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang bya/ 
287a7('bum): chub sems dpa' rkyen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad myed pa gcugs myed pa gnod pa myed pa lhod pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi daphyi
287a8('bum): kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pas phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa tshad myed pa gcugs myed pa gan
287b1('bum): pa myed pa lhong pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas rmugs pa'i phyogs bcu'i rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba/ 
287b2('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa tshad myed pa gcugs pa myed pa gnod pa myed pa lhod pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas rtags pa
287b3('bum): phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa tshad myed pa gcugs myed pa gnod pa myed pa lhod pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin
287b4('bum): tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthasra gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam dpar spyod do// de 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dpe
287b5('bum): ba rtog pa dang bcas pa spyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba/ dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par spyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su
287b6('bum): dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa rnam paraspyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' sa dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las
287b7('bum): 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong ba 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed/ 
287b8('bum): pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnas/ de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang myed sdug bsngal ba yang myed pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongasu
288a1('bum): dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs/ 
288a2('bum): kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha yas skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'dus
288a3('bum): te/ rnam shes mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar sbubs te gnas/ de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te cung zad mo yod do zhes cung zad myeng ba'i skye
288a4('bum): mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes skye da la nye bar bsgrubs te gan so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sa so// 
288a5('bum): dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'o// chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sem/ sa kyis/ snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas/ nyon mongs pa rab
288a6('bum): tu spang ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la brjod cing 'chad pa dang / ston cing 'brel la rnam par 'byed de// de dag gi ro dang / de dag gi
288a7('bum): skyon dang 'byung ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
288a8('bum): cing dpo ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gis bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par 'jog cing / rnam par ldang yang 'di lta ste nyan thos sa rang sangs rgyas/ 
288b1('bum): kyis yang rung ste/ sems bskyed pa gzhan gi 'byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma nyams pa'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ 
288b2('bum): po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gyis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe 'di snyam ste/ sems can 'di snyed
288b3('bum): thams cad gyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// snyam du sems cing yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa dang rten pa dang sems shing khongs su chung bar byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' so// 
288b4('bum): dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sos dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid / dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang / 
288b5('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / rnam pa than/ sa cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir brtson 'grus nyam par myi byed pa 'di ni/ 
288b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bas bsam rnan
288b7('bum): dang rnang zer ba dang // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnams la mnyam par 'jog cing rnam par ldang ba yang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba 'di ni byang chub seMs dpa' ses
288b8('bum): dpa' chen po'i bsamu gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang b+h+yo'i lan pa dang dang / bsam gtan gnyis
289a1('bum): pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gsum pa'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i yan lag dang / byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam/ 
289a2('bum): shes mtha' yas skye mched dang cung zad myed pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched de dag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag myed pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa
289a3('bum): dang stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam pa dang smon pa myed pa'i rnam par rtogs kyang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag myi dmyigs shing de dag gyis rma/ 
289a4('bum): sems myed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa da sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
289a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
289a6('bum): bzhi sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dbang po lnga bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du stobs lnga sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du
289a7('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du ma
289a8('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug bsam gtan rnaMs bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du tshad myed pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa/ 
289b1('bum): thams cad du rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
289b2('bum): myed pa dang smon pa myed pa bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom
289b3('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mi 'jigs pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom pa dang / 
289b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad du byams pa chen por sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams ca/ dad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams
289b5('bum): cad du thams cad shes pa nyid du sgom pa dang / rnam pa zam sa cad du lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgom pa dang / rnam pa tham sa cad du rnam pa thams cad du khyen pa nyid bsgom pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa
289b6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'ang ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ta'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnya
289b7('bum): 'jog cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad yongasu skyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar bya'o// snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang snying rtse ba'i nyams su byed
289b8('bum): dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin sa mnyam par 'jog cing bdag nyid kyis grol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la semaso// btang sems kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnye bar 'jog cing seMs can rnams gi zag par bzod par bya ba sa
290a1('bum): 5/ rab tu gzhol bar byed do// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam
290a2('bum): gtan dang tshad myed pa ki rnam pa dang tshul dang / mtshan ma la mnyam par 'jog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe/ yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi/ 
290a3('bum): ser yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu ma nyams pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems pa/ 
290a4('bum): chen po bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dris par rnam par spyod cing sa gnyis pa nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas sa 'dod pa myi skyed kyi/ rnam pa
290a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad
290a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i de na du brtson 'grus mi rtong pas rnam par spyong ba 'di ni/ bya
290a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
290a8('bum): chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang rnams dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la mnyam par 'jog pa bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis
290b1('bum): gyis kyang myi skye zhing / de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa yang myed pa la/ de dag gis 'phrogs par yang myi 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gi pha
290b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug padi/ 
290b3('bum): dag la mnyam par 'jog cing rnam par ldang ba de dag la mi rtog pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba rna ba dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / song ba'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i rna ba dang / 
290b4('bum): smon pa myed pa'i rnam pa rab tu rtogs kyang nyan thos dang / rangs ngas rgyas kyi skyon med par yang 'jug par myi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
290b5('bum): phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 
290b6('bum): chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma
290b7('bum): yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gas ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin
290b8('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 
291a1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stos nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 
291a2('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ma yin/ chos tha/ 
291a3('bum): cad stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang / 
291a4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po myed kyi stong zla nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa
291a5('bum): radwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thig/ pa chen po ni chos thams cad la sems canam par mi 'khrug cing ma/ nyam par bzhag par shes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
291a6('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub ses dpa' sems da pa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya b.rA mI 'khrug cirang
291a7('bum): n+d+ras / nas kya shAs jug sa pa'i ga sashes sa 'dag pad/ 
291a8('bum): dang / sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / mi sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
291a9('bum): theg pa chechen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po 'dres pa'i dus su shes pa myi 'jug pa dang / ma 'ong ba'i 'du shes pa myi 'jug pa dang / da ltar byung gi/ 
291b1('bum): dus su shes pa myi 'jug pa myed de/ dus gsum du shes pa 'jug pa myed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
291b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par myi byed gzugs dang gzugs myed pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par myi byed la/ 'dod pa dang gzugs myed pa'i khas myi shes pa yang myed
291b3('bum): ba ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
291b4('bum): chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la'ang shes bya 'jug par myi byed/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang ba bcas pa dang zag myed pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang 'dus ma/ 
291b5('bum): byas kyi chos rnams la mi 'jug kyang 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las/ 'das pa mi shes pa yang myed zag pa dang btsas pa dang / zag pa myed pa dang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang myi/ 
291b6('bum): shes pa yang myed pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub
291b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la gnas zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
291b8('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par yang dag par gnas kyang des sbyin pa yang myi dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang myi dmyigs byang chub sems dpa' yang myi dmyigs len pa yang myi dmyigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang myi dmyigs te/ 
292a1('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ 
292a2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang des tshul khrims kyang myi dmyigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang myi dmyigs/ byang chub seMs dang / 
292a3('bum): yang myi dmigs yid la bya ba de dag kyang myi dmyigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya dmyigs pa'i tshul gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan
292a4('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des bzod pa yang mya dmyigs bzod
292a5('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa'/ yang myi dmyigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang myi dmyigs te/ de/ ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i phararo// 
292a6('bum): tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti 'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
292a7('bum): phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang des brtson 'grus kyang myi dmyigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang myi dmyigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang myi dmyigs te/ 
292a8('bum): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chen
292b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par gnas kyang des bsam gtan kyang myi dmyigs bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa yang myi dmyigs bya/ 
292b2('bum): chub sems dpa' yang myi dmyigs yid la bya ba ro dag kyang myi dmyigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa smra gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang / 
292b3('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang des dge ba'i chos kyang myi
292b4('bum): dmyigs mi dge ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa/ dang / 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dang / zag pa dang bcas/ ba dang / zag pa myed pa'i chos kyang myi dmyigs shing / shes rab kyi
292b5('bum): mya dmyigs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang myi dmyigs/ yid la byed pa de dag kyang myi dmyi gas te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
292b6('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
292b7('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas sgom pa bsgom pa don du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i/ 
292b8('bum): don du/ de mya dmyigs pa'i tshul gis phyi stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byin
293a1('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams
293a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pa
293a3('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'das pas sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de myi dmyigs
293a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam pa ru bsgom pa'i don du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong
293a5('bum): ba nyid bsgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi/ de la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don/ du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
293a6('bum): bsgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams
293a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rlor myed pa stong ba nyid bsgom po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
293a8('bum): 'dres pa'i sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid sos pa rnam par sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas sgom pa rna bar bsgom
293b1('bum): don du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi/ 
293b2('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa
293b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la/ 
293b4('bum): bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lhan ba'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'i don du
293b5('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgo/ ma mo/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub se/ mas dpa' kye sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
293b6('bum): deng ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pa/ 
293b7('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don
293b8('bum): du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'gres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mya dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dang
294a1('bum): po lnga bsgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stobs lnga sgom mo// rnam pa thams
294a2('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
294a3('bum): yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pasgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa ma
294a4('bum): 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de myi dmyigs pa/ 'i tshul gis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgom mo/ rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ 
294a5('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis bsam gtan bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par sgom
294a6('bum): pa'i don du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul kas tshad myed pa bzhi sgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs
294a7('bum): skyed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres paso// bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rnam par thar pa brgyad
294a8('bum): skom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom mo// 
294b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom mo/ 
294b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'i don du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa ma
294b3('bum): 'dres pas sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i
294b4('bum): don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ 
294b5('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis myi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dre/ sa pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de myi dmyigs pa
294b6('bum): tshul gis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom po rnam par sgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen
294b7('bum): po sgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pa sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad sgom mo/ 
294b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa med dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la gnas zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sos
295a1('bum): gdapa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmyigs su myod pa'i phyir 'dis so/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni kyi sang du zad dro zhes bya bar shes so// gzugs dkyigs
295a2('bum): su myed pa'i phyir gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad // 'du shes dmyigs su med pa'i phyir 'du shes zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du
295a3('bum): ngodo// 'du byed dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir 'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// myig dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir
295a4('bum): myig ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// rna ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir rna ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// sna dmyigs su byed dpa'i phyir sna zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// lce dmyigs su
295a5('bum): myeng pa'i phyir lce zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// lus dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir lus zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ yid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir yid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du
295a6('bum): zang ngo // gzugs dmyigs su myod pa'i phyir gzugs zhes bya ba 'di na mying tsam du zad do/ sgra zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do dri dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir dri zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rno dmyigs su/ 
295a7('bum): myed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// reg dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir reg ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// chos dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir chos zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// myig gi rnam par shes
295a8('bum): tha dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir myig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rna ba'i rdzi bar shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// sna'i rnam par shes pa
295b1('bum): dbyigs su myed pa'i phyira'i sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du 'ang ngo // sde'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zang ngo // sus kyi rnam pa shes pa myigs su byed/ 
295b2('bum): pa'i phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad ngo do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su myong
295b3('bum): phyir myig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ 
295b4('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'dri ni mying tsam du zad do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyi
295b5('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zang // yid kyir/ dus te reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa/ zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa las bya/ 
295b6('bum): ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa los byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las
295b7('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir snga'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor po zhes bya ba 'di ni mang tsam du zad // lce'i 'dus te reg pa/ 
295b8('bum): las byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zang // sras kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la
296a1('bum): khams zhes bya ba ni mi sa du zad do// rnam par shes pa dadamyigs su myed pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes pa 'dzin mying ma du thong 'o// ma rig pa dmyigs su
296a2('bum): phyim ma rig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni byid tsam du bang / 'du byed kyisu myed pa'i phyir/ 'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du 'a rnam par shes par dmyigs su myong ba'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i
296a3('bum): 'dini mying tshum du zad do// mying dang gzugs dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ phying dang gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni ni tsam du zad do// skye mthod drug dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir skye ma ched drug ces bya ba 'dzin/ 
296a4('bum): mis sa rubad do// ga par rgyags su myed pa'i phyir rig pazhis bya ba 'din masus du dad / ra ba phyogs su byeng pa byor ma ba ni sgrub 'dzin rdzo ma da do// byed bye phyogs su stod/ 
296a5('bum): ba'i phyir sreng pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// len par dmyig su myed pa'i phyir len pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming sam du zang ngo // srid pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir skyed ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir skye ba zhes bya sa
296b1('bum): 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rga shi dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir rga shi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam
296b2('bum): du zad do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya ba 'damyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ 
296b3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyining pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 
296b4('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya ba 'damyigs su myed pa 'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs su myed
296b5('bum): ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du// zad do// nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyi// ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// phyi stong pa nyid dmyigs
296b6('bum): su myeng pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba dmyigs su myong ba'i phyir phyi nang stong pa ni dzad ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// stong pa nyid stong pa ni
296b7('bum): dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// chen po stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// don dam pa stong
296b8('bum): pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni myi tsam du zad do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// 'dus
297a1('bum): ga byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni ming tsam du zad do// mtha' las 'das pa stong ba nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di
297a2('bum): niming tsam du zang // thog ma dang bam myed pa spang pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir 'og ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming du zad do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir dor ba myed pa spong ba nyid kyi
297a3('bum): bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmyigasas su myed pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya/ 
297a4('bum): ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmyig su myed pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir myi dmyigs pa
297a5('bum): stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di mying tsam du zad do// dngos po myed pa stong / pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su/ 
297a6('bum): myong ba'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'dimyigs su myed pa'i phyir dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni ming tsam du za'o/ 
297a7('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// yang dag par spong ba rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir yang dag par spong ba bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming
297a8('bum): tsam du zad do// rdzu 'phrul gnang ba rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa gzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zang ngo // dbang po rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir dbang go lnga zhes bya ba 'di mying tsam du za dang / 
297b1('bum): stobs rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir stobs lnga zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// byang chub kyi yan rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// lam dmyigs su/ 
297b2('bum): myed pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yag lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// bsam ga/ 
297b3('bum): rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir bsam gtan bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// tshad myed pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir tshad myed pa bzhi zhes pa 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
297b4('bum): 'dug pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ gzugs myed pa'i so// mas par 'jug pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni myong tsam du zad do// rnam par thar pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa brgya
297b5('bum): ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms pa ra 'jug pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir mthar kyis gnas dra 'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba 'di mang tsam du zad do// rnam/ 
297b6('bum): bar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dmyig su myed pa'i phyir/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mngon par shes pa rnam
297b7('bum): dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa lnga zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// ting nge 'dzin rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmyigs
297b8('bum): su byung pa'i phyi gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni me ma du rang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngas dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sebs bcu zhes bya ba 'dzin myos sa du cad do// zil chos
298a1('bum): byaba'ang ni myi tsam du zad do/ de bzhin nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// mnor ba'i de bzhin nyid dmyigs su byed pa'i phyir ma rnam pa dide bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'din
298a2('bum): tsam du zad do// gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid dmyigs su myed pa ra phyir gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ma du zad do// chos nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir chos nyid kyi
298a3('bum): bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// chos kyi dbyings dmyigs su phyi chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// kyi gnas nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir chos kyi gnas nyid
298a4('bum): bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ chos skyon myed pa nyid dmyigs su myed pal phyir/ chos skyon myed pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dmyigs su myeng pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mthum
298a5('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// byang chub dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas kyi chos dmyig su myed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do zhes
298a6('bum): bar yang dag par shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub seMs dpa' seMs dpa' chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// bam po nyi shu pa'o// 
298b1('bum): tshe dang ldan pag dra ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ldan pa sems dang ba bskyed pa ras ming 'i byang chub la 'dug gi par du mngon par shes pa thams ma yongs su rdzogs sus nas
298b2('bum): cam yongs su sbyin par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / rim 'gro bya ba'i tshul dang gang la 'os pa de dag gis sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das la rim 'dra bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang phra rung du byab
298b3('bum): dang mchod par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i zag pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to// de byang chub sa
298b4('bum): dpa'i theg pa la gnas te sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang / de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
298b5('bum): 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sems can ga'adu shes kyang mi 'byung / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang myi 'byung ngo // de gnyis su myed pa'i sa la gnas shing lus rjes bus sems can rnams kyi
298b6('bum): mad ba des bu'i sras med du bsams zhing yongs su 'dzin to// de nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi po shes thob par ma gyur gyi du theg pa de dang rnam du yang mi 'dus te/ des rnam pa com sa sa
298b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang nyan thos dang rangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang ma ma yin pa dang / 
298b8('bum): mam pa'i 'jig rten gis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sa su du mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams/ 
299a1('bum): gang ga'i klung gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg
299a2('bum): ba chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags bsgo/ 
299a3('bum): cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing 'jig rten gi khams che ge mo ni/ 
299a4('bum): tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po tha ma myed pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba ni dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad
299a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do// zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag
299a6('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa theg pa'i
299a7('bum): mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do// zhes drags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mang
299a8('bum): byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing 'jig rten gi khams me ge mo zhig tu byang chub sos dpa' ma
299b1('bum): dpa' chen polatheg pa chen po za na myed pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do// zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs
299b2('bum): brjod pa mdzad do// kyang shAn gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi phyi ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ba zhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing 'jig rten no
299b3('bum): che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa theg pa chen po'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam
299b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo skoradar byed do// zhes drags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad/ shar lho phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung
299b5('bum): gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs ba rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing 'jig rten gi khas che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa/ 
299b6('bum): chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor byed zhes
299b7('bum): grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma sed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon
299b8('bum): brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gi khas che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
300a1('bum): zob ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do// zhes drags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi
300a2('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing 'jig rten gi khaMs che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen blo bla na myang ba'i theg pa
300a3('bum): theg pa mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog
300a4('bum): cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig / don gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod
300a5('bum): mdzad cing 'jig rten gi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i ts+tsha ga pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam
300a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do// zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig
300a7('bum): rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma sed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon dun brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' semasas
300a8('bum): chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes
300b1('bum): drags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byord kyis bco
300b2('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos so go cha chen po bgos so zhes bgyi na bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes
300b3('bum): bgyi ba lags de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po gyon cing de sbyin pa'i
300b4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa'i go cha bgos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ bsam gtan gi
300b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i go cha/ bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ stong pa nyid stong
300b6('bum): pa nyid gi go cha bgos/ chen po stong pa nyid gi go cha bgos/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
300b7('bum): kyi go cha bgos / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ rang gyi mtshan ni
300b8('bum): song ba nyid kyi go cha bags// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi go ma bgos/ dngos po myed pa stong ba nyid kyi go cha bgos ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos dran pa nye bar
301a1('bum): gzhag pa'i go cha bgos yang dag par spong ba'i go cha bgos/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa'i go cha bgos dbang po'i go cha bgos/ stobs kyi go cha bgos byang chub kyi yan lag gi go cha bgos lam gyi go cha bgos/ 'phags dang
301a2('bum): bden pa'i go cha bgos bsam gtan gi go cha bgos/ tshad myed pa'i go cha bgis/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thar pa'i go cha bgos mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos
301a3('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i go cha bgos/ mngon par shes pa'i go cha bgos ting nge 'dzin gi go cha bgos/ gzungs kyi sgo'i go cha bgos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi go ma
301a4('bum): bgos so mi 'jigs pa'i go cha bgos/ so so yang dag par rig pade'i go cha bgos/ snying rje chen po go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
301a5('bum): kyig ma bgos// sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/ snong gcu kyi song chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sdang bas rgyas nakang se/ raphyogs kyi 'jig rten ni khams gang ga'i klung gi byam
301a6('bum): sreng snang bas rgyas par 'gyengs so// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gyings so// nub phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma srid
301a7('bum): bas rgyas par 'gyengs so// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed sdang bas rgyas par 'gyengs so// byang shar phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma stong snang bas rgyas
301a8('bum): par 'gyengs so// shar lho phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed sdang bas rgyas par 'gyengs so// lho nub phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang
301b1('bum): rgyas par 'gyings so// nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gyengs so// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas
301b2('bum): par 'gengs so// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gyings so// stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu bskyed do// shar phyogs kyi 'jin
301b3('bum): rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed do// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khas gang ga'i/ 
301b4('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed do// byang phyogs kyi 'ag rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed do/ byang shar phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khas ga
301b5('bum): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rna ba drug tu rab tu bskyod do// shar lho'i phyo/ gas 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye/ ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed do// lho nub kyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten
301b6('bum): gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed do// nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung go bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed do/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten
301b7('bum): gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed do// des stong gsum gi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed do/ des stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
301b8('bum): gi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bya ba'i sgra
302a1('bum): brjod do// dbyangs skrag go/ de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang / bde ba thob ste de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas
302a2('bum): rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba pa de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des stong gsum kyi
302a3('bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na byol song gi skye gnas kyi sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas gi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
302a4('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye ga nas kyi sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde
302a5('bum): ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ byol song gi skye gnasade dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag gi byol song gi skye gnasade dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ 
302a6('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing mtsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di ni 'gashin rje'i 'jig rten gi sems can rnams kyi gshin rje'i 'jig
302a7('bum): rten gi sdug bsngal de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe gshin rje'i 'jig rten
302a8('bum): gi khams gi khams de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des gshin rje'i 'jig rten gi khams de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten de
302b1('bum): dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ 
302b2('bum): sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed dag yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do dbyangs sgrog/ 
302b3('bum): de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba
302b4('bum): de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung
302b5('bum): gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can dmyal ba pa'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshe gas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag
302b6('bum): 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgo de thos nas kyang dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal
302b7('bum): ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// 
302b8('bum): des nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma sed dag na sems can dmyal bya ba'i me'i lung ba ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bci pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
303a1('bum): rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems
303a2('bum): can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des byang bya/ 
303a3('bum): kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la
303a4('bum): phyag 'tshal lo zhes sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmya ngal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nasadaga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems cad
303a5('bum): dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag/ nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang nasas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de da
303a6('bum): tu skye'o// des byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag ba/ 
303a7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba bya'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag
303a8('bum): dga' ba dang bde ba des/ sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par dang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcoM ldan 'das rnas bzhugs shing
303b1('bum): skyong ba de dang de dag skye'o// des shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba
303b2('bum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga'
303b3('bum): ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyo
303b4('bum): bde dang de dag tu skye'o// des lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi kham ngas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mi de'i phung po ji snyed cig yod de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin ga
303b5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo/ zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga'
303b6('bum): 'badi bathos ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par 'angs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang nasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
303b7('bum): bzhugs shing mtsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji srid cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ 
303b8('bum): de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang / 
304a1('bum): bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs// 
304a2('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de
304a3('bum): ngag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kya
304a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' bu dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag gi sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs
304a5('bum): rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhug/ sa shing mtsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ seMs
304a6('bum): can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog/
