304a7('bum): de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra do thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal
304a8('bum): bde dag nas rna bar langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcoM ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khas gang ga'i gling gi bye ma snyed dag na/ rgya
304b1('bum): song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye nas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs ba dag/

304b3('bum): rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldangs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ de dag
304b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnaMs bzhugs shing 'tsho
304b5('bum): skyong ba dang de dang dag tu skye'o// des lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnas
304b6('bum): kyi/ byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gi sdug bsde la ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas de la phyag
304b7('bum): 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas kyang dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga'
304b8('bum): pa dang bde sa des byom mang gi skyi gnas dang ga shin rje'i 'jig rten de dag ngas rnam par ldang ba/ de dag phyis song gi skye gnas dang gzhin rje'i 'jig rten de dganas rnam par yangs nas / sangs rgyas kyi ning gang dang
305a1('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de dang de dag tu skye'o// des nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i seMs can rnam
305a2('bum): kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bya ba'i
305a3('bum): sgra brjod do dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas

305a7('bum): byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thas nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de /

305b1('bum): des byang shar gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gi sdug bsngal ji/

305b4('bum): dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag nas rnam par yang sa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'a/ dras rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des shar/

306a7('bum): la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba

306b8('bum): mying gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de bos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' bo dang bdo ba des byal song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje dzi/ 
307a1('bum): rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shi
307a2('bum): mtsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am sgyu mi mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du sems na/ 
307a3('bum): dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag ci mngon par sprul la/ de ltar mngon par sprul nas ngan song gi sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi smre sgrog/ chos kyi sgra sgrog dge 'dun gi sgra sgrog
307a4('bum): par 'gyur la/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang chos kyi sgra dang dge 'dun gi sgra des sems can dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par bslang ba yod dam gsol
307a5('bum): ba bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byord de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams tshad myed
307a6('bum): grangs myed pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su bkrol yang / sems can gang yang yongs su bkrol ba myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid kyang de yin pa'i phyir te/ 
307a7('bum): rab 'byor rje ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
307a8('bum): la gnas shing / stong gsum gi stong pa chen po'i 'jig rten gi khes bye du rgya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul byed do// de ltar bye du r+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par
307b1('bum): skul par byed do// de ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul nas zas 'dod pa rnams ma thos kau skom 'dod pa rnams la skom gi sbyin pa byed do// gzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la gnon pa'i sbyin pa byed do// gos 'dod pani
307b2('bum): la gos sbyin par byed do// me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog gi sbyin pa byed do// phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba'i sbyin pa byed do// spos 'dod pa rnams la spos kyi sbyin pa byed do// byug sa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa'i sbyi
307b3('bum): ba byed de/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha'i sbyin pa byed do// khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim gi sbyin pa byed do// 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba'i sbyin pa byed do// yo byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad kyi sbyin gi sbyin pa
307b4('bum): byed do// nad gi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la nan kyi rkyen gyi dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do// nor bu dang mu tig dang bye dUr+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang / gser dang dngul 'dod pa rnaMs la no// 
307b5('bum): bu dang mu tig dang / bye du r+ya dang dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang gse ra dang dngul gi sbyin pa byed pa nas mi'i yo byad gang tsi yang rung ba 'bir du byin pa byed de/ des/ de ltar zas 'dod pa la zas byin/ skom
307b6('bum): 'dod pa rnams la skom bya ni Sha mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad byin/ nang gi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod
307b7('bum): ba la nang gi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang mu tig dang bye dur+ya dang dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang gser dang dngul 'dod pa la ni nor bu dang mu tig dang / bye dUr+ya dang dngul dang / man shel dang byi ru dang gser pa
307b8('bum): dngul byin pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin nas/ seMs can de dag la 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa'i 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// seMs can de dag gis kyang chos
307b9('bum): rtsa gzhon pa 'dang rnas pa gzhon byi napa sa rgyam nas byid mnan rdzas la matan byin phre sa 'dunas zas byin sa ma 'do ba rnamapa so phyin byug pa 'dod rnas 'acug byin
308a1('bum): gabaman pa de thos nas dran myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs ma rgyas kyi bor du pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang nam yang bral bar myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgra ma mkhan po ma/ sku
308a2('bum): ma mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs zhig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin skom 'dad pa rnams la/ 
308a3('bum): ni sgom byin/ gzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni gzhon pa 'byin/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog byin/ 'phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos byin
308a4('bum): byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa byini/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal/ cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rna mas la ni 'tsho ba byin yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin
308a5('bum): nad gyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams ni nang gi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang mu tig dang bye dur+ya dang dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang gser dang dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni nor bu dang mu tig dang
308a6('bum): khye ru r+ya dang / dung dang man shes dang gser dngul byin pa nas rgya 'o yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byon na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan po 'am sgyu mi mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa des seMs
308a7('bum): na gangs yang phyin pa yod dam/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de ni mo lags so// com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ra/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thos 'khang ma sa
308a8('bum): ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul te/ las 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/ skom 'dod pa rnams ni skom byin/ gzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni gzhon pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha byin/ gos 'dod pa rnams / 
308b1('bum): gos byin me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog byin/ 'phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa rnams ni spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams ni byug pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha byin khyim 'dod pa rnam
308b2('bum): la ni khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad byin nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin nor bu dang mu tig dang bye dur+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang / 
308b3('bum): gser dang dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni mu tig dang / bye dur+ya dang dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang gser dngul byin pa nas myi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin na yang / sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
308b4('bum): rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin nyid yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor
308b5('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha ro// lang tu phyind pa la gnas shing ched du bsams te/ skye ba yongasu bzu// nga bas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye zhing de 'khor los
308b6('bum): sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/ sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod do// bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga
308b7('bum): dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 
308b8('bum): rnam par thar pa'i stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang gzugs
309a1('bum): kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu/ 
309a2('bum): 'god do sems can de dag kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du chos bstan pa de dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan mo la/ 
309a3('bum): sgyu ma mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshig gi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/ bsam
309a4('bum): gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lngar
309a5('bum): stobs lnga dang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam ya na lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang ma tshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar
309a6('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa pa zhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang
309a7('bum): dag por rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji sam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am sgyu ma mkhan po'i mtshan bu des/ sems
309a8('bum): can gang yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa yod dam/ bsam gtan bzhi dang tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang
309b1('bum): dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / 
309b2('bum): smon pa myed pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
309b3('bum): stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig bzhi dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan
309b4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod de/ bsam gtan bzhi dang
309b5('bum): tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhidang mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ngan pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga
309b6('bum): dang stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i
309b7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
309b8('bum): snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bkod kyang sems can gang yang de dag la bkod pa myed do// rab 'byor de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis
310a1('bum): de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu
310a2('bum): phyinang pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas
310a3('bum): shing sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ brgyal
310a4('bum): sems can thams cad la rdo dang dbyug pas rdeg cing / mtshon gis 'deb/ sa kyang de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ag tsam yang bskyed par myi bya'o// zhes go bar byed cing sems can thams cad kyang
310a5('bum): bzod pa de 'dra ba la rab tu 'god par byed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dpe/ gyur na sgyu ma mkhan po'i sgyu ma mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pazhi ga gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i
310a6('bum): tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul nas/ bzod pa'i pha rol de tu phyind pa la rab tu gyur pa dang rab tu bkod pa byas na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan
310a7('bum): po 'am/ sgyu ma mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bzhag pa yod dam/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
310a8('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can tshad med drangs myed pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
310b1('bum): rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye byar bzung na no chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan la/ 
310b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba dang gzhog cing 'god do// rab 'byor
310b3('bum): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang gzhog cing 'gan
310b4('bum): ni zhe nu/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen dpo rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi/ brtson 'grus
310b5('bum): la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am sgyu mi mkhan po'i mtshan bu ma khas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste skye bo'i
310b6('bum): mang ba'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang ba'i tshigs shig mngon par sbyar te/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod na/ rab 'byor das ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan po 'am sgyu na mkhan po mnam
310b7('bum): bu des sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la tho gang pa yod das/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sumaH/ pa'i de bzhin du
310b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can tshad myed drangs myed pa lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod kyang sems can gang yang lus kyi sems dang brtson 'grus la bkod pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe
311a1('bum): rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid pa'i de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'gyu
311a2('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog cing 'god do// rab
311a3('bum): 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul ba dang gzhog cing
311a4('bum): 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems da dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi chos nyid la gnas shing chos gang ya dang 'khrug pa 'am 'khrug pa myed par yang dag par rje su myi mthong na/ 
311a5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhi na du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog pa dang 'gog par byed do// 
311a6('bum): de spyir yang dag par skum pa rnams kyang nam tha na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de
311a7('bum): lha ste dper na sgyu ma mkhan po 'am sgyu ma mkhan pa'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam ze che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshig gi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs zhig mngon par sprus te/ bsam gtan gyi po ma
311a8('bum): byed kyis god na/ rgyar 'acur de 'i sram du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan pa'am sgyu ma mthun pa'is rkun ca sa semam can gang yang bsam gtan gis mang du phyin pa sre zhi pa med pa'i com ldan
311b1('bum): de ni ma mchis sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa la bkod kyang sems can gang yang / 
311b2('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bkod pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpal
311b3('bum): sems dpa' char po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
311b4('bum): ba la yang dag par skal zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor de ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang
311b5('bum): dag par bskul 'ding gzhog cing 'god pa dang ni zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di/ la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la gnas shing chos gang yang skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am/ 
311b6('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am rnam par byang ba 'am tshu rol lam pha rol tu myi dmyigs te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems na
311b7('bum): thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhig go 'god do// rab 'byor 'di la ste dper na/ sgyu ma mkhan po 'am sgyum mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas gzhig gis lam pa che'i bzhi mngo dun
311b8('bum): ste skye bo mang po'i tshigs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par skul te gzhog cing 'god na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems sgyu mi mkhan po dang sgyu ma'i ma
312a1('bum): po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du/ 
312a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bkod pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
312a3('bum): de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byord de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
312a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha chen po bgos/ shing / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi/ bye ma snyed du song zhing bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lag nas
312a5('bum): ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig/ 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par sku lo zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar ba/ 
312a6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par sku
312a7('bum): nang gnog gi 'god do// ji ltar bdag bstong ba'i pa ma tu byind pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'ag rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig 'khong ba de dag thams cad kyang bzod pa'i bar spong
312a8('bum): tu phyinang pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// ji ltar bdag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sal gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gi khes de dag na sems can ji med cig 'kho
